2851 BUILTIN_TYPE(obj), (void*)(obj), RBASIC(obj)->flags)
2852
2853const char *
2854rb_imemo_name(enum imemo_type type)
2855{
2856 // put no default case to get a warning if an imemo type is missing
2857 switch (type) {
2858#define IMEMO_NAME(x) case imemo_##x: return #x;
2859 IMEMO_NAME(env);
2860 IMEMO_NAME(cref);
2861 IMEMO_NAME(svar);
2862 IMEMO_NAME(throw_data);
2863 IMEMO_NAME(ifunc);
2864 IMEMO_NAME(memo);
2865 IMEMO_NAME(ment);
2866 IMEMO_NAME(iseq);
2867 IMEMO_NAME(tmpbuf);
2868 IMEMO_NAME(ast);
2869 IMEMO_NAME(parser_strterm);
2870 IMEMO_NAME(callinfo);
2871 IMEMO_NAME(callcache);
2872 IMEMO_NAME(constcache);
2873#undef IMEMO_NAME
2874 }
2875 return "unknown";
2876}
2877
2878#undef rb_imemo_new
2879
2880VALUE
2881rb_imemo_new(enum imemo_type type, VALUE v1, VALUE v2, VALUE v3, VALUE v0)
2882{
2883 size_t size = sizeof(RVALUE);
2884 VALUE flags = T_IMEMO | (type << FL_USHIFT);
2885 return newobj_of(v0, flags, v1, v2, v3, TRUE, size);
2886}
2887
2888static VALUE
2889rb_imemo_tmpbuf_new(VALUE v1, VALUE v2, VALUE v3, VALUE v0)
2890{
2891 size_t size = sizeof(RVALUE);
2892 VALUE flags = T_IMEMO | (imemo_tmpbuf << FL_USHIFT);
2893 return newobj_of(v0, flags, v1, v2, v3, FALSE, size);
2894}
2895
2896static VALUE
2897rb_imemo_tmpbuf_auto_free_maybe_mark_buffer(void *buf, size_t cnt)
2898{
2899 return rb_imemo_tmpbuf_new((VALUE)buf, 0, (VALUE)cnt, 0);
2900}
2901
2902rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *
2903rb_imemo_tmpbuf_parser_heap(void *buf, rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *old_heap, size_t cnt)
2904{
2905 return (rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *)rb_imemo_tmpbuf_new((VALUE)buf, (VALUE)old_heap, (VALUE)cnt, 0);
2906}
2907
2908static size_t
2909imemo_memsize(VALUE obj)
2910{
2911 size_t size = 0;
2912 switch (imemo_type(obj)) {
2913 case imemo_ment:
2914 size += sizeof(RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ment.def);
2915 break;
2916 case imemo_iseq:
2917 size += rb_iseq_memsize((rb_iseq_t *)obj);
2918 break;
2919 case imemo_env:
2920 size += RANY(obj)->as.imemo.env.env_size * sizeof(VALUE);
2921 break;
2922 case imemo_tmpbuf:
2923 size += RANY(obj)->as.imemo.alloc.cnt * sizeof(VALUE);
2924 break;
2925 case imemo_ast:
2926 size += rb_ast_memsize(&RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ast);
2927 break;
2928 case imemo_cref:
2929 case imemo_svar:
2930 case imemo_throw_data:
2931 case imemo_ifunc:
2932 case imemo_memo:
2933 case imemo_parser_strterm:
2934 break;
2935 default:
2936 /* unreachable */
2937 break;
2938 }
2939 return size;
2940}
2941
2942#if IMEMO_DEBUG
2943VALUE
2944rb_imemo_new_debug(enum imemo_type type, VALUE v1, VALUE v2, VALUE v3, VALUE v0, const char *file, int line)
2945{
2946 VALUE memo = rb_imemo_new(type, v1, v2, v3, v0);
2947 fprintf(stderr, "memo %p (type: %d) @ %s:%d\n", (void *)memo, imemo_type(memo), file, line);
2948 return memo;
2949}
2950#endif
2951
2952VALUE
2953rb_class_allocate_instance(VALUE klass)
2954{
2955 st_table *index_tbl = RCLASS_IV_INDEX_TBL(klass);
2956
2957 VALUE flags = T_OBJECT | ROBJECT_EMBED;
2958
2959 VALUE obj = newobj_of(klass, flags, Qundef, Qundef, Qundef, RGENGC_WB_PROTECTED_OBJECT, sizeof(RVALUE));
2960
2961 if (index_tbl && index_tbl->num_entries > ROBJECT_EMBED_LEN_MAX) {
2962 rb_init_iv_list(obj);
2963 }
2964
2965 return obj;
2966}
2967
2968static inline void
2969rb_data_object_check(VALUE klass)
2970{
2971 if (klass != rb_cObject && (rb_get_alloc_func(klass) == rb_class_allocate_instance)) {
2972 rb_undef_alloc_func(klass);
2973 rb_warn("undefining the allocator of T_DATA class %"PRIsVALUE, klass);
2974 }
2975}
2976
2977VALUE
2978rb_data_object_wrap(VALUE klass, void *datap, RUBY_DATA_FUNC dmark, RUBY_DATA_FUNC dfree)
2979{
2980 RUBY_ASSERT_ALWAYS(dfree != (RUBY_DATA_FUNC)1);
2981 if (klass) rb_data_object_check(klass);
2982 return newobj_of(klass, T_DATA, (VALUE)dmark, (VALUE)dfree, (VALUE)datap, FALSE, sizeof(RVALUE));
2983}
2984
2985VALUE
2986rb_data_object_zalloc(VALUE klass, size_t size, RUBY_DATA_FUNC dmark, RUBY_DATA_FUNC dfree)
2987{
2988 VALUE obj = rb_data_object_wrap(klass, 0, dmark, dfree);
2989 DATA_PTR(obj) = xcalloc(1, size);
2990 return obj;
2991}
2992
2993VALUE
2994rb_data_typed_object_wrap(VALUE klass, void *datap, const rb_data_type_t *type)
2995{
2996 RBIMPL_NONNULL_ARG(type);
2997 if (klass) rb_data_object_check(klass);
2998 return newobj_of(klass, T_DATA, (VALUE)type, (VALUE)1, (VALUE)datap, type->flags & RUBY_FL_WB_PROTECTED, sizeof(RVALUE));
2999}
3000
3001VALUE
3002rb_data_typed_object_zalloc(VALUE klass, size_t size, const rb_data_type_t *type)
3003{
3004 VALUE obj = rb_data_typed_object_wrap(klass, 0, type);
3005 DATA_PTR(obj) = xcalloc(1, size);
3006 return obj;
3007}
3008
3009size_t
3010rb_objspace_data_type_memsize(VALUE obj)
3011{
3012 if (RTYPEDDATA_P(obj)) {
3013 const rb_data_type_t *type = RTYPEDDATA_TYPE(obj);
3014 const void *ptr = RTYPEDDATA_DATA(obj);
3015 if (ptr && type->function.dsize) {
3016 return type->function.dsize(ptr);
3017 }
3018 }
3019 return 0;
3020}
3021
3022const char *
3023rb_objspace_data_type_name(VALUE obj)
3024{
3025 if (RTYPEDDATA_P(obj)) {
3026 return RTYPEDDATA_TYPE(obj)->wrap_struct_name;
3027 }
3028 else {
3029 return 0;
3030 }
3031}
3032
3033static int
3034ptr_in_page_body_p(const void *ptr, const void *memb)
3035{
3036 struct heap_page *page = *(struct heap_page **)memb;
3037 uintptr_t p_body = (uintptr_t)GET_PAGE_BODY(page->start);
3038
3039 if ((uintptr_t)ptr >= p_body) {
3040 return (uintptr_t)ptr < (p_body + HEAP_PAGE_SIZE) ? 0 : 1;
3041 }
3042 else {
3043 return -1;
3044 }
3045}
3046
3047PUREFUNC(static inline struct heap_page * heap_page_for_ptr(rb_objspace_t *objspace, uintptr_t ptr);)
3048static inline struct heap_page *
3049heap_page_for_ptr(rb_objspace_t *objspace, uintptr_t ptr)
3050{
3051 struct heap_page **res;
3052
3053 if (ptr < (uintptr_t)heap_pages_lomem ||
3054 ptr > (uintptr_t)heap_pages_himem) {
3055 return NULL;
3056 }
3057
3058 res = bsearch((void *)ptr, heap_pages_sorted,
3059 (size_t)heap_allocated_pages, sizeof(struct heap_page *),
3060 ptr_in_page_body_p);
3061
3062 if (res) {
3063 return *res;
3064 }
3065 else {
3066 return NULL;
3067 }
3068}
3069
3070PUREFUNC(static inline int is_pointer_to_heap(rb_objspace_t *objspace, void *ptr);)
3071static inline int
3072is_pointer_to_heap(rb_objspace_t *objspace, void *ptr)
3073{
3074 register uintptr_t p = (uintptr_t)ptr;
3075 register struct heap_page *page;
3076
3077 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_isptr_trial);
3078
3079 if (p < heap_pages_lomem || p > heap_pages_himem) return FALSE;
3080 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_isptr_range);
3081
3082 if (p % BASE_SLOT_SIZE != 0) return FALSE;
3083 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_isptr_align);
3084
3085 page = heap_page_for_ptr(objspace, (uintptr_t)ptr);
3086 if (page) {
3087 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_isptr_maybe);
3088 if (page->flags.in_tomb) {
3089 return FALSE;
3090 }
3091 else {
3092 if (p < page->start) return FALSE;
3093 if (p >= page->start + (page->total_slots * page->slot_size)) return FALSE;
3094 if ((NUM_IN_PAGE(p) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE) % page->slot_size != 0) return FALSE;
3095
3096 return TRUE;
3097 }
3098 }
3099 return FALSE;
3100}
3101
3102static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
3103free_const_entry_i(VALUE value, void *data)
3104{
3105 rb_const_entry_t *ce = (rb_const_entry_t *)value;
3106 xfree(ce);
3107 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
3108}
3109
3110void
3111rb_free_const_table(struct rb_id_table *tbl)
3112{
3113 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, free_const_entry_i, 0);
3114 rb_id_table_free(tbl);
3115}
3116
3117static int
3118free_iv_index_tbl_free_i(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
3119{
3120 xfree((void *)value);
3121 return ST_CONTINUE;
3122}
3123
3124static void
3125iv_index_tbl_free(struct st_table *tbl)
3126{
3127 st_foreach(tbl, free_iv_index_tbl_free_i, 0);
3128 st_free_table(tbl);
3129}
3130
3131// alive: if false, target pointers can be freed already.
3132// To check it, we need objspace parameter.
3133static void
3134vm_ccs_free(struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs, int alive, rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE klass)
3135{
3136 if (ccs->entries) {
3137 for (int i=0; i<ccs->len; i++) {
3138 const struct rb_callcache *cc = ccs->entries[i].cc;
3139 if (!alive) {
3140 void *ptr = asan_poisoned_object_p((VALUE)cc);
3141 asan_unpoison_object((VALUE)cc, false);
3142 // ccs can be free'ed.
3143 if (is_pointer_to_heap(objspace, (void *)cc) &&
3144 IMEMO_TYPE_P(cc, imemo_callcache) &&
3145 cc->klass == klass) {
3146 // OK. maybe target cc.
3147 }
3148 else {
3149 if (ptr) {
3150 asan_poison_object((VALUE)cc);
3151 }
3152 continue;
3153 }
3154 if (ptr) {
3155 asan_poison_object((VALUE)cc);
3156 }
3157 }
3158 vm_cc_invalidate(cc);
3159 }
3160 ruby_xfree(ccs->entries);
3161 }
3162 ruby_xfree(ccs);
3163}
3164
3165void
3166rb_vm_ccs_free(struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs)
3167{
3168 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(ccs_free);
3169 vm_ccs_free(ccs, TRUE, NULL, Qundef);
3170}
3171
3172struct cc_tbl_i_data {
3173 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
3174 VALUE klass;
3175 bool alive;
3176};
3177
3178static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
3179cc_table_mark_i(ID id, VALUE ccs_ptr, void *data_ptr)
3180{
3181 struct cc_tbl_i_data *data = data_ptr;
3182 struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs = (struct rb_class_cc_entries *)ccs_ptr;
3183 VM_ASSERT(vm_ccs_p(ccs));
3184 VM_ASSERT(id == ccs->cme->called_id);
3185
3186 if (METHOD_ENTRY_INVALIDATED(ccs->cme)) {
3187 rb_vm_ccs_free(ccs);
3188 return ID_TABLE_DELETE;
3189 }
3190 else {
3191 gc_mark(data->objspace, (VALUE)ccs->cme);
3192
3193 for (int i=0; i<ccs->len; i++) {
3194 VM_ASSERT(data->klass == ccs->entries[i].cc->klass);
3195 VM_ASSERT(vm_cc_check_cme(ccs->entries[i].cc, ccs->cme));
3196
3197 gc_mark(data->objspace, (VALUE)ccs->entries[i].ci);
3198 gc_mark(data->objspace, (VALUE)ccs->entries[i].cc);
3199 }
3200 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
3201 }
3202}
3203
3204static void
3205cc_table_mark(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE klass)
3206{
3207 struct rb_id_table *cc_tbl = RCLASS_CC_TBL(klass);
3208 if (cc_tbl) {
3209 struct cc_tbl_i_data data = {
3210 .objspace = objspace,
3211 .klass = klass,
3212 };
3213 rb_id_table_foreach(cc_tbl, cc_table_mark_i, &data);
3214 }
3215}
3216
3217static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
3218cc_table_free_i(VALUE ccs_ptr, void *data_ptr)
3219{
3220 struct cc_tbl_i_data *data = data_ptr;
3221 struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs = (struct rb_class_cc_entries *)ccs_ptr;
3222 VM_ASSERT(vm_ccs_p(ccs));
3223 vm_ccs_free(ccs, data->alive, data->objspace, data->klass);
3224 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
3225}
3226
3227static void
3228cc_table_free(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE klass, bool alive)
3229{
3230 struct rb_id_table *cc_tbl = RCLASS_CC_TBL(klass);
3231
3232 if (cc_tbl) {
3233 struct cc_tbl_i_data data = {
3234 .objspace = objspace,
3235 .klass = klass,
3236 .alive = alive,
3237 };
3238 rb_id_table_foreach_values(cc_tbl, cc_table_free_i, &data);
3239 rb_id_table_free(cc_tbl);
3240 }
3241}
3242
3243static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
3244cvar_table_free_i(VALUE value, void * ctx)
3245{
3246 xfree((void *) value);
3247 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
3248}
3249
3250void
3251rb_cc_table_free(VALUE klass)
3252{
3253 cc_table_free(&rb_objspace, klass, TRUE);
3254}
3255
3256static inline void
3257make_zombie(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj, void (*dfree)(void *), void *data)
3258{
3259 struct RZombie *zombie = RZOMBIE(obj);
3260 zombie->basic.flags = T_ZOMBIE | (zombie->basic.flags & FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID);
3261 zombie->dfree = dfree;
3262 zombie->data = data;
3263 VALUE prev, next = heap_pages_deferred_final;
3264 do {
3265 zombie->next = prev = next;
3266 next = RUBY_ATOMIC_VALUE_CAS(heap_pages_deferred_final, prev, obj);
3267 } while (next != prev);
3268
3269 struct heap_page *page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj);
3270 page->final_slots++;
3271 heap_pages_final_slots++;
3272}
3273
3274static inline void
3275make_io_zombie(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
3276{
3277 rb_io_t *fptr = RANY(obj)->as.file.fptr;
3278 make_zombie(objspace, obj, rb_io_fptr_finalize_internal, fptr);
3279}
3280
3281static void
3282obj_free_object_id(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
3283{
3284 ASSERT_vm_locking();
3285 st_data_t o = (st_data_t)obj, id;
3286
3287 GC_ASSERT(FL_TEST(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID));
3288 FL_UNSET(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID);
3289
3290 if (st_delete(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, &o, &id)) {
3291 GC_ASSERT(id);
3292 st_delete(objspace->id_to_obj_tbl, &id, NULL);
3293 }
3294 else {
3295 rb_bug("Object ID seen, but not in mapping table: %s\n", obj_info(obj));
3296 }
3297}
3298
3299static int
3300obj_free(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
3301{
3302 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_free);
3303 // RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("obj:%p (%s)", (void *)obj, obj_type_name(obj));
3304
3305 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_FREEOBJ, obj);
3306
3307 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
3308 case T_NIL:
3309 case T_FIXNUM:
3310 case T_TRUE:
3311 case T_FALSE:
3312 rb_bug("obj_free() called for broken object");
3313 break;
3314 default:
3315 break;
3316 }
3317
3318 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_EXIVAR)) {
3319 rb_free_generic_ivar((VALUE)obj);
3320 FL_UNSET(obj, FL_EXIVAR);
3321 }
3322
3323 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID) && !FL_TEST(obj, FL_FINALIZE)) {
3324 obj_free_object_id(objspace, obj);
3325 }
3326
3327 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj)) CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS(obj), obj);
3328
3329#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
3330#define CHECK(x) if (x(obj) != FALSE) rb_bug("obj_free: " #x "(%s) != FALSE", obj_info(obj))
3331 CHECK(RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED);
3332 CHECK(RVALUE_MARKED);
3333 CHECK(RVALUE_MARKING);
3334 CHECK(RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE);
3335#undef CHECK
3336#endif
3337
3338 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
3339 case T_OBJECT:
3340 if (RANY(obj)->as.basic.flags & ROBJECT_EMBED) {
3341 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_obj_embed);
3342 }
3343 else if (ROBJ_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
3344 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_obj_transient);
3345 }
3346 else {
3347 xfree(RANY(obj)->as.object.as.heap.ivptr);
3348 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_obj_ptr);
3349 }
3350 break;
3351 case T_MODULE:
3352 case T_CLASS:
3353 rb_id_table_free(RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
3354 cc_table_free(objspace, obj, FALSE);
3355 if (RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj)) {
3356 st_free_table(RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj));
3357 }
3358 if (RCLASS_CONST_TBL(obj)) {
3359 rb_free_const_table(RCLASS_CONST_TBL(obj));
3360 }
3361 if (RCLASS_IV_INDEX_TBL(obj)) {
3362 iv_index_tbl_free(RCLASS_IV_INDEX_TBL(obj));
3363 }
3364 if (RCLASS_CVC_TBL(obj)) {
3365 rb_id_table_foreach_values(RCLASS_CVC_TBL(obj), cvar_table_free_i, NULL);
3366 rb_id_table_free(RCLASS_CVC_TBL(obj));
3367 }
3368 rb_class_remove_subclass_head(obj);
3369 rb_class_remove_from_module_subclasses(obj);
3370 rb_class_remove_from_super_subclasses(obj);
3371 if (FL_TEST_RAW(obj, RCLASS_SUPERCLASSES_INCLUDE_SELF)) {
3372 xfree(RCLASS_SUPERCLASSES(obj));
3373 }
3374#if SIZEOF_SERIAL_T != SIZEOF_VALUE && USE_RVARGC
3375 xfree(RCLASS(obj)->class_serial_ptr);
3376#endif
3377
3378#if !USE_RVARGC
3379 if (RCLASS_EXT(obj))
3380 xfree(RCLASS_EXT(obj));
3381#endif
3382
3383 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(obj_module_ptr, BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_MODULE);
3384 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(obj_class_ptr, BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_CLASS);
3385 break;
3386 case T_STRING:
3387 rb_str_free(obj);
3388 break;
3389 case T_ARRAY:
3390 rb_ary_free(obj);
3391 break;
3392 case T_HASH:
3393#if USE_DEBUG_COUNTER
3394 switch (RHASH_SIZE(obj)) {
3395 case 0:
3396 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_empty);
3397 break;
3398 case 1:
3399 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_1);
3400 break;
3401 case 2:
3402 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_2);
3403 break;
3404 case 3:
3405 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_3);
3406 break;
3407 case 4:
3408 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_4);
3409 break;
3410 case 5:
3411 case 6:
3412 case 7:
3413 case 8:
3414 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_5_8);
3415 break;
3416 default:
3417 GC_ASSERT(RHASH_SIZE(obj) > 8);
3418 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_g8);
3419 }
3420
3421 if (RHASH_AR_TABLE_P(obj)) {
3422 if (RHASH_AR_TABLE(obj) == NULL) {
3423 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_null);
3424 }
3425 else {
3426 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_ar);
3427 }
3428 }
3429 else {
3430 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_st);
3431 }
3432#endif
3433 if (/* RHASH_AR_TABLE_P(obj) */ !FL_TEST_RAW(obj, RHASH_ST_TABLE_FLAG)) {
3434 struct ar_table_struct *tab = RHASH(obj)->as.ar;
3435
3436 if (tab) {
3437 if (RHASH_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
3438 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_hash_transient);
3439 }
3440 else {
3441 ruby_xfree(tab);
3442 }
3443 }
3444 }
3445 else {
3446 GC_ASSERT(RHASH_ST_TABLE_P(obj));
3447 st_free_table(RHASH(obj)->as.st);
3448 }
3449 break;
3450 case T_REGEXP:
3451 if (RANY(obj)->as.regexp.ptr) {
3452 onig_free(RANY(obj)->as.regexp.ptr);
3453 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_regexp_ptr);
3454 }
3455 break;
3456 case T_DATA:
3457 if (DATA_PTR(obj)) {
3458 int free_immediately = FALSE;
3459 void (*dfree)(void *);
3460 void *data = DATA_PTR(obj);
3461
3462 if (RTYPEDDATA_P(obj)) {
3463 free_immediately = (RANY(obj)->as.typeddata.type->flags & RUBY_TYPED_FREE_IMMEDIATELY) != 0;
3464 dfree = RANY(obj)->as.typeddata.type->function.dfree;
3465 if (0 && free_immediately == 0) {
3466 /* to expose non-free-immediate T_DATA */
3467 fprintf(stderr, "not immediate -> %s\n", RANY(obj)->as.typeddata.type->wrap_struct_name);
3468 }
3469 }
3470 else {
3471 dfree = RANY(obj)->as.data.dfree;
3472 }
3473
3474 if (dfree) {
3475 if (dfree == RUBY_DEFAULT_FREE) {
3476 xfree(data);
3477 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_data_xfree);
3478 }
3479 else if (free_immediately) {
3480 (*dfree)(data);
3481 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_data_imm_free);
3482 }
3483 else {
3484 make_zombie(objspace, obj, dfree, data);
3485 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_data_zombie);
3486 return FALSE;
3487 }
3488 }
3489 else {
3490 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_data_empty);
3491 }
3492 }
3493 break;
3494 case T_MATCH:
3495 if (RANY(obj)->as.match.rmatch) {
3496 struct rmatch *rm = RANY(obj)->as.match.rmatch;
3497#if USE_DEBUG_COUNTER
3498 if (rm->regs.num_regs >= 8) {
3499 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_match_ge8);
3500 }
3501 else if (rm->regs.num_regs >= 4) {
3502 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_match_ge4);
3503 }
3504 else if (rm->regs.num_regs >= 1) {
3505 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_match_under4);
3506 }
3507#endif
3508 onig_region_free(&rm->regs, 0);
3509 if (rm->char_offset)
3510 xfree(rm->char_offset);
3511 xfree(rm);
3512
3513 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_match_ptr);
3514 }
3515 break;
3516 case T_FILE:
3517 if (RANY(obj)->as.file.fptr) {
3518 make_io_zombie(objspace, obj);
3519 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_file_ptr);
3520 return FALSE;
3521 }
3522 break;
3523 case T_RATIONAL:
3524 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_rational);
3525 break;
3526 case T_COMPLEX:
3527 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_complex);
3528 break;
3529 case T_MOVED:
3530 break;
3531 case T_ICLASS:
3532 /* Basically , T_ICLASS shares table with the module */
3533 if (RICLASS_OWNS_M_TBL_P(obj)) {
3534 /* Method table is not shared for origin iclasses of classes */
3535 rb_id_table_free(RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
3536 }
3537 if (RCLASS_CALLABLE_M_TBL(obj) != NULL) {
3538 rb_id_table_free(RCLASS_CALLABLE_M_TBL(obj));
3539 }
3540 rb_class_remove_subclass_head(obj);
3541 cc_table_free(objspace, obj, FALSE);
3542 rb_class_remove_from_module_subclasses(obj);
3543 rb_class_remove_from_super_subclasses(obj);
3544#if !USE_RVARGC
3545 xfree(RCLASS_EXT(obj));
3546#endif
3547
3548 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_iclass_ptr);
3549 break;
3550
3551 case T_FLOAT:
3552 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_float);
3553 break;
3554
3555 case T_BIGNUM:
3556 if (!BIGNUM_EMBED_P(obj) && BIGNUM_DIGITS(obj)) {
3557 xfree(BIGNUM_DIGITS(obj));
3558 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_bignum_ptr);
3559 }
3560 else {
3561 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_bignum_embed);
3562 }
3563 break;
3564
3565 case T_NODE:
3566 UNEXPECTED_NODE(obj_free);
3567 break;
3568
3569 case T_STRUCT:
3570 if ((RBASIC(obj)->flags & RSTRUCT_EMBED_LEN_MASK) ||
3571 RANY(obj)->as.rstruct.as.heap.ptr == NULL) {
3572 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_struct_embed);
3573 }
3574 else if (RSTRUCT_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
3575 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_struct_transient);
3576 }
3577 else {
3578 xfree((void *)RANY(obj)->as.rstruct.as.heap.ptr);
3579 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_struct_ptr);
3580 }
3581 break;
3582
3583 case T_SYMBOL:
3584 {
3585 rb_gc_free_dsymbol(obj);
3586 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_symbol);
3587 }
3588 break;
3589
3590 case T_IMEMO:
3591 switch (imemo_type(obj)) {
3592 case imemo_ment:
3593 rb_free_method_entry(&RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ment);
3594 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_ment);
3595 break;
3596 case imemo_iseq:
3597 rb_iseq_free(&RANY(obj)->as.imemo.iseq);
3598 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_iseq);
3599 break;
3600 case imemo_env:
3601 GC_ASSERT(VM_ENV_ESCAPED_P(RANY(obj)->as.imemo.env.ep));
3602 xfree((VALUE *)RANY(obj)->as.imemo.env.env);
3603 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_env);
3604 break;
3605 case imemo_tmpbuf:
3606 xfree(RANY(obj)->as.imemo.alloc.ptr);
3607 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_tmpbuf);
3608 break;
3609 case imemo_ast:
3610 rb_ast_free(&RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ast);
3611 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_ast);
3612 break;
3613 case imemo_cref:
3614 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_cref);
3615 break;
3616 case imemo_svar:
3617 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_svar);
3618 break;
3619 case imemo_throw_data:
3620 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_throw_data);
3621 break;
3622 case imemo_ifunc:
3623 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_ifunc);
3624 break;
3625 case imemo_memo:
3626 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_memo);
3627 break;
3628 case imemo_parser_strterm:
3629 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_parser_strterm);
3630 break;
3631 case imemo_callinfo:
3632 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_callinfo);
3633 break;
3634 case imemo_callcache:
3635 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_callcache);
3636 break;
3637 case imemo_constcache:
3638 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_imemo_constcache);
3639 break;
3640 }
3641 return TRUE;
3642
3643 default:
3644 rb_bug("gc_sweep(): unknown data type 0x%x(%p) 0x%"PRIxVALUE,
3645 BUILTIN_TYPE(obj), (void*)obj, RBASIC(obj)->flags);
3646 }
3647
3648 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_FINALIZE)) {
3649 make_zombie(objspace, obj, 0, 0);
3650 return FALSE;
3651 }
3652 else {
3653 return TRUE;
3654 }
3655}
3656
3657
3658#define OBJ_ID_INCREMENT (sizeof(RVALUE) / 2)
3659#define OBJ_ID_INITIAL (OBJ_ID_INCREMENT * 2)
3660
3661static int
3662object_id_cmp(st_data_t x, st_data_t y)
3663{
3664 if (RB_BIGNUM_TYPE_P(x)) {
3665 return !rb_big_eql(x, y);
3666 }
3667 else {
3668 return x != y;
3669 }
3670}
3671
3672static st_index_t
3673object_id_hash(st_data_t n)
3674{
3675 if (RB_BIGNUM_TYPE_P(n)) {
3676 return FIX2LONG(rb_big_hash(n));
3677 }
3678 else {
3679 return st_numhash(n);
3680 }
3681}
3682static const struct st_hash_type object_id_hash_type = {
3683 object_id_cmp,
3684 object_id_hash,
3685};
3686
3687void
3688Init_heap(void)
3689{
3690 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
3691
3692#if defined(HAVE_MMAP) && !defined(__wasm__) && !HAVE_CONST_PAGE_SIZE && !defined(PAGE_MAX_SIZE)
3693 /* Need to determine if we can use mmap at runtime. */
3694# ifdef PAGE_SIZE
3695 /* If the PAGE_SIZE macro can be used. */
3696 heap_page_alloc_use_mmap = PAGE_SIZE <= HEAP_PAGE_SIZE;
3697# elif defined(HAVE_SYSCONF) && defined(_SC_PAGE_SIZE)
3698 /* If we can use sysconf to determine the page size. */
3699 heap_page_alloc_use_mmap = sysconf(_SC_PAGE_SIZE) <= HEAP_PAGE_SIZE;
3700# else
3701 /* Otherwise we can't determine the system page size, so don't use mmap. */
3702 heap_page_alloc_use_mmap = FALSE;
3703# endif
3704#endif
3705
3706 objspace->next_object_id = INT2FIX(OBJ_ID_INITIAL);
3707 objspace->id_to_obj_tbl = st_init_table(&object_id_hash_type);
3708 objspace->obj_to_id_tbl = st_init_numtable();
3709
3710#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
3711 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit = gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_min;
3712#endif
3713
3714 heap_add_pages(objspace, &size_pools[0], SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[0]), gc_params.heap_init_slots / HEAP_PAGE_OBJ_LIMIT);
3715
3716 /* Give other size pools allocatable pages. */
3717 for (int i = 1; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
3718 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
3719 int multiple = size_pool->slot_size / BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
3720 size_pool->allocatable_pages = gc_params.heap_init_slots * multiple / HEAP_PAGE_OBJ_LIMIT;
3721 }
3722 heap_pages_expand_sorted(objspace);
3723
3724 init_mark_stack(&objspace->mark_stack);
3725
3726 objspace->profile.invoke_time = getrusage_time();
3727 finalizer_table = st_init_numtable();
3728}
3729
3730void
3731Init_gc_stress(void)
3732{
3733 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
3734
3735 gc_stress_set(objspace, ruby_initial_gc_stress);
3736}
3737
3738typedef int each_obj_callback(void *, void *, size_t, void *);
3739
3740static void objspace_each_objects(rb_objspace_t *objspace, each_obj_callback *callback, void *data, bool protected);
3741static void objspace_reachable_objects_from_root(rb_objspace_t *, void (func)(const char *, VALUE, void *), void *);
3742
3743struct each_obj_data {
3744 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
3745 bool reenable_incremental;
3746
3747 each_obj_callback *callback;
3748 void *data;
3749
3750 struct heap_page **pages[SIZE_POOL_COUNT];
3751 size_t pages_counts[SIZE_POOL_COUNT];
3752};
3753
3754static VALUE
3755objspace_each_objects_ensure(VALUE arg)
3756{
3757 struct each_obj_data *data = (struct each_obj_data *)arg;
3758 rb_objspace_t *objspace = data->objspace;
3759
3760 /* Reenable incremental GC */
3761 if (data->reenable_incremental) {
3762 objspace->flags.dont_incremental = FALSE;
3763 }
3764
3765 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
3766 struct heap_page **pages = data->pages[i];
3767 /* pages could be NULL if an error was raised during setup (e.g.
3768 * malloc failed due to out of memory). */
3769 if (pages) {
3770 free(pages);
3771 }
3772 }
3773
3774 return Qnil;
3775}
3776
3777static VALUE
3778objspace_each_objects_try(VALUE arg)
3779{
3780 struct each_obj_data *data = (struct each_obj_data *)arg;
3781 rb_objspace_t *objspace = data->objspace;
3782
3783 /* Copy pages from all size_pools to their respective buffers. */
3784 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
3785 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
3786 size_t size = size_mul_or_raise(SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->total_pages, sizeof(struct heap_page *), rb_eRuntimeError);
3787
3788 struct heap_page **pages = malloc(size);
3789 if (!pages) rb_memerror();
3790
3791 /* Set up pages buffer by iterating over all pages in the current eden
3792 * heap. This will be a snapshot of the state of the heap before we
3793 * call the callback over each page that exists in this buffer. Thus it
3794 * is safe for the callback to allocate objects without possibly entering
3795 * an infinite loop. */
3796 struct heap_page *page = 0;
3797 size_t pages_count = 0;
3798 ccan_list_for_each(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages, page, page_node) {
3799 pages[pages_count] = page;
3800 pages_count++;
3801 }
3802 data->pages[i] = pages;
3803 data->pages_counts[i] = pages_count;
3804 GC_ASSERT(pages_count == SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->total_pages);
3805 }
3806
3807 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
3808 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
3809 size_t pages_count = data->pages_counts[i];
3810 struct heap_page **pages = data->pages[i];
3811
3812 struct heap_page *page = ccan_list_top(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages, struct heap_page, page_node);
3813 for (size_t i = 0; i < pages_count; i++) {
3814 /* If we have reached the end of the linked list then there are no
3815 * more pages, so break. */
3816 if (page == NULL) break;
3817
3818 /* If this page does not match the one in the buffer, then move to
3819 * the next page in the buffer. */
3820 if (pages[i] != page) continue;
3821
3822 uintptr_t pstart = (uintptr_t)page->start;
3823 uintptr_t pend = pstart + (page->total_slots * size_pool->slot_size);
3824
3825 if ((*data->callback)((void *)pstart, (void *)pend, size_pool->slot_size, data->data)) {
3826 break;
3827 }
3828
3829 page = ccan_list_next(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages, page, page_node);
3830 }
3831 }
3832
3833 return Qnil;
3834}
3835
3836/*
3837 * rb_objspace_each_objects() is special C API to walk through
3838 * Ruby object space. This C API is too difficult to use it.
3839 * To be frank, you should not use it. Or you need to read the
3840 * source code of this function and understand what this function does.
3841 *
3842 * 'callback' will be called several times (the number of heap page,
3843 * at current implementation) with:
3844 * vstart: a pointer to the first living object of the heap_page.
3845 * vend: a pointer to next to the valid heap_page area.
3846 * stride: a distance to next VALUE.
3847 *
3848 * If callback() returns non-zero, the iteration will be stopped.
3849 *
3850 * This is a sample callback code to iterate liveness objects:
3851 *
3852 * int
3853 * sample_callback(void *vstart, void *vend, int stride, void *data) {
3854 * VALUE v = (VALUE)vstart;
3855 * for (; v != (VALUE)vend; v += stride) {
3856 * if (RBASIC(v)->flags) { // liveness check
3857 * // do something with live object 'v'
3858 * }
3859 * return 0; // continue to iteration
3860 * }
3861 *
3862 * Note: 'vstart' is not a top of heap_page. This point the first
3863 * living object to grasp at least one object to avoid GC issue.
3864 * This means that you can not walk through all Ruby object page
3865 * including freed object page.
3866 *
3867 * Note: On this implementation, 'stride' is the same as sizeof(RVALUE).
3868 * However, there are possibilities to pass variable values with
3869 * 'stride' with some reasons. You must use stride instead of
3870 * use some constant value in the iteration.
3871 */
3872void
3873rb_objspace_each_objects(each_obj_callback *callback, void *data)
3874{
3875 objspace_each_objects(&rb_objspace, callback, data, TRUE);
3876}
3877
3878static void
3879objspace_each_objects(rb_objspace_t *objspace, each_obj_callback *callback, void *data, bool protected)
3880{
3881 /* Disable incremental GC */
3882 bool reenable_incremental = FALSE;
3883 if (protected) {
3884 reenable_incremental = !objspace->flags.dont_incremental;
3885
3886 gc_rest(objspace);
3887 objspace->flags.dont_incremental = TRUE;
3888 }
3889
3890 struct each_obj_data each_obj_data = {
3891 .objspace = objspace,
3892 .reenable_incremental = reenable_incremental,
3893
3894 .callback = callback,
3895 .data = data,
3896
3897 .pages = {NULL},
3898 .pages_counts = {0},
3899 };
3900 rb_ensure(objspace_each_objects_try, (VALUE)&each_obj_data,
3901 objspace_each_objects_ensure, (VALUE)&each_obj_data);
3902}
3903
3904void
3905rb_objspace_each_objects_without_setup(each_obj_callback *callback, void *data)
3906{
3907 objspace_each_objects(&rb_objspace, callback, data, FALSE);
3908}
3909
3910struct os_each_struct {
3911 size_t num;
3912 VALUE of;
3913};
3914
3915static int
3916internal_object_p(VALUE obj)
3917{
3918 RVALUE *p = (RVALUE *)obj;
3919 void *ptr = __asan_region_is_poisoned(p, SIZEOF_VALUE);
3920 asan_unpoison_object(obj, false);
3921 bool used_p = p->as.basic.flags;
3922
3923 if (used_p) {
3924 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
3925 case T_NODE:
3926 UNEXPECTED_NODE(internal_object_p);
3927 break;
3928 case T_NONE:
3929 case T_MOVED:
3930 case T_IMEMO:
3931 case T_ICLASS:
3932 case T_ZOMBIE:
3933 break;
3934 case T_CLASS:
3935 if (!p->as.basic.klass) break;
3936 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_SINGLETON)) {
3937 return rb_singleton_class_internal_p(obj);
3938 }
3939 return 0;
3940 default:
3941 if (!p->as.basic.klass) break;
3942 return 0;
3943 }
3944 }
3945 if (ptr || ! used_p) {
3946 asan_poison_object(obj);
3947 }
3948 return 1;
3949}
3950
3951int
3952rb_objspace_internal_object_p(VALUE obj)
3953{
3954 return internal_object_p(obj);
3955}
3956
3957static int
3958os_obj_of_i(void *vstart, void *vend, size_t stride, void *data)
3959{
3960 struct os_each_struct *oes = (struct os_each_struct *)data;
3961
3962 VALUE v = (VALUE)vstart;
3963 for (; v != (VALUE)vend; v += stride) {
3964 if (!internal_object_p(v)) {
3965 if (!oes->of || rb_obj_is_kind_of(v, oes->of)) {
3966 if (!rb_multi_ractor_p() || rb_ractor_shareable_p(v)) {
3967 rb_yield(v);
3968 oes->num++;
3969 }
3970 }
3971 }
3972 }
3973
3974 return 0;
3975}
3976
3977static VALUE
3978os_obj_of(VALUE of)
3979{
3980 struct os_each_struct oes;
3981
3982 oes.num = 0;
3983 oes.of = of;
3984 rb_objspace_each_objects(os_obj_of_i, &oes);
3985 return SIZET2NUM(oes.num);
3986}
3987
3988/*
3989 * call-seq:
3990 * ObjectSpace.each_object([module]) {|obj| ... } -> integer
3991 * ObjectSpace.each_object([module]) -> an_enumerator
3992 *
3993 * Calls the block once for each living, nonimmediate object in this
3994 * Ruby process. If <i>module</i> is specified, calls the block
3995 * for only those classes or modules that match (or are a subclass of)
3996 * <i>module</i>. Returns the number of objects found. Immediate
3997 * objects (<code>Fixnum</code>s, <code>Symbol</code>s
3998 * <code>true</code>, <code>false</code>, and <code>nil</code>) are
3999 * never returned. In the example below, #each_object returns both
4000 * the numbers we defined and several constants defined in the Math
4001 * module.
4002 *
4003 * If no block is given, an enumerator is returned instead.
4004 *
4005 * a = 102.7
4006 * b = 95 # Won't be returned
4007 * c = 12345678987654321
4008 * count = ObjectSpace.each_object(Numeric) {|x| p x }
4009 * puts "Total count: #{count}"
4010 *
4011 * <em>produces:</em>
4012 *
4013 * 12345678987654321
4014 * 102.7
4015 * 2.71828182845905
4016 * 3.14159265358979
4017 * 2.22044604925031e-16
4018 * 1.7976931348623157e+308
4019 * 2.2250738585072e-308
4020 * Total count: 7
4021 *
4022 */
4023
4024static VALUE
4025os_each_obj(int argc, VALUE *argv, VALUE os)
4026{
4027 VALUE of;
4028
4029 of = (!rb_check_arity(argc, 0, 1) ? 0 : argv[0]);
4030 RETURN_ENUMERATOR(os, 1, &of);
4031 return os_obj_of(of);
4032}
4033
4034/*
4035 * call-seq:
4036 * ObjectSpace.undefine_finalizer(obj)
4037 *
4038 * Removes all finalizers for <i>obj</i>.
4039 *
4040 */
4041
4042static VALUE
4043undefine_final(VALUE os, VALUE obj)
4044{
4045 return rb_undefine_finalizer(obj);
4046}
4047
4048VALUE
4049rb_undefine_finalizer(VALUE obj)
4050{
4051 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4052 st_data_t data = obj;
4053 rb_check_frozen(obj);
4054 st_delete(finalizer_table, &data, 0);
4055 FL_UNSET(obj, FL_FINALIZE);
4056 return obj;
4057}
4058
4059static void
4060should_be_callable(VALUE block)
4061{
4062 if (!rb_obj_respond_to(block, idCall, TRUE)) {
4063 rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "wrong type argument %"PRIsVALUE" (should be callable)",
4064 rb_obj_class(block));
4065 }
4066}
4067
4068static void
4069should_be_finalizable(VALUE obj)
4070{
4071 if (!FL_ABLE(obj)) {
4072 rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "cannot define finalizer for %s",
4073 rb_obj_classname(obj));
4074 }
4075 rb_check_frozen(obj);
4076}
4077
4078/*
4079 * call-seq:
4080 * ObjectSpace.define_finalizer(obj, aProc=proc())
4081 *
4082 * Adds <i>aProc</i> as a finalizer, to be called after <i>obj</i>
4083 * was destroyed. The object ID of the <i>obj</i> will be passed
4084 * as an argument to <i>aProc</i>. If <i>aProc</i> is a lambda or
4085 * method, make sure it can be called with a single argument.
4086 *
4087 * The return value is an array <code>[0, aProc]</code>.
4088 *
4089 * The two recommended patterns are to either create the finaliser proc
4090 * in a non-instance method where it can safely capture the needed state,
4091 * or to use a custom callable object that stores the needed state
4092 * explicitly as instance variables.
4093 *
4094 * class Foo
4095 * def initialize(data_needed_for_finalization)
4096 * ObjectSpace.define_finalizer(self, self.class.create_finalizer(data_needed_for_finalization))
4097 * end
4098 *
4099 * def self.create_finalizer(data_needed_for_finalization)
4100 * proc {
4101 * puts "finalizing #{data_needed_for_finalization}"
4102 * }
4103 * end
4104 * end
4105 *
4106 * class Bar
4107 * class Remover
4108 * def initialize(data_needed_for_finalization)
4109 * @data_needed_for_finalization = data_needed_for_finalization
4110 * end
4111 *
4112 * def call(id)
4113 * puts "finalizing #{@data_needed_for_finalization}"
4114 * end
4115 * end
4116 *
4117 * def initialize(data_needed_for_finalization)
4118 * ObjectSpace.define_finalizer(self, Remover.new(data_needed_for_finalization))
4119 * end
4120 * end
4121 *
4122 * Note that if your finalizer references the object to be
4123 * finalized it will never be run on GC, although it will still be
4124 * run at exit. You will get a warning if you capture the object
4125 * to be finalized as the receiver of the finalizer.
4126 *
4127 * class CapturesSelf
4128 * def initialize(name)
4129 * ObjectSpace.define_finalizer(self, proc {
4130 * # this finalizer will only be run on exit
4131 * puts "finalizing #{name}"
4132 * })
4133 * end
4134 * end
4135 *
4136 * Also note that finalization can be unpredictable and is never guaranteed
4137 * to be run except on exit.
4138 */
4139
4140static VALUE
4141define_final(int argc, VALUE *argv, VALUE os)
4142{
4143 VALUE obj, block;
4144
4145 rb_scan_args(argc, argv, "11", &obj, &block);
4146 should_be_finalizable(obj);
4147 if (argc == 1) {
4148 block = rb_block_proc();
4149 }
4150 else {
4151 should_be_callable(block);
4152 }
4153
4154 if (rb_callable_receiver(block) == obj) {
4155 rb_warn("finalizer references object to be finalized");
4156 }
4157
4158 return define_final0(obj, block);
4159}
4160
4161static VALUE
4162define_final0(VALUE obj, VALUE block)
4163{
4164 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4165 VALUE table;
4166 st_data_t data;
4167
4168 RBASIC(obj)->flags |= FL_FINALIZE;
4169
4170 if (st_lookup(finalizer_table, obj, &data)) {
4171 table = (VALUE)data;
4172
4173 /* avoid duplicate block, table is usually small */
4174 {
4175 long len = RARRAY_LEN(table);
4176 long i;
4177
4178 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
4179 VALUE recv = RARRAY_AREF(table, i);
4180 if (rb_equal(recv, block)) {
4181 block = recv;
4182 goto end;
4183 }
4184 }
4185 }
4186
4187 rb_ary_push(table, block);
4188 }
4189 else {
4190 table = rb_ary_new3(1, block);
4191 RBASIC_CLEAR_CLASS(table);
4192 st_add_direct(finalizer_table, obj, table);
4193 }
4194 end:
4195 block = rb_ary_new3(2, INT2FIX(0), block);
4196 OBJ_FREEZE(block);
4197 return block;
4198}
4199
4200VALUE
4201rb_define_finalizer(VALUE obj, VALUE block)
4202{
4203 should_be_finalizable(obj);
4204 should_be_callable(block);
4205 return define_final0(obj, block);
4206}
4207
4208void
4209rb_gc_copy_finalizer(VALUE dest, VALUE obj)
4210{
4211 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4212 VALUE table;
4213 st_data_t data;
4214
4215 if (!FL_TEST(obj, FL_FINALIZE)) return;
4216 if (st_lookup(finalizer_table, obj, &data)) {
4217 table = (VALUE)data;
4218 st_insert(finalizer_table, dest, table);
4219 }
4220 FL_SET(dest, FL_FINALIZE);
4221}
4222
4223static VALUE
4224run_single_final(VALUE cmd, VALUE objid)
4225{
4226 return rb_check_funcall(cmd, idCall, 1, &objid);
4227}
4228
4229static void
4230warn_exception_in_finalizer(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE final)
4231{
4232 if (final != Qundef && !NIL_P(ruby_verbose)) {
4233 VALUE errinfo = ec->errinfo;
4234 rb_warn("Exception in finalizer %+"PRIsVALUE, final);
4235 rb_ec_error_print(ec, errinfo);
4236 }
4237}
4238
4239static void
4240run_finalizer(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj, VALUE table)
4241{
4242 long i;
4243 enum ruby_tag_type state;
4244 volatile struct {
4245 VALUE errinfo;
4246 VALUE objid;
4247 VALUE final;
4248 rb_control_frame_t *cfp;
4249 long finished;
4250 } saved;
4251 rb_execution_context_t * volatile ec = GET_EC();
4252#define RESTORE_FINALIZER() (\
4253 ec->cfp = saved.cfp, \
4254 ec->errinfo = saved.errinfo)
4255
4256 saved.errinfo = ec->errinfo;
4257 saved.objid = rb_obj_id(obj);
4258 saved.cfp = ec->cfp;
4259 saved.finished = 0;
4260 saved.final = Qundef;
4261
4262 EC_PUSH_TAG(ec);
4263 state = EC_EXEC_TAG();
4264 if (state != TAG_NONE) {
4265 ++saved.finished; /* skip failed finalizer */
4266 warn_exception_in_finalizer(ec, ATOMIC_VALUE_EXCHANGE(saved.final, Qundef));
4267 }
4268 for (i = saved.finished;
4269 RESTORE_FINALIZER(), i<RARRAY_LEN(table);
4270 saved.finished = ++i) {
4271 run_single_final(saved.final = RARRAY_AREF(table, i), saved.objid);
4272 }
4273 EC_POP_TAG();
4274#undef RESTORE_FINALIZER
4275}
4276
4277static void
4278run_final(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE zombie)
4279{
4280 st_data_t key, table;
4281
4282 if (RZOMBIE(zombie)->dfree) {
4283 RZOMBIE(zombie)->dfree(RZOMBIE(zombie)->data);
4284 }
4285
4286 key = (st_data_t)zombie;
4287 if (st_delete(finalizer_table, &key, &table)) {
4288 run_finalizer(objspace, zombie, (VALUE)table);
4289 }
4290}
4291
4292static void
4293finalize_list(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE zombie)
4294{
4295 while (zombie) {
4296 VALUE next_zombie;
4297 struct heap_page *page;
4298 asan_unpoison_object(zombie, false);
4299 next_zombie = RZOMBIE(zombie)->next;
4300 page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(zombie);
4301
4302 run_final(objspace, zombie);
4303
4304 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
4305 {
4306 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(zombie) == T_ZOMBIE);
4307 if (FL_TEST(zombie, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID)) {
4308 obj_free_object_id(objspace, zombie);
4309 }
4310
4311 GC_ASSERT(heap_pages_final_slots > 0);
4312 GC_ASSERT(page->final_slots > 0);
4313
4314 heap_pages_final_slots--;
4315 page->final_slots--;
4316 page->free_slots++;
4317 heap_page_add_freeobj(objspace, page, zombie);
4318 objspace->profile.total_freed_objects++;
4319 }
4320 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
4321
4322 zombie = next_zombie;
4323 }
4324}
4325
4326static void
4327finalize_deferred_heap_pages(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
4328{
4329 VALUE zombie;
4330 while ((zombie = ATOMIC_VALUE_EXCHANGE(heap_pages_deferred_final, 0)) != 0) {
4331 finalize_list(objspace, zombie);
4332 }
4333}
4334
4335static void
4336finalize_deferred(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
4337{
4338 rb_execution_context_t *ec = GET_EC();
4339 ec->interrupt_mask |= PENDING_INTERRUPT_MASK;
4340 finalize_deferred_heap_pages(objspace);
4341 ec->interrupt_mask &= ~PENDING_INTERRUPT_MASK;
4342}
4343
4344static void
4345gc_finalize_deferred(void *dmy)
4346{
4347 rb_objspace_t *objspace = dmy;
4348 if (ATOMIC_EXCHANGE(finalizing, 1)) return;
4349
4350 finalize_deferred(objspace);
4351 ATOMIC_SET(finalizing, 0);
4352}
4353
4354static void
4355gc_finalize_deferred_register(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
4356{
4357 if (rb_postponed_job_register_one(0, gc_finalize_deferred, objspace) == 0) {
4358 rb_bug("gc_finalize_deferred_register: can't register finalizer.");
4359 }
4360}
4361
4362struct force_finalize_list {
4363 VALUE obj;
4364 VALUE table;
4365 struct force_finalize_list *next;
4366};
4367
4368static int
4369force_chain_object(st_data_t key, st_data_t val, st_data_t arg)
4370{
4371 struct force_finalize_list **prev = (struct force_finalize_list **)arg;
4372 struct force_finalize_list *curr = ALLOC(struct force_finalize_list);
4373 curr->obj = key;
4374 curr->table = val;
4375 curr->next = *prev;
4376 *prev = curr;
4377 return ST_CONTINUE;
4378}
4379
4380bool rb_obj_is_main_ractor(VALUE gv);
4381
4382void
4383rb_objspace_call_finalizer(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
4384{
4385 size_t i;
4386
4387#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
4388 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
4389#endif
4390 gc_rest(objspace);
4391
4392 if (ATOMIC_EXCHANGE(finalizing, 1)) return;
4393
4394 /* run finalizers */
4395 finalize_deferred(objspace);
4396 GC_ASSERT(heap_pages_deferred_final == 0);
4397
4398 gc_rest(objspace);
4399 /* prohibit incremental GC */
4400 objspace->flags.dont_incremental = 1;
4401
4402 /* force to run finalizer */
4403 while (finalizer_table->num_entries) {
4404 struct force_finalize_list *list = 0;
4405 st_foreach(finalizer_table, force_chain_object, (st_data_t)&list);
4406 while (list) {
4407 struct force_finalize_list *curr = list;
4408 st_data_t obj = (st_data_t)curr->obj;
4409 run_finalizer(objspace, curr->obj, curr->table);
4410 st_delete(finalizer_table, &obj, 0);
4411 list = curr->next;
4412 xfree(curr);
4413 }
4414 }
4415
4416 /* prohibit GC because force T_DATA finalizers can break an object graph consistency */
4417 dont_gc_on();
4418
4419 /* running data/file finalizers are part of garbage collection */
4420 unsigned int lock_lev;
4421 gc_enter(objspace, gc_enter_event_finalizer, &lock_lev);
4422
4423 /* run data/file object's finalizers */
4424 for (i = 0; i < heap_allocated_pages; i++) {
4425 struct heap_page *page = heap_pages_sorted[i];
4426 short stride = page->slot_size;
4427
4428 uintptr_t p = (uintptr_t)page->start;
4429 uintptr_t pend = p + page->total_slots * stride;
4430 for (; p < pend; p += stride) {
4431 VALUE vp = (VALUE)p;
4432 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(vp);
4433 asan_unpoison_object(vp, false);
4434 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(vp)) {
4435 case T_DATA:
4436 if (!DATA_PTR(p) || !RANY(p)->as.data.dfree) break;
4437 if (rb_obj_is_thread(vp)) break;
4438 if (rb_obj_is_mutex(vp)) break;
4439 if (rb_obj_is_fiber(vp)) break;
4440 if (rb_obj_is_main_ractor(vp)) break;
4441 if (RTYPEDDATA_P(vp)) {
4442 RDATA(p)->dfree = RANY(p)->as.typeddata.type->function.dfree;
4443 }
4444 RANY(p)->as.free.flags = 0;
4445 if (RANY(p)->as.data.dfree == RUBY_DEFAULT_FREE) {
4446 xfree(DATA_PTR(p));
4447 }
4448 else if (RANY(p)->as.data.dfree) {
4449 make_zombie(objspace, vp, RANY(p)->as.data.dfree, RANY(p)->as.data.data);
4450 }
4451 break;
4452 case T_FILE:
4453 if (RANY(p)->as.file.fptr) {
4454 make_io_zombie(objspace, vp);
4455 }
4456 break;
4457 default:
4458 break;
4459 }
4460 if (poisoned) {
4461 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(vp) == T_NONE);
4462 asan_poison_object(vp);
4463 }
4464 }
4465 }
4466
4467 gc_exit(objspace, gc_enter_event_finalizer, &lock_lev);
4468
4469 finalize_deferred_heap_pages(objspace);
4470
4471 st_free_table(finalizer_table);
4472 finalizer_table = 0;
4473 ATOMIC_SET(finalizing, 0);
4474}
4475
4476static inline int
4477is_swept_object(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE ptr)
4478{
4479 struct heap_page *page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(ptr);
4480 return page->flags.before_sweep ? FALSE : TRUE;
4481}
4482
4483/* garbage objects will be collected soon. */
4484static inline int
4485is_garbage_object(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE ptr)
4486{
4487 if (!is_lazy_sweeping(objspace) ||
4488 is_swept_object(objspace, ptr) ||
4489 MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(ptr), ptr)) {
4490
4491 return FALSE;
4492 }
4493 else {
4494 return TRUE;
4495 }
4496}
4497
4498static inline int
4499is_live_object(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE ptr)
4500{
4501 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(ptr)) {
4502 case T_NONE:
4503 case T_MOVED:
4504 case T_ZOMBIE:
4505 return FALSE;
4506 default:
4507 break;
4508 }
4509
4510 if (!is_garbage_object(objspace, ptr)) {
4511 return TRUE;
4512 }
4513 else {
4514 return FALSE;
4515 }
4516}
4517
4518static inline int
4519is_markable_object(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
4520{
4521 if (rb_special_const_p(obj)) return FALSE; /* special const is not markable */
4522 check_rvalue_consistency(obj);
4523 return TRUE;
4524}
4525
4526int
4527rb_objspace_markable_object_p(VALUE obj)
4528{
4529 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4530 return is_markable_object(objspace, obj) && is_live_object(objspace, obj);
4531}
4532
4533int
4534rb_objspace_garbage_object_p(VALUE obj)
4535{
4536 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4537 return is_garbage_object(objspace, obj);
4538}
4539
4540static VALUE
4541id2ref_obj_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE objid)
4542{
4543 VALUE orig;
4544 if (st_lookup(objspace->id_to_obj_tbl, objid, &orig)) {
4545 return orig;
4546 }
4547 else {
4548 return Qundef;
4549 }
4550}
4551
4552/*
4553 * call-seq:
4554 * ObjectSpace._id2ref(object_id) -> an_object
4555 *
4556 * Converts an object id to a reference to the object. May not be
4557 * called on an object id passed as a parameter to a finalizer.
4558 *
4559 * s = "I am a string" #=> "I am a string"
4560 * r = ObjectSpace._id2ref(s.object_id) #=> "I am a string"
4561 * r == s #=> true
4562 *
4563 * On multi-ractor mode, if the object is not shareable, it raises
4564 * RangeError.
4565 */
4566
4567static VALUE
4568id2ref(VALUE objid)
4569{
4570#if SIZEOF_LONG == SIZEOF_VOIDP
4571#define NUM2PTR(x) NUM2ULONG(x)
4572#elif SIZEOF_LONG_LONG == SIZEOF_VOIDP
4573#define NUM2PTR(x) NUM2ULL(x)
4574#endif
4575 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4576 VALUE ptr;
4577 VALUE orig;
4578 void *p0;
4579
4580 objid = rb_to_int(objid);
4581 if (FIXNUM_P(objid) || rb_big_size(objid) <= SIZEOF_VOIDP) {
4582 ptr = NUM2PTR(objid);
4583 if (ptr == Qtrue) return Qtrue;
4584 if (ptr == Qfalse) return Qfalse;
4585 if (NIL_P(ptr)) return Qnil;
4586 if (FIXNUM_P(ptr)) return (VALUE)ptr;
4587 if (FLONUM_P(ptr)) return (VALUE)ptr;
4588
4589 ptr = obj_id_to_ref(objid);
4590 if ((ptr % sizeof(RVALUE)) == (4 << 2)) {
4591 ID symid = ptr / sizeof(RVALUE);
4592 p0 = (void *)ptr;
4593 if (rb_id2str(symid) == 0)
4594 rb_raise(rb_eRangeError, "%p is not symbol id value", p0);
4595 return ID2SYM(symid);
4596 }
4597 }
4598
4599 if ((orig = id2ref_obj_tbl(objspace, objid)) != Qundef &&
4600 is_live_object(objspace, orig)) {
4601
4602 if (!rb_multi_ractor_p() || rb_ractor_shareable_p(orig)) {
4603 return orig;
4604 }
4605 else {
4606 rb_raise(rb_eRangeError, "%+"PRIsVALUE" is id of the unshareable object on multi-ractor", rb_int2str(objid, 10));
4607 }
4608 }
4609
4610 if (rb_int_ge(objid, objspace->next_object_id)) {
4611 rb_raise(rb_eRangeError, "%+"PRIsVALUE" is not id value", rb_int2str(objid, 10));
4612 }
4613 else {
4614 rb_raise(rb_eRangeError, "%+"PRIsVALUE" is recycled object", rb_int2str(objid, 10));
4615 }
4616}
4617
4618static VALUE
4619os_id2ref(VALUE os, VALUE objid)
4620{
4621 return id2ref(objid);
4622}
4623
4624static VALUE
4625rb_find_object_id(VALUE obj, VALUE (*get_heap_object_id)(VALUE))
4626{
4627 if (STATIC_SYM_P(obj)) {
4628 return (SYM2ID(obj) * sizeof(RVALUE) + (4 << 2)) | FIXNUM_FLAG;
4629 }
4630 else if (FLONUM_P(obj)) {
4631#if SIZEOF_LONG == SIZEOF_VOIDP
4632 return LONG2NUM((SIGNED_VALUE)obj);
4633#else
4634 return LL2NUM((SIGNED_VALUE)obj);
4635#endif
4636 }
4637 else if (SPECIAL_CONST_P(obj)) {
4638 return LONG2NUM((SIGNED_VALUE)obj);
4639 }
4640
4641 return get_heap_object_id(obj);
4642}
4643
4644static VALUE
4645cached_object_id(VALUE obj)
4646{
4647 VALUE id;
4648 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4649
4650 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
4651 if (st_lookup(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, (st_data_t)obj, &id)) {
4652 GC_ASSERT(FL_TEST(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID));
4653 }
4654 else {
4655 GC_ASSERT(!FL_TEST(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID));
4656
4657 id = objspace->next_object_id;
4658 objspace->next_object_id = rb_int_plus(id, INT2FIX(OBJ_ID_INCREMENT));
4659
4660 VALUE already_disabled = rb_gc_disable_no_rest();
4661 st_insert(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, (st_data_t)obj, (st_data_t)id);
4662 st_insert(objspace->id_to_obj_tbl, (st_data_t)id, (st_data_t)obj);
4663 if (already_disabled == Qfalse) rb_objspace_gc_enable(objspace);
4664 FL_SET(obj, FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID);
4665 }
4666 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
4667
4668 return id;
4669}
4670
4671static VALUE
4672nonspecial_obj_id_(VALUE obj)
4673{
4674 return nonspecial_obj_id(obj);
4675}
4676
4677
4678VALUE
4679rb_memory_id(VALUE obj)
4680{
4681 return rb_find_object_id(obj, nonspecial_obj_id_);
4682}
4683
4684/*
4685 * Document-method: __id__
4686 * Document-method: object_id
4687 *
4688 * call-seq:
4689 * obj.__id__ -> integer
4690 * obj.object_id -> integer
4691 *
4692 * Returns an integer identifier for +obj+.
4693 *
4694 * The same number will be returned on all calls to +object_id+ for a given
4695 * object, and no two active objects will share an id.
4696 *
4697 * Note: that some objects of builtin classes are reused for optimization.
4698 * This is the case for immediate values and frozen string literals.
4699 *
4700 * BasicObject implements +__id__+, Kernel implements +object_id+.
4701 *
4702 * Immediate values are not passed by reference but are passed by value:
4703 * +nil+, +true+, +false+, Fixnums, Symbols, and some Floats.
4704 *
4705 * Object.new.object_id == Object.new.object_id # => false
4706 * (21 * 2).object_id == (21 * 2).object_id # => true
4707 * "hello".object_id == "hello".object_id # => false
4708 * "hi".freeze.object_id == "hi".freeze.object_id # => true
4709 */
4710
4711VALUE
4712rb_obj_id(VALUE obj)
4713{
4714 /*
4715 * 32-bit VALUE space
4716 * MSB ------------------------ LSB
4717 * false 00000000000000000000000000000000
4718 * true 00000000000000000000000000000010
4719 * nil 00000000000000000000000000000100
4720 * undef 00000000000000000000000000000110
4721 * symbol ssssssssssssssssssssssss00001110
4722 * object oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo00 = 0 (mod sizeof(RVALUE))
4723 * fixnum fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff1
4724 *
4725 * object_id space
4726 * LSB
4727 * false 00000000000000000000000000000000
4728 * true 00000000000000000000000000000010
4729 * nil 00000000000000000000000000000100
4730 * undef 00000000000000000000000000000110
4731 * symbol 000SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS0 S...S % A = 4 (S...S = s...s * A + 4)
4732 * object oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo0 o...o % A = 0
4733 * fixnum fffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff1 bignum if required
4734 *
4735 * where A = sizeof(RVALUE)/4
4736 *
4737 * sizeof(RVALUE) is
4738 * 20 if 32-bit, double is 4-byte aligned
4739 * 24 if 32-bit, double is 8-byte aligned
4740 * 40 if 64-bit
4741 */
4742
4743 return rb_find_object_id(obj, cached_object_id);
4744}
4745
4746static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
4747cc_table_memsize_i(VALUE ccs_ptr, void *data_ptr)
4748{
4749 size_t *total_size = data_ptr;
4750 struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs = (struct rb_class_cc_entries *)ccs_ptr;
4751 *total_size += sizeof(*ccs);
4752 *total_size += sizeof(ccs->entries[0]) * ccs->capa;
4753 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
4754}
4755
4756static size_t
4757cc_table_memsize(struct rb_id_table *cc_table)
4758{
4759 size_t total = rb_id_table_memsize(cc_table);
4760 rb_id_table_foreach_values(cc_table, cc_table_memsize_i, &total);
4761 return total;
4762}
4763
4764static size_t
4765obj_memsize_of(VALUE obj, int use_all_types)
4766{
4767 size_t size = 0;
4768
4769 if (SPECIAL_CONST_P(obj)) {
4770 return 0;
4771 }
4772
4773 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_EXIVAR)) {
4774 size += rb_generic_ivar_memsize(obj);
4775 }
4776
4777 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
4778 case T_OBJECT:
4779 if (!(RBASIC(obj)->flags & ROBJECT_EMBED)) {
4780 size += ROBJECT_NUMIV(obj) * sizeof(VALUE);
4781 }
4782 break;
4783 case T_MODULE:
4784 case T_CLASS:
4785 if (RCLASS_EXT(obj)) {
4786 if (RCLASS_M_TBL(obj)) {
4787 size += rb_id_table_memsize(RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
4788 }
4789 if (RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj)) {
4790 size += st_memsize(RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj));
4791 }
4792 if (RCLASS_CVC_TBL(obj)) {
4793 size += rb_id_table_memsize(RCLASS_CVC_TBL(obj));
4794 }
4795 if (RCLASS_IV_INDEX_TBL(obj)) {
4796 // TODO: more correct value
4797 size += st_memsize(RCLASS_IV_INDEX_TBL(obj));
4798 }
4799 if (RCLASS_EXT(obj)->iv_tbl) {
4800 size += st_memsize(RCLASS_EXT(obj)->iv_tbl);
4801 }
4802 if (RCLASS_EXT(obj)->const_tbl) {
4803 size += rb_id_table_memsize(RCLASS_EXT(obj)->const_tbl);
4804 }
4805 if (RCLASS_CC_TBL(obj)) {
4806 size += cc_table_memsize(RCLASS_CC_TBL(obj));
4807 }
4808 if (FL_TEST_RAW(obj, RCLASS_SUPERCLASSES_INCLUDE_SELF)) {
4809 size += (RCLASS_SUPERCLASS_DEPTH(obj) + 1) * sizeof(VALUE);
4810 }
4811#if !USE_RVARGC
4812 size += sizeof(rb_classext_t);
4813#endif
4814 }
4815 break;
4816 case T_ICLASS:
4817 if (RICLASS_OWNS_M_TBL_P(obj)) {
4818 if (RCLASS_M_TBL(obj)) {
4819 size += rb_id_table_memsize(RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
4820 }
4821 }
4822 if (RCLASS_EXT(obj) && RCLASS_CC_TBL(obj)) {
4823 size += cc_table_memsize(RCLASS_CC_TBL(obj));
4824 }
4825 break;
4826 case T_STRING:
4827 size += rb_str_memsize(obj);
4828 break;
4829 case T_ARRAY:
4830 size += rb_ary_memsize(obj);
4831 break;
4832 case T_HASH:
4833 if (RHASH_AR_TABLE_P(obj)) {
4834 if (RHASH_AR_TABLE(obj) != NULL) {
4835 size_t rb_hash_ar_table_size(void);
4836 size += rb_hash_ar_table_size();
4837 }
4838 }
4839 else {
4840 VM_ASSERT(RHASH_ST_TABLE(obj) != NULL);
4841 size += st_memsize(RHASH_ST_TABLE(obj));
4842 }
4843 break;
4844 case T_REGEXP:
4845 if (RREGEXP_PTR(obj)) {
4846 size += onig_memsize(RREGEXP_PTR(obj));
4847 }
4848 break;
4849 case T_DATA:
4850 if (use_all_types) size += rb_objspace_data_type_memsize(obj);
4851 break;
4852 case T_MATCH:
4853 if (RMATCH(obj)->rmatch) {
4854 struct rmatch *rm = RMATCH(obj)->rmatch;
4855 size += onig_region_memsize(&rm->regs);
4856 size += sizeof(struct rmatch_offset) * rm->char_offset_num_allocated;
4857 size += sizeof(struct rmatch);
4858 }
4859 break;
4860 case T_FILE:
4861 if (RFILE(obj)->fptr) {
4862 size += rb_io_memsize(RFILE(obj)->fptr);
4863 }
4864 break;
4865 case T_RATIONAL:
4866 case T_COMPLEX:
4867 break;
4868 case T_IMEMO:
4869 size += imemo_memsize(obj);
4870 break;
4871
4872 case T_FLOAT:
4873 case T_SYMBOL:
4874 break;
4875
4876 case T_BIGNUM:
4877 if (!(RBASIC(obj)->flags & BIGNUM_EMBED_FLAG) && BIGNUM_DIGITS(obj)) {
4878 size += BIGNUM_LEN(obj) * sizeof(BDIGIT);
4879 }
4880 break;
4881
4882 case T_NODE:
4883 UNEXPECTED_NODE(obj_memsize_of);
4884 break;
4885
4886 case T_STRUCT:
4887 if ((RBASIC(obj)->flags & RSTRUCT_EMBED_LEN_MASK) == 0 &&
4888 RSTRUCT(obj)->as.heap.ptr) {
4889 size += sizeof(VALUE) * RSTRUCT_LEN(obj);
4890 }
4891 break;
4892
4893 case T_ZOMBIE:
4894 case T_MOVED:
4895 break;
4896
4897 default:
4898 rb_bug("objspace/memsize_of(): unknown data type 0x%x(%p)",
4899 BUILTIN_TYPE(obj), (void*)obj);
4900 }
4901
4902 return size + GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj)->slot_size;
4903}
4904
4905size_t
4906rb_obj_memsize_of(VALUE obj)
4907{
4908 return obj_memsize_of(obj, TRUE);
4909}
4910
4911static int
4912set_zero(st_data_t key, st_data_t val, st_data_t arg)
4913{
4914 VALUE k = (VALUE)key;
4915 VALUE hash = (VALUE)arg;
4916 rb_hash_aset(hash, k, INT2FIX(0));
4917 return ST_CONTINUE;
4918}
4919
4920static VALUE
4921type_sym(size_t type)
4922{
4923 switch (type) {
4924#define COUNT_TYPE(t) case (t): return ID2SYM(rb_intern(#t)); break;
4925 COUNT_TYPE(T_NONE);
4926 COUNT_TYPE(T_OBJECT);
4927 COUNT_TYPE(T_CLASS);
4928 COUNT_TYPE(T_MODULE);
4929 COUNT_TYPE(T_FLOAT);
4930 COUNT_TYPE(T_STRING);
4931 COUNT_TYPE(T_REGEXP);
4932 COUNT_TYPE(T_ARRAY);
4933 COUNT_TYPE(T_HASH);
4934 COUNT_TYPE(T_STRUCT);
4935 COUNT_TYPE(T_BIGNUM);
4936 COUNT_TYPE(T_FILE);
4937 COUNT_TYPE(T_DATA);
4938 COUNT_TYPE(T_MATCH);
4939 COUNT_TYPE(T_COMPLEX);
4940 COUNT_TYPE(T_RATIONAL);
4941 COUNT_TYPE(T_NIL);
4942 COUNT_TYPE(T_TRUE);
4943 COUNT_TYPE(T_FALSE);
4944 COUNT_TYPE(T_SYMBOL);
4945 COUNT_TYPE(T_FIXNUM);
4946 COUNT_TYPE(T_IMEMO);
4947 COUNT_TYPE(T_UNDEF);
4948 COUNT_TYPE(T_NODE);
4949 COUNT_TYPE(T_ICLASS);
4950 COUNT_TYPE(T_ZOMBIE);
4951 COUNT_TYPE(T_MOVED);
4952#undef COUNT_TYPE
4953 default: return SIZET2NUM(type); break;
4954 }
4955}
4956
4957/*
4958 * call-seq:
4959 * ObjectSpace.count_objects([result_hash]) -> hash
4960 *
4961 * Counts all objects grouped by type.
4962 *
4963 * It returns a hash, such as:
4964 * {
4965 * :TOTAL=>10000,
4966 * :FREE=>3011,
4967 * :T_OBJECT=>6,
4968 * :T_CLASS=>404,
4969 * # ...
4970 * }
4971 *
4972 * The contents of the returned hash are implementation specific.
4973 * It may be changed in future.
4974 *
4975 * The keys starting with +:T_+ means live objects.
4976 * For example, +:T_ARRAY+ is the number of arrays.
4977 * +:FREE+ means object slots which is not used now.
4978 * +:TOTAL+ means sum of above.
4979 *
4980 * If the optional argument +result_hash+ is given,
4981 * it is overwritten and returned. This is intended to avoid probe effect.
4982 *
4983 * h = {}
4984 * ObjectSpace.count_objects(h)
4985 * puts h
4986 * # => { :TOTAL=>10000, :T_CLASS=>158280, :T_MODULE=>20672, :T_STRING=>527249 }
4987 *
4988 * This method is only expected to work on C Ruby.
4989 *
4990 */
4991
4992static VALUE
4993count_objects(int argc, VALUE *argv, VALUE os)
4994{
4995 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
4996 size_t counts[T_MASK+1];
4997 size_t freed = 0;
4998 size_t total = 0;
4999 size_t i;
5000 VALUE hash = Qnil;
5001
5002 if (rb_check_arity(argc, 0, 1) == 1) {
5003 hash = argv[0];
5004 if (!RB_TYPE_P(hash, T_HASH))
5005 rb_raise(rb_eTypeError, "non-hash given");
5006 }
5007
5008 for (i = 0; i <= T_MASK; i++) {
5009 counts[i] = 0;
5010 }
5011
5012 for (i = 0; i < heap_allocated_pages; i++) {
5013 struct heap_page *page = heap_pages_sorted[i];
5014 short stride = page->slot_size;
5015
5016 uintptr_t p = (uintptr_t)page->start;
5017 uintptr_t pend = p + page->total_slots * stride;
5018 for (;p < pend; p += stride) {
5019 VALUE vp = (VALUE)p;
5020 GC_ASSERT((NUM_IN_PAGE(vp) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE) % page->slot_size == 0);
5021
5022 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(vp);
5023 asan_unpoison_object(vp, false);
5024 if (RANY(p)->as.basic.flags) {
5025 counts[BUILTIN_TYPE(vp)]++;
5026 }
5027 else {
5028 freed++;
5029 }
5030 if (poisoned) {
5031 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(vp) == T_NONE);
5032 asan_poison_object(vp);
5033 }
5034 }
5035 total += page->total_slots;
5036 }
5037
5038 if (NIL_P(hash)) {
5039 hash = rb_hash_new();
5040 }
5041 else if (!RHASH_EMPTY_P(hash)) {
5042 rb_hash_stlike_foreach(hash, set_zero, hash);
5043 }
5044 rb_hash_aset(hash, ID2SYM(rb_intern("TOTAL")), SIZET2NUM(total));
5045 rb_hash_aset(hash, ID2SYM(rb_intern("FREE")), SIZET2NUM(freed));
5046
5047 for (i = 0; i <= T_MASK; i++) {
5048 VALUE type = type_sym(i);
5049 if (counts[i])
5050 rb_hash_aset(hash, type, SIZET2NUM(counts[i]));
5051 }
5052
5053 return hash;
5054}
5055
5056/*
5057 ------------------------ Garbage Collection ------------------------
5058*/
5059
5060/* Sweeping */
5061
5062static size_t
5063objspace_available_slots(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5064{
5065 size_t total_slots = 0;
5066 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5067 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5068 total_slots += SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->total_slots;
5069 total_slots += SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(size_pool)->total_slots;
5070 }
5071 return total_slots;
5072}
5073
5074static size_t
5075objspace_live_slots(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5076{
5077 return (objspace->total_allocated_objects - objspace->profile.total_freed_objects) - heap_pages_final_slots;
5078}
5079
5080static size_t
5081objspace_free_slots(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5082{
5083 return objspace_available_slots(objspace) - objspace_live_slots(objspace) - heap_pages_final_slots;
5084}
5085
5086static void
5087gc_setup_mark_bits(struct heap_page *page)
5088{
5089 /* copy oldgen bitmap to mark bitmap */
5090 memcpy(&page->mark_bits[0], &page->uncollectible_bits[0], HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_SIZE);
5091}
5092
5093static int gc_is_moveable_obj(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj);
5094static VALUE gc_move(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE scan, VALUE free, size_t slot_size);
5095
5096static void
5097lock_page_body(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page_body *body)
5098{
5099#if defined(_WIN32)
5100 DWORD old_protect;
5101
5102 if (!VirtualProtect(body, HEAP_PAGE_SIZE, PAGE_NOACCESS, &old_protect)) {
5103#else
5104 if (mprotect(body, HEAP_PAGE_SIZE, PROT_NONE)) {
5105#endif
5106 rb_bug("Couldn't protect page %p, errno: %s", (void *)body, strerror(errno));
5107 }
5108 else {
5109 gc_report(5, objspace, "Protecting page in move %p\n", (void *)body);
5110 }
5111}
5112
5113static void
5114unlock_page_body(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page_body *body)
5115{
5116#if defined(_WIN32)
5117 DWORD old_protect;
5118
5119 if (!VirtualProtect(body, HEAP_PAGE_SIZE, PAGE_READWRITE, &old_protect)) {
5120#else
5121 if (mprotect(body, HEAP_PAGE_SIZE, PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE)) {
5122#endif
5123 rb_bug("Couldn't unprotect page %p, errno: %s", (void *)body, strerror(errno));
5124 }
5125 else {
5126 gc_report(5, objspace, "Unprotecting page in move %p\n", (void *)body);
5127 }
5128}
5129
5130static bool
5131try_move(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap, struct heap_page *free_page, VALUE src)
5132{
5133 if (!free_page) {
5134 return false;
5135 }
5136
5137 /* We should return true if either src is successfully moved, or src is
5138 * unmoveable. A false return will cause the sweeping cursor to be
5139 * incremented to the next page, and src will attempt to move again */
5140 if (gc_is_moveable_obj(objspace, src)) {
5141 GC_ASSERT(MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(src), src));
5142
5143 VALUE dest = (VALUE)free_page->freelist;
5144 asan_unpoison_object(dest, false);
5145 if (!dest) {
5146 /* if we can't get something from the freelist then the page must be
5147 * full */
5148 return false;
5149 }
5150 free_page->freelist = RANY(dest)->as.free.next;
5151
5152 GC_ASSERT(RB_BUILTIN_TYPE(dest) == T_NONE);
5153 GC_ASSERT(free_page->slot_size == GET_HEAP_PAGE(src)->slot_size);
5154
5155 objspace->rcompactor.moved_count_table[BUILTIN_TYPE(src)]++;
5156 objspace->rcompactor.total_moved++;
5157
5158 gc_move(objspace, src, dest, free_page->slot_size);
5159 gc_pin(objspace, src);
5160 free_page->free_slots--;
5161 }
5162
5163 return true;
5164}
5165
5166static void
5167gc_unprotect_pages(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap)
5168{
5169 struct heap_page *cursor = heap->compact_cursor;
5170
5171 while (cursor) {
5172 unlock_page_body(objspace, GET_PAGE_BODY(cursor->start));
5173 cursor = ccan_list_next(&heap->pages, cursor, page_node);
5174 }
5175}
5176
5177static void gc_update_references(rb_objspace_t * objspace);
5178static void invalidate_moved_page(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page *page);
5179
5180#ifndef GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
5181#if defined(__wasi__) /* WebAssembly doesn't support signals */
5182# define GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED 0
5183#else
5184# define GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED 1
5185#endif
5186#endif
5187
5188#if GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
5189static void
5190read_barrier_handler(uintptr_t address)
5191{
5192 VALUE obj;
5193 rb_objspace_t * objspace = &rb_objspace;
5194
5195 address -= address % BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5196
5197 obj = (VALUE)address;
5198
5199 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
5200 {
5201 unlock_page_body(objspace, GET_PAGE_BODY(obj));
5202
5203 objspace->profile.read_barrier_faults++;
5204
5205 invalidate_moved_page(objspace, GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj));
5206 }
5207 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
5208}
5209#endif
5210
5211#if !GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
5212static void
5213uninstall_handlers(void)
5214{
5215 /* no-op */
5216}
5217
5218static void
5219install_handlers(void)
5220{
5221 /* no-op */
5222}
5223#elif defined(_WIN32)
5224static LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER old_handler;
5225typedef void (*signal_handler)(int);
5226static signal_handler old_sigsegv_handler;
5227
5228static LONG WINAPI
5229read_barrier_signal(EXCEPTION_POINTERS * info)
5230{
5231 /* EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION is what's raised by access to protected pages */
5232 if (info->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode == EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION) {
5233 /* > The second array element specifies the virtual address of the inaccessible data.
5234 * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/winnt/ns-winnt-exception_record
5235 *
5236 * Use this address to invalidate the page */
5237 read_barrier_handler((uintptr_t)info->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionInformation[1]);
5238 return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_EXECUTION;
5239 }
5240 else {
5241 return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
5242 }
5243}
5244
5245static void
5246uninstall_handlers(void)
5247{
5248 signal(SIGSEGV, old_sigsegv_handler);
5249 SetUnhandledExceptionFilter(old_handler);
5250}
5251
5252static void
5253install_handlers(void)
5254{
5255 /* Remove SEGV handler so that the Unhandled Exception Filter handles it */
5256 old_sigsegv_handler = signal(SIGSEGV, NULL);
5257 /* Unhandled Exception Filter has access to the violation address similar
5258 * to si_addr from sigaction */
5259 old_handler = SetUnhandledExceptionFilter(read_barrier_signal);
5260}
5261#else
5262static struct sigaction old_sigbus_handler;
5263static struct sigaction old_sigsegv_handler;
5264
5265static void
5266read_barrier_signal(int sig, siginfo_t * info, void * data)
5267{
5268 // setup SEGV/BUS handlers for errors
5269 struct sigaction prev_sigbus, prev_sigsegv;
5270 sigaction(SIGBUS, &old_sigbus_handler, &prev_sigbus);
5271 sigaction(SIGSEGV, &old_sigsegv_handler, &prev_sigsegv);
5272
5273 // enable SIGBUS/SEGV
5274 sigset_t set, prev_set;
5275 sigemptyset(&set);
5276 sigaddset(&set, SIGBUS);
5277 sigaddset(&set, SIGSEGV);
5278 sigprocmask(SIG_UNBLOCK, &set, &prev_set);
5279
5280 // run handler
5281 read_barrier_handler((uintptr_t)info->si_addr);
5282
5283 // reset SEGV/BUS handlers
5284 sigaction(SIGBUS, &prev_sigbus, NULL);
5285 sigaction(SIGSEGV, &prev_sigsegv, NULL);
5286 sigprocmask(SIG_SETMASK, &prev_set, NULL);
5287}
5288
5289static void
5290uninstall_handlers(void)
5291{
5292 sigaction(SIGBUS, &old_sigbus_handler, NULL);
5293 sigaction(SIGSEGV, &old_sigsegv_handler, NULL);
5294}
5295
5296static void
5297install_handlers(void)
5298{
5299 struct sigaction action;
5300 memset(&action, 0, sizeof(struct sigaction));
5301 sigemptyset(&action.sa_mask);
5302 action.sa_sigaction = read_barrier_signal;
5303 action.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO | SA_ONSTACK;
5304
5305 sigaction(SIGBUS, &action, &old_sigbus_handler);
5306 sigaction(SIGSEGV, &action, &old_sigsegv_handler);
5307}
5308#endif
5309
5310static void
5311revert_stack_objects(VALUE stack_obj, void *ctx)
5312{
5313 rb_objspace_t * objspace = (rb_objspace_t*)ctx;
5314
5315 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(stack_obj) == T_MOVED) {
5316 /* For now we'll revert the whole page if the object made it to the
5317 * stack. I think we can change this to move just the one object
5318 * back though */
5319 invalidate_moved_page(objspace, GET_HEAP_PAGE(stack_obj));
5320 }
5321}
5322
5323static void
5324revert_machine_stack_references(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE v)
5325{
5326 if (is_pointer_to_heap(objspace, (void *)v)) {
5327 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(v) == T_MOVED) {
5328 /* For now we'll revert the whole page if the object made it to the
5329 * stack. I think we can change this to move just the one object
5330 * back though */
5331 invalidate_moved_page(objspace, GET_HEAP_PAGE(v));
5332 }
5333 }
5334}
5335
5336static void each_machine_stack_value(const rb_execution_context_t *ec, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE));
5337
5338static void
5339check_stack_for_moved(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5340{
5341 rb_execution_context_t *ec = GET_EC();
5342 rb_vm_t *vm = rb_ec_vm_ptr(ec);
5343 rb_vm_each_stack_value(vm, revert_stack_objects, (void*)objspace);
5344 each_machine_stack_value(ec, revert_machine_stack_references);
5345}
5346
5347static void gc_mode_transition(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_mode mode);
5348
5349static void
5350gc_compact_finish(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5351{
5352 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5353 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5354 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
5355 gc_unprotect_pages(objspace, heap);
5356 }
5357
5358 uninstall_handlers();
5359
5360 /* The mutator is allowed to run during incremental sweeping. T_MOVED
5361 * objects can get pushed on the stack and when the compaction process
5362 * finishes up, it may remove the read barrier before anything has a
5363 * chance to read from the T_MOVED address. To fix this, we scan the stack
5364 * then revert any moved objects that made it to the stack. */
5365 check_stack_for_moved(objspace);
5366
5367 gc_update_references(objspace);
5368 objspace->profile.compact_count++;
5369
5370 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5371 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5372 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
5373 heap->compact_cursor = NULL;
5374 heap->free_pages = NULL;
5375 heap->compact_cursor_index = 0;
5376 }
5377
5378 if (gc_prof_enabled(objspace)) {
5379 gc_profile_record *record = gc_prof_record(objspace);
5380 record->moved_objects = objspace->rcompactor.total_moved - record->moved_objects;
5381 }
5382 objspace->flags.during_compacting = FALSE;
5383}
5384
5385struct gc_sweep_context {
5386 struct heap_page *page;
5387 int final_slots;
5388 int freed_slots;
5389 int empty_slots;
5390};
5391
5392static inline void
5393gc_sweep_plane(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap, uintptr_t p, bits_t bitset, struct gc_sweep_context *ctx)
5394{
5395 struct heap_page * sweep_page = ctx->page;
5396 short slot_size = sweep_page->slot_size;
5397 short slot_bits = slot_size / BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5398 GC_ASSERT(slot_bits > 0);
5399
5400 do {
5401 VALUE vp = (VALUE)p;
5402 GC_ASSERT(vp % BASE_SLOT_SIZE == 0);
5403
5404 asan_unpoison_object(vp, false);
5405 if (bitset & 1) {
5406 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(vp)) {
5407 default: /* majority case */
5408 gc_report(2, objspace, "page_sweep: free %p\n", (void *)p);
5409#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
5410 if (!is_full_marking(objspace)) {
5411 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(vp)) rb_bug("page_sweep: %p - old while minor GC.", (void *)p);
5412 if (rgengc_remembered_sweep(objspace, vp)) rb_bug("page_sweep: %p - remembered.", (void *)p);
5413 }
5414#endif
5415 if (obj_free(objspace, vp)) {
5416 // always add free slots back to the swept pages freelist,
5417 // so that if we're comapacting, we can re-use the slots
5418 (void)VALGRIND_MAKE_MEM_UNDEFINED((void*)p, BASE_SLOT_SIZE);
5419 heap_page_add_freeobj(objspace, sweep_page, vp);
5420 gc_report(3, objspace, "page_sweep: %s is added to freelist\n", obj_info(vp));
5421 ctx->freed_slots++;
5422 }
5423 else {
5424 ctx->final_slots++;
5425 }
5426 break;
5427
5428 case T_MOVED:
5429 if (objspace->flags.during_compacting) {
5430 /* The sweep cursor shouldn't have made it to any
5431 * T_MOVED slots while the compact flag is enabled.
5432 * The sweep cursor and compact cursor move in
5433 * opposite directions, and when they meet references will
5434 * get updated and "during_compacting" should get disabled */
5435 rb_bug("T_MOVED shouldn't be seen until compaction is finished\n");
5436 }
5437 gc_report(3, objspace, "page_sweep: %s is added to freelist\n", obj_info(vp));
5438 ctx->empty_slots++;
5439 heap_page_add_freeobj(objspace, sweep_page, vp);
5440 break;
5441 case T_ZOMBIE:
5442 /* already counted */
5443 break;
5444 case T_NONE:
5445 ctx->empty_slots++; /* already freed */
5446 break;
5447 }
5448 }
5449 p += slot_size;
5450 bitset >>= slot_bits;
5451 } while (bitset);
5452}
5453
5454static inline void
5455gc_sweep_page(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap, struct gc_sweep_context *ctx)
5456{
5457 struct heap_page *sweep_page = ctx->page;
5458
5459 uintptr_t p;
5460 bits_t *bits, bitset;
5461
5462 gc_report(2, objspace, "page_sweep: start.\n");
5463
5464#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
5465 if (!objspace->flags.immediate_sweep) {
5466 GC_ASSERT(sweep_page->flags.before_sweep == TRUE);
5467 }
5468#endif
5469 sweep_page->flags.before_sweep = FALSE;
5470 sweep_page->free_slots = 0;
5471
5472 p = (uintptr_t)sweep_page->start;
5473 bits = sweep_page->mark_bits;
5474
5475 int page_rvalue_count = sweep_page->total_slots * (sweep_page->slot_size / BASE_SLOT_SIZE);
5476 int out_of_range_bits = (NUM_IN_PAGE(p) + page_rvalue_count) % BITS_BITLENGTH;
5477 if (out_of_range_bits != 0) { // sizeof(RVALUE) == 64
5478 bits[BITMAP_INDEX(p) + page_rvalue_count / BITS_BITLENGTH] |= ~(((bits_t)1 << out_of_range_bits) - 1);
5479 }
5480
5481 /* The last bitmap plane may not be used if the last plane does not
5482 * have enough space for the slot_size. In that case, the last plane must
5483 * be skipped since none of the bits will be set. */
5484 int bitmap_plane_count = CEILDIV(NUM_IN_PAGE(p) + page_rvalue_count, BITS_BITLENGTH);
5485 GC_ASSERT(bitmap_plane_count == HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT - 1 ||
5486 bitmap_plane_count == HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT);
5487
5488 // Skip out of range slots at the head of the page
5489 bitset = ~bits[0];
5490 bitset >>= NUM_IN_PAGE(p);
5491 if (bitset) {
5492 gc_sweep_plane(objspace, heap, p, bitset, ctx);
5493 }
5494 p += (BITS_BITLENGTH - NUM_IN_PAGE(p)) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5495
5496 for (int i = 1; i < bitmap_plane_count; i++) {
5497 bitset = ~bits[i];
5498 if (bitset) {
5499 gc_sweep_plane(objspace, heap, p, bitset, ctx);
5500 }
5501 p += BITS_BITLENGTH * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5502 }
5503
5504 if (!heap->compact_cursor) {
5505 gc_setup_mark_bits(sweep_page);
5506 }
5507
5508#if GC_PROFILE_MORE_DETAIL
5509 if (gc_prof_enabled(objspace)) {
5510 gc_profile_record *record = gc_prof_record(objspace);
5511 record->removing_objects += ctx->final_slots + ctx->freed_slots;
5512 record->empty_objects += ctx->empty_slots;
5513 }
5514#endif
5515 if (0) fprintf(stderr, "gc_sweep_page(%"PRIdSIZE"): total_slots: %d, freed_slots: %d, empty_slots: %d, final_slots: %d\n",
5516 rb_gc_count(),
5517 sweep_page->total_slots,
5518 ctx->freed_slots, ctx->empty_slots, ctx->final_slots);
5519
5520 sweep_page->free_slots += ctx->freed_slots + ctx->empty_slots;
5521 objspace->profile.total_freed_objects += ctx->freed_slots;
5522
5523 if (heap_pages_deferred_final && !finalizing) {
5524 rb_thread_t *th = GET_THREAD();
5525 if (th) {
5526 gc_finalize_deferred_register(objspace);
5527 }
5528 }
5529
5530#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
5531 short freelist_len = 0;
5532 asan_unpoison_memory_region(&sweep_page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*), false);
5533 RVALUE *ptr = sweep_page->freelist;
5534 while (ptr) {
5535 freelist_len++;
5536 ptr = ptr->as.free.next;
5537 }
5538 asan_poison_memory_region(&sweep_page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*));
5539 if (freelist_len != sweep_page->free_slots) {
5540 rb_bug("inconsistent freelist length: expected %d but was %d", sweep_page->free_slots, freelist_len);
5541 }
5542#endif
5543
5544 gc_report(2, objspace, "page_sweep: end.\n");
5545}
5546
5547#if !USE_RVARGC
5548/* allocate additional minimum page to work */
5549static void
5550gc_heap_prepare_minimum_pages(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap)
5551{
5552 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5553 if (!heap->free_pages && heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, heap) == FALSE) {
5554 /* there is no free after page_sweep() */
5555 size_pool_allocatable_pages_set(objspace, size_pool, 1);
5556 if (!heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, heap)) { /* can't allocate additional free objects */
5557 rb_memerror();
5558 }
5559 }
5560 }
5561}
5562#endif
5563
5564static const char *
5565gc_mode_name(enum gc_mode mode)
5566{
5567 switch (mode) {
5568 case gc_mode_none: return "none";
5569 case gc_mode_marking: return "marking";
5570 case gc_mode_sweeping: return "sweeping";
5571 case gc_mode_compacting: return "compacting";
5572 default: rb_bug("gc_mode_name: unknown mode: %d", (int)mode);
5573 }
5574}
5575
5576static void
5577gc_mode_transition(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_mode mode)
5578{
5579#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
5580 enum gc_mode prev_mode = gc_mode(objspace);
5581 switch (prev_mode) {
5582 case gc_mode_none: GC_ASSERT(mode == gc_mode_marking); break;
5583 case gc_mode_marking: GC_ASSERT(mode == gc_mode_sweeping); break;
5584 case gc_mode_sweeping: GC_ASSERT(mode == gc_mode_none || mode == gc_mode_compacting); break;
5585 case gc_mode_compacting: GC_ASSERT(mode == gc_mode_none); break;
5586 }
5587#endif
5588 if (0) fprintf(stderr, "gc_mode_transition: %s->%s\n", gc_mode_name(gc_mode(objspace)), gc_mode_name(mode));
5589 gc_mode_set(objspace, mode);
5590}
5591
5592static void
5593heap_page_freelist_append(struct heap_page *page, RVALUE *freelist)
5594{
5595 if (freelist) {
5596 asan_unpoison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*), false);
5597 if (page->freelist) {
5598 RVALUE *p = page->freelist;
5599 asan_unpoison_object((VALUE)p, false);
5600 while (p->as.free.next) {
5601 RVALUE *prev = p;
5602 p = p->as.free.next;
5603 asan_poison_object((VALUE)prev);
5604 asan_unpoison_object((VALUE)p, false);
5605 }
5606 p->as.free.next = freelist;
5607 asan_poison_object((VALUE)p);
5608 }
5609 else {
5610 page->freelist = freelist;
5611 }
5612 asan_poison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*));
5613 }
5614}
5615
5616static void
5617gc_sweep_start_heap(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap)
5618{
5619 heap->sweeping_page = ccan_list_top(&heap->pages, struct heap_page, page_node);
5620 heap->free_pages = NULL;
5621#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
5622 heap->pooled_pages = NULL;
5623#endif
5624 if (!objspace->flags.immediate_sweep) {
5625 struct heap_page *page = NULL;
5626
5627 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
5628 page->flags.before_sweep = TRUE;
5629 }
5630 }
5631}
5632
5633#if defined(__GNUC__) && __GNUC__ == 4 && __GNUC_MINOR__ == 4
5634__attribute__((noinline))
5635#endif
5636static void
5637gc_sweep_start(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
