5638{
5639 gc_mode_transition(objspace, gc_mode_sweeping);
5640
5641#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
5642 objspace->rincgc.pooled_slots = 0;
5643#endif
5644
5645 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5646 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5647 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
5648
5649 gc_sweep_start_heap(objspace, heap);
5650
5651#if USE_RVARGC
5652 /* We should call gc_sweep_finish_size_pool for size pools with no pages. */
5653 if (heap->sweeping_page == NULL) {
5654 GC_ASSERT(heap->total_pages == 0);
5655 GC_ASSERT(heap->total_slots == 0);
5656 gc_sweep_finish_size_pool(objspace, size_pool);
5657 }
5658#endif
5659 }
5660
5661 rb_ractor_t *r = NULL;
5662 ccan_list_for_each(&GET_VM()->ractor.set, r, vmlr_node) {
5663 rb_gc_ractor_newobj_cache_clear(&r->newobj_cache);
5664 }
5665}
5666
5667#if USE_RVARGC
5668static void
5669gc_sweep_finish_size_pool(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool)
5670{
5671 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
5672 size_t total_slots = heap->total_slots + SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(size_pool)->total_slots;
5673 size_t total_pages = heap->total_pages + SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(size_pool)->total_pages;
5674 size_t swept_slots = size_pool->freed_slots + size_pool->empty_slots;
5675
5676 size_t min_free_slots = (size_t)(total_slots * gc_params.heap_free_slots_min_ratio);
5677 /* Some size pools may have very few pages (or even no pages). These size pools
5678 * should still have allocatable pages. */
5679 if (min_free_slots < gc_params.heap_init_slots) {
5680 min_free_slots = gc_params.heap_init_slots;
5681 }
5682
5683 if (swept_slots < min_free_slots) {
5684 bool grow_heap = is_full_marking(objspace);
5685
5686 if (!is_full_marking(objspace)) {
5687 /* The heap is a growth heap if it freed more slots than had empty
5688 * slots and used up all of its allocatable pages. */
5689 bool is_growth_heap = (size_pool->empty_slots == 0 ||
5690 size_pool->freed_slots > size_pool->empty_slots) &&
5691 size_pool->allocatable_pages == 0;
5692
5693 if (objspace->profile.count - objspace->rgengc.last_major_gc < RVALUE_OLD_AGE) {
5694 grow_heap = TRUE;
5695 }
5696 else if (is_growth_heap) { /* Only growth heaps are allowed to start a major GC. */
5697 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_NOFREE;
5698 size_pool->force_major_gc_count++;
5699 }
5700 }
5701
5702 if (grow_heap) {
5703 size_t extend_page_count = heap_extend_pages(objspace, size_pool, swept_slots, total_slots, total_pages);
5704
5705 if (extend_page_count > size_pool->allocatable_pages) {
5706 size_pool_allocatable_pages_set(objspace, size_pool, extend_page_count);
5707 }
5708 }
5709 }
5710}
5711#endif
5712
5713static void
5714gc_sweep_finish(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5715{
5716 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_sweep_finish\n");
5717
5718 gc_prof_set_heap_info(objspace);
5719 heap_pages_free_unused_pages(objspace);
5720
5721 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5722 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5723
5724 /* if heap_pages has unused pages, then assign them to increment */
5725 size_t tomb_pages = SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(size_pool)->total_pages;
5726 if (size_pool->allocatable_pages < tomb_pages) {
5727 size_pool->allocatable_pages = tomb_pages;
5728 }
5729
5730#if USE_RVARGC
5731 size_pool->freed_slots = 0;
5732 size_pool->empty_slots = 0;
5733
5734#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
5735 if (!will_be_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
5736 rb_heap_t *eden_heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
5737 struct heap_page *end_page = eden_heap->free_pages;
5738 if (end_page) {
5739 while (end_page->free_next) end_page = end_page->free_next;
5740 end_page->free_next = eden_heap->pooled_pages;
5741 }
5742 else {
5743 eden_heap->free_pages = eden_heap->pooled_pages;
5744 }
5745 eden_heap->pooled_pages = NULL;
5746 objspace->rincgc.pooled_slots = 0;
5747 }
5748#endif
5749#endif
5750 }
5751 heap_pages_expand_sorted(objspace);
5752
5753 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_GC_END_SWEEP, 0);
5754 gc_mode_transition(objspace, gc_mode_none);
5755}
5756
5757static int
5758gc_sweep_step(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap)
5759{
5760 struct heap_page *sweep_page = heap->sweeping_page;
5761 int unlink_limit = GC_SWEEP_PAGES_FREEABLE_PER_STEP;
5762
5763#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
5764 int swept_slots = 0;
5765#if USE_RVARGC
5766 bool need_pool = TRUE;
5767#else
5768 int need_pool = will_be_incremental_marking(objspace) ? TRUE : FALSE;
5769#endif
5770
5771 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_sweep_step (need_pool: %d)\n", need_pool);
5772#else
5773 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_sweep_step\n");
5774#endif
5775
5776 if (sweep_page == NULL) return FALSE;
5777
5778#if GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP
5779 gc_prof_sweep_timer_start(objspace);
5780#endif
5781
5782 do {
5783 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("sweep_page:%p", (void *)sweep_page);
5784
5785 struct gc_sweep_context ctx = {
5786 .page = sweep_page,
5787 .final_slots = 0,
5788 .freed_slots = 0,
5789 .empty_slots = 0,
5790 };
5791 gc_sweep_page(objspace, heap, &ctx);
5792 int free_slots = ctx.freed_slots + ctx.empty_slots;
5793
5794 heap->sweeping_page = ccan_list_next(&heap->pages, sweep_page, page_node);
5795
5796 if (sweep_page->final_slots + free_slots == sweep_page->total_slots &&
5797 heap_pages_freeable_pages > 0 &&
5798 unlink_limit > 0) {
5799 heap_pages_freeable_pages--;
5800 unlink_limit--;
5801 /* there are no living objects -> move this page to tomb heap */
5802 heap_unlink_page(objspace, heap, sweep_page);
5803 heap_add_page(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(size_pool), sweep_page);
5804 }
5805 else if (free_slots > 0) {
5806#if USE_RVARGC
5807 size_pool->freed_slots += ctx.freed_slots;
5808 size_pool->empty_slots += ctx.empty_slots;
5809#endif
5810
5811#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
5812 if (need_pool) {
5813 heap_add_poolpage(objspace, heap, sweep_page);
5814 need_pool = FALSE;
5815 }
5816 else {
5817 heap_add_freepage(heap, sweep_page);
5818 swept_slots += free_slots;
5819 if (swept_slots > GC_INCREMENTAL_SWEEP_SLOT_COUNT) {
5820 break;
5821 }
5822 }
5823#else
5824 heap_add_freepage(heap, sweep_page);
5825 break;
5826#endif
5827 }
5828 else {
5829 sweep_page->free_next = NULL;
5830 }
5831 } while ((sweep_page = heap->sweeping_page));
5832
5833 if (!heap->sweeping_page) {
5834#if USE_RVARGC
5835 gc_sweep_finish_size_pool(objspace, size_pool);
5836#endif
5837
5838 if (!has_sweeping_pages(objspace)) {
5839 gc_sweep_finish(objspace);
5840 }
5841 }
5842
5843#if GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP
5844 gc_prof_sweep_timer_stop(objspace);
5845#endif
5846
5847 return heap->free_pages != NULL;
5848}
5849
5850static void
5851gc_sweep_rest(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5852{
5853 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5854 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5855
5856 while (SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->sweeping_page) {
5857 gc_sweep_step(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool));
5858 }
5859 }
5860}
5861
5862static void
5863gc_sweep_continue(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *sweep_size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap)
5864{
5865 GC_ASSERT(dont_gc_val() == FALSE);
5866 if (!GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP) return;
5867
5868 unsigned int lock_lev;
5869 gc_enter(objspace, gc_enter_event_sweep_continue, &lock_lev);
5870
5871 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5872 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
5873 if (!gc_sweep_step(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool))) {
5874#if USE_RVARGC
5875 /* sweep_size_pool requires a free slot but sweeping did not yield any. */
5876 if (size_pool == sweep_size_pool) {
5877 if (size_pool->allocatable_pages > 0) {
5878 heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, heap);
5879 }
5880 else {
5881 /* Not allowed to create a new page so finish sweeping. */
5882 gc_sweep_rest(objspace);
5883 break;
5884 }
5885 }
5886#endif
5887 }
5888 }
5889
5890 gc_exit(objspace, gc_enter_event_sweep_continue, &lock_lev);
5891}
5892
5893static void
5894invalidate_moved_plane(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page *page, uintptr_t p, bits_t bitset)
5895{
5896 if (bitset) {
5897 do {
5898 if (bitset & 1) {
5899 VALUE forwarding_object = (VALUE)p;
5900 VALUE object;
5901
5902 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(forwarding_object) == T_MOVED) {
5903 GC_ASSERT(MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_PINNED_BITS(forwarding_object), forwarding_object));
5904 GC_ASSERT(!MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(forwarding_object), forwarding_object));
5905
5906 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_PINNED_BITS(forwarding_object), forwarding_object);
5907
5908 object = rb_gc_location(forwarding_object);
5909
5910 gc_move(objspace, object, forwarding_object, page->slot_size);
5911 /* forwarding_object is now our actual object, and "object"
5912 * is the free slot for the original page */
5913 struct heap_page *orig_page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(object);
5914 orig_page->free_slots++;
5915 heap_page_add_freeobj(objspace, orig_page, object);
5916
5917 GC_ASSERT(MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(forwarding_object), forwarding_object));
5918 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(forwarding_object) != T_MOVED);
5919 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(forwarding_object) != T_NONE);
5920 }
5921 }
5922 p += BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5923 bitset >>= 1;
5924 } while (bitset);
5925 }
5926}
5927
5928static void
5929invalidate_moved_page(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page *page)
5930{
5931 int i;
5932 bits_t *mark_bits, *pin_bits;
5933 bits_t bitset;
5934
5935 mark_bits = page->mark_bits;
5936 pin_bits = page->pinned_bits;
5937
5938 uintptr_t p = page->start;
5939
5940 // Skip out of range slots at the head of the page
5941 bitset = pin_bits[0] & ~mark_bits[0];
5942 bitset >>= NUM_IN_PAGE(p);
5943 invalidate_moved_plane(objspace, page, p, bitset);
5944 p += (BITS_BITLENGTH - NUM_IN_PAGE(p)) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5945
5946 for (i=1; i < HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT; i++) {
5947 /* Moved objects are pinned but never marked. We reuse the pin bits
5948 * to indicate there is a moved object in this slot. */
5949 bitset = pin_bits[i] & ~mark_bits[i];
5950
5951 invalidate_moved_plane(objspace, page, p, bitset);
5952 p += BITS_BITLENGTH * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
5953 }
5954}
5955
5956static void
5957gc_compact_start(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5958{
5959 struct heap_page *page = NULL;
5960 gc_mode_transition(objspace, gc_mode_compacting);
5961
5962 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
5963 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[i]);
5964 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
5965 page->flags.before_sweep = TRUE;
5966 }
5967
5968 heap->compact_cursor = ccan_list_tail(&heap->pages, struct heap_page, page_node);
5969 heap->compact_cursor_index = 0;
5970 }
5971
5972 if (gc_prof_enabled(objspace)) {
5973 gc_profile_record *record = gc_prof_record(objspace);
5974 record->moved_objects = objspace->rcompactor.total_moved;
5975 }
5976
5977 memset(objspace->rcompactor.considered_count_table, 0, T_MASK * sizeof(size_t));
5978 memset(objspace->rcompactor.moved_count_table, 0, T_MASK * sizeof(size_t));
5979
5980 /* Set up read barrier for pages containing MOVED objects */
5981 install_handlers();
5982}
5983
5984static void gc_sweep_compact(rb_objspace_t *objspace);
5985
5986static void
5987gc_sweep(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
5988{
5989 const unsigned int immediate_sweep = objspace->flags.immediate_sweep;
5990
5991 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_sweep: immediate: %d\n", immediate_sweep);
5992
5993 gc_sweep_start(objspace);
5994 if (objspace->flags.during_compacting) {
5995 gc_sweep_compact(objspace);
5996 }
5997
5998 if (immediate_sweep) {
5999#if !GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP
6000 gc_prof_sweep_timer_start(objspace);
6001#endif
6002 gc_sweep_rest(objspace);
6003#if !GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP
6004 gc_prof_sweep_timer_stop(objspace);
6005#endif
6006 }
6007 else {
6008
6009 /* Sweep every size pool. */
6010 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
6011 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
6012 gc_sweep_step(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool));
6013 }
6014 }
6015
6016#if !USE_RVARGC
6017 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[0];
6018 gc_heap_prepare_minimum_pages(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool));
6019#endif
6020}
6021
6022/* Marking - Marking stack */
6023
6024static stack_chunk_t *
6025stack_chunk_alloc(void)
6026{
6027 stack_chunk_t *res;
6028
6029 res = malloc(sizeof(stack_chunk_t));
6030 if (!res)
6031 rb_memerror();
6032
6033 return res;
6034}
6035
6036static inline int
6037is_mark_stack_empty(mark_stack_t *stack)
6038{
6039 return stack->chunk == NULL;
6040}
6041
6042static size_t
6043mark_stack_size(mark_stack_t *stack)
6044{
6045 size_t size = stack->index;
6046 stack_chunk_t *chunk = stack->chunk ? stack->chunk->next : NULL;
6047
6048 while (chunk) {
6049 size += stack->limit;
6050 chunk = chunk->next;
6051 }
6052 return size;
6053}
6054
6055static void
6056add_stack_chunk_cache(mark_stack_t *stack, stack_chunk_t *chunk)
6057{
6058 chunk->next = stack->cache;
6059 stack->cache = chunk;
6060 stack->cache_size++;
6061}
6062
6063static void
6064shrink_stack_chunk_cache(mark_stack_t *stack)
6065{
6066 stack_chunk_t *chunk;
6067
6068 if (stack->unused_cache_size > (stack->cache_size/2)) {
6069 chunk = stack->cache;
6070 stack->cache = stack->cache->next;
6071 stack->cache_size--;
6072 free(chunk);
6073 }
6074 stack->unused_cache_size = stack->cache_size;
6075}
6076
6077static void
6078push_mark_stack_chunk(mark_stack_t *stack)
6079{
6080 stack_chunk_t *next;
6081
6082 GC_ASSERT(stack->index == stack->limit);
6083
6084 if (stack->cache_size > 0) {
6085 next = stack->cache;
6086 stack->cache = stack->cache->next;
6087 stack->cache_size--;
6088 if (stack->unused_cache_size > stack->cache_size)
6089 stack->unused_cache_size = stack->cache_size;
6090 }
6091 else {
6092 next = stack_chunk_alloc();
6093 }
6094 next->next = stack->chunk;
6095 stack->chunk = next;
6096 stack->index = 0;
6097}
6098
6099static void
6100pop_mark_stack_chunk(mark_stack_t *stack)
6101{
6102 stack_chunk_t *prev;
6103
6104 prev = stack->chunk->next;
6105 GC_ASSERT(stack->index == 0);
6106 add_stack_chunk_cache(stack, stack->chunk);
6107 stack->chunk = prev;
6108 stack->index = stack->limit;
6109}
6110
6111static void
6112mark_stack_chunk_list_free(stack_chunk_t *chunk)
6113{
6114 stack_chunk_t *next = NULL;
6115
6116 while (chunk != NULL) {
6117 next = chunk->next;
6118 free(chunk);
6119 chunk = next;
6120 }
6121}
6122
6123static void
6124free_stack_chunks(mark_stack_t *stack)
6125{
6126 mark_stack_chunk_list_free(stack->chunk);
6127}
6128
6129static void
6130mark_stack_free_cache(mark_stack_t *stack)
6131{
6132 mark_stack_chunk_list_free(stack->cache);
6133 stack->cache_size = 0;
6134 stack->unused_cache_size = 0;
6135}
6136
6137static void
6138push_mark_stack(mark_stack_t *stack, VALUE data)
6139{
6140 VALUE obj = data;
6141 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
6142 case T_OBJECT:
6143 case T_CLASS:
6144 case T_MODULE:
6145 case T_FLOAT:
6146 case T_STRING:
6147 case T_REGEXP:
6148 case T_ARRAY:
6149 case T_HASH:
6150 case T_STRUCT:
6151 case T_BIGNUM:
6152 case T_FILE:
6153 case T_DATA:
6154 case T_MATCH:
6155 case T_COMPLEX:
6156 case T_RATIONAL:
6157 case T_TRUE:
6158 case T_FALSE:
6159 case T_SYMBOL:
6160 case T_IMEMO:
6161 case T_ICLASS:
6162 if (stack->index == stack->limit) {
6163 push_mark_stack_chunk(stack);
6164 }
6165 stack->chunk->data[stack->index++] = data;
6166 return;
6167
6168 case T_NONE:
6169 case T_NIL:
6170 case T_FIXNUM:
6171 case T_MOVED:
6172 case T_ZOMBIE:
6173 case T_UNDEF:
6174 case T_MASK:
6175 rb_bug("push_mark_stack() called for broken object");
6176 break;
6177
6178 case T_NODE:
6179 UNEXPECTED_NODE(push_mark_stack);
6180 break;
6181 }
6182
6183 rb_bug("rb_gc_mark(): unknown data type 0x%x(%p) %s",
6184 BUILTIN_TYPE(obj), (void *)data,
6185 is_pointer_to_heap(&rb_objspace, (void *)data) ? "corrupted object" : "non object");
6186}
6187
6188static int
6189pop_mark_stack(mark_stack_t *stack, VALUE *data)
6190{
6191 if (is_mark_stack_empty(stack)) {
6192 return FALSE;
6193 }
6194 if (stack->index == 1) {
6195 *data = stack->chunk->data[--stack->index];
6196 pop_mark_stack_chunk(stack);
6197 }
6198 else {
6199 *data = stack->chunk->data[--stack->index];
6200 }
6201 return TRUE;
6202}
6203
6204static void
6205init_mark_stack(mark_stack_t *stack)
6206{
6207 int i;
6208
6209 MEMZERO(stack, mark_stack_t, 1);
6210 stack->index = stack->limit = STACK_CHUNK_SIZE;
6211
6212 for (i=0; i < 4; i++) {
6213 add_stack_chunk_cache(stack, stack_chunk_alloc());
6214 }
6215 stack->unused_cache_size = stack->cache_size;
6216}
6217
6218/* Marking */
6219
6220#define SET_STACK_END SET_MACHINE_STACK_END(&ec->machine.stack_end)
6221
6222#define STACK_START (ec->machine.stack_start)
6223#define STACK_END (ec->machine.stack_end)
6224#define STACK_LEVEL_MAX (ec->machine.stack_maxsize/sizeof(VALUE))
6225
6226#if STACK_GROW_DIRECTION < 0
6227# define STACK_LENGTH (size_t)(STACK_START - STACK_END)
6228#elif STACK_GROW_DIRECTION > 0
6229# define STACK_LENGTH (size_t)(STACK_END - STACK_START + 1)
6230#else
6231# define STACK_LENGTH ((STACK_END < STACK_START) ? (size_t)(STACK_START - STACK_END) \
6232 : (size_t)(STACK_END - STACK_START + 1))
6233#endif
6234#if !STACK_GROW_DIRECTION
6235int ruby_stack_grow_direction;
6236int
6237ruby_get_stack_grow_direction(volatile VALUE *addr)
6238{
6239 VALUE *end;
6240 SET_MACHINE_STACK_END(&end);
6241
6242 if (end > addr) return ruby_stack_grow_direction = 1;
6243 return ruby_stack_grow_direction = -1;
6244}
6245#endif
6246
6247size_t
6248ruby_stack_length(VALUE **p)
6249{
6250 rb_execution_context_t *ec = GET_EC();
6251 SET_STACK_END;
6252 if (p) *p = STACK_UPPER(STACK_END, STACK_START, STACK_END);
6253 return STACK_LENGTH;
6254}
6255
6256#define PREVENT_STACK_OVERFLOW 1
6257#ifndef PREVENT_STACK_OVERFLOW
6258#if !(defined(POSIX_SIGNAL) && defined(SIGSEGV) && defined(HAVE_SIGALTSTACK))
6259# define PREVENT_STACK_OVERFLOW 1
6260#else
6261# define PREVENT_STACK_OVERFLOW 0
6262#endif
6263#endif
6264#if PREVENT_STACK_OVERFLOW && !defined(__EMSCRIPTEN__)
6265static int
6266stack_check(rb_execution_context_t *ec, int water_mark)
6267{
6268 SET_STACK_END;
6269
6270 size_t length = STACK_LENGTH;
6271 size_t maximum_length = STACK_LEVEL_MAX - water_mark;
6272
6273 return length > maximum_length;
6274}
6275#else
6276#define stack_check(ec, water_mark) FALSE
6277#endif
6278
6279#define STACKFRAME_FOR_CALL_CFUNC 2048
6280
6281MJIT_FUNC_EXPORTED int
6282rb_ec_stack_check(rb_execution_context_t *ec)
6283{
6284 return stack_check(ec, STACKFRAME_FOR_CALL_CFUNC);
6285}
6286
6287int
6288ruby_stack_check(void)
6289{
6290 return stack_check(GET_EC(), STACKFRAME_FOR_CALL_CFUNC);
6291}
6292
6293ATTRIBUTE_NO_ADDRESS_SAFETY_ANALYSIS(static void each_location(rb_objspace_t *objspace, register const VALUE *x, register long n, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE)));
6294static void
6295each_location(rb_objspace_t *objspace, register const VALUE *x, register long n, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE))
6296{
6297 VALUE v;
6298 while (n--) {
6299 v = *x;
6300 cb(objspace, v);
6301 x++;
6302 }
6303}
6304
6305static void
6306gc_mark_locations(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const VALUE *start, const VALUE *end, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE))
6307{
6308 long n;
6309
6310 if (end <= start) return;
6311 n = end - start;
6312 each_location(objspace, start, n, cb);
6313}
6314
6315void
6316rb_gc_mark_locations(const VALUE *start, const VALUE *end)
6317{
6318 gc_mark_locations(&rb_objspace, start, end, gc_mark_maybe);
6319}
6320
6321static void
6322gc_mark_values(rb_objspace_t *objspace, long n, const VALUE *values)
6323{
6324 long i;
6325
6326 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
6327 gc_mark(objspace, values[i]);
6328 }
6329}
6330
6331void
6332rb_gc_mark_values(long n, const VALUE *values)
6333{
6334 long i;
6335 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
6336
6337 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
6338 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, values[i]);
6339 }
6340}
6341
6342static void
6343gc_mark_stack_values(rb_objspace_t *objspace, long n, const VALUE *values)
6344{
6345 long i;
6346
6347 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
6348 if (is_markable_object(objspace, values[i])) {
6349 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, values[i]);
6350 }
6351 }
6352}
6353
6354void
6355rb_gc_mark_vm_stack_values(long n, const VALUE *values)
6356{
6357 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
6358 gc_mark_stack_values(objspace, n, values);
6359}
6360
6361static int
6362mark_value(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6363{
6364 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6365 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6366 return ST_CONTINUE;
6367}
6368
6369static int
6370mark_value_pin(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6371{
6372 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6373 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6374 return ST_CONTINUE;
6375}
6376
6377static void
6378mark_tbl_no_pin(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_table *tbl)
6379{
6380 if (!tbl || tbl->num_entries == 0) return;
6381 st_foreach(tbl, mark_value, (st_data_t)objspace);
6382}
6383
6384static void
6385mark_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_table *tbl)
6386{
6387 if (!tbl || tbl->num_entries == 0) return;
6388 st_foreach(tbl, mark_value_pin, (st_data_t)objspace);
6389}
6390
6391static int
6392mark_key(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6393{
6394 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6395 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)key);
6396 return ST_CONTINUE;
6397}
6398
6399static void
6400mark_set(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_table *tbl)
6401{
6402 if (!tbl) return;
6403 st_foreach(tbl, mark_key, (st_data_t)objspace);
6404}
6405
6406static int
6407pin_value(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6408{
6409 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6410 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6411 return ST_CONTINUE;
6412}
6413
6414static void
6415mark_finalizer_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_table *tbl)
6416{
6417 if (!tbl) return;
6418 st_foreach(tbl, pin_value, (st_data_t)objspace);
6419}
6420
6421void
6422rb_mark_set(st_table *tbl)
6423{
6424 mark_set(&rb_objspace, tbl);
6425}
6426
6427static int
6428mark_keyvalue(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6429{
6430 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6431
6432 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)key);
6433 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6434 return ST_CONTINUE;
6435}
6436
6437static int
6438pin_key_pin_value(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6439{
6440 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6441
6442 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)key);
6443 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6444 return ST_CONTINUE;
6445}
6446
6447static int
6448pin_key_mark_value(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t data)
6449{
6450 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6451
6452 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)key);
6453 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)value);
6454 return ST_CONTINUE;
6455}
6456
6457static void
6458mark_hash(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE hash)
6459{
6460 if (rb_hash_compare_by_id_p(hash)) {
6461 rb_hash_stlike_foreach(hash, pin_key_mark_value, (st_data_t)objspace);
6462 }
6463 else {
6464 rb_hash_stlike_foreach(hash, mark_keyvalue, (st_data_t)objspace);
6465 }
6466
6467 if (RHASH_AR_TABLE_P(hash)) {
6468 if (LIKELY(during_gc) && RHASH_TRANSIENT_P(hash)) {
6469 rb_transient_heap_mark(hash, RHASH_AR_TABLE(hash));
6470 }
6471 }
6472 else {
6473 VM_ASSERT(!RHASH_TRANSIENT_P(hash));
6474 }
6475 gc_mark(objspace, RHASH(hash)->ifnone);
6476}
6477
6478static void
6479mark_st(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_table *tbl)
6480{
6481 if (!tbl) return;
6482 st_foreach(tbl, pin_key_pin_value, (st_data_t)objspace);
6483}
6484
6485void
6486rb_mark_hash(st_table *tbl)
6487{
6488 mark_st(&rb_objspace, tbl);
6489}
6490
6491static void
6492mark_method_entry(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const rb_method_entry_t *me)
6493{
6494 const rb_method_definition_t *def = me->def;
6495
6496 gc_mark(objspace, me->owner);
6497 gc_mark(objspace, me->defined_class);
6498
6499 if (def) {
6500 switch (def->type) {
6501 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ISEQ:
6502 if (def->body.iseq.iseqptr) gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)def->body.iseq.iseqptr);
6503 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)def->body.iseq.cref);
6504
6505 if (def->iseq_overload && me->defined_class) {
6506 // it can be a key of "overloaded_cme" table
6507 // so it should be pinned.
6508 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, (VALUE)me);
6509 }
6510 break;
6511 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ATTRSET:
6512 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_IVAR:
6513 gc_mark(objspace, def->body.attr.location);
6514 break;
6515 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_BMETHOD:
6516 gc_mark(objspace, def->body.bmethod.proc);
6517 if (def->body.bmethod.hooks) rb_hook_list_mark(def->body.bmethod.hooks);
6518 break;
6519 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ALIAS:
6520 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)def->body.alias.original_me);
6521 return;
6522 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_REFINED:
6523 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)def->body.refined.orig_me);
6524 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)def->body.refined.owner);
6525 break;
6526 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_CFUNC:
6527 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ZSUPER:
6528 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_MISSING:
6529 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_OPTIMIZED:
6530 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_UNDEF:
6531 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_NOTIMPLEMENTED:
6532 break;
6533 }
6534 }
6535}
6536
6537static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
6538mark_method_entry_i(VALUE me, void *data)
6539{
6540 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
6541
6542 gc_mark(objspace, me);
6543 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
6544}
6545
6546static void
6547mark_m_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct rb_id_table *tbl)
6548{
6549 if (tbl) {
6550 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, mark_method_entry_i, objspace);
6551 }
6552}
6553
6554static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
6555mark_const_entry_i(VALUE value, void *data)
6556{
6557 const rb_const_entry_t *ce = (const rb_const_entry_t *)value;
6558 rb_objspace_t *objspace = data;
6559
6560 gc_mark(objspace, ce->value);
6561 gc_mark(objspace, ce->file);
6562 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
6563}
6564
6565static void
6566mark_const_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct rb_id_table *tbl)
6567{
6568 if (!tbl) return;
6569 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, mark_const_entry_i, objspace);
6570}
6571
6572#if STACK_GROW_DIRECTION < 0
6573#define GET_STACK_BOUNDS(start, end, appendix) ((start) = STACK_END, (end) = STACK_START)
6574#elif STACK_GROW_DIRECTION > 0
6575#define GET_STACK_BOUNDS(start, end, appendix) ((start) = STACK_START, (end) = STACK_END+(appendix))
6576#else
6577#define GET_STACK_BOUNDS(start, end, appendix) \
6578 ((STACK_END < STACK_START) ? \
6579 ((start) = STACK_END, (end) = STACK_START) : ((start) = STACK_START, (end) = STACK_END+(appendix)))
6580#endif
6581
6582static void each_stack_location(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const rb_execution_context_t *ec,
6583 const VALUE *stack_start, const VALUE *stack_end, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE));
6584
6585#if defined(__wasm__)
6586
6587
6588static VALUE *rb_stack_range_tmp[2];
6589
6590static void
6591rb_mark_locations(void *begin, void *end)
6592{
6593 rb_stack_range_tmp[0] = begin;
6594 rb_stack_range_tmp[1] = end;
6595}
6596
6597# if defined(__EMSCRIPTEN__)
6598
6599static void
6600mark_current_machine_context(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_execution_context_t *ec)
6601{
6602 emscripten_scan_stack(rb_mark_locations);
6603 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, rb_stack_range_tmp[0], rb_stack_range_tmp[1], gc_mark_maybe);
6604
6605 emscripten_scan_registers(rb_mark_locations);
6606 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, rb_stack_range_tmp[0], rb_stack_range_tmp[1], gc_mark_maybe);
6607}
6608# else // use Asyncify version
6609
6610static void
6611mark_current_machine_context(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_execution_context_t *ec)
6612{
6613 rb_wasm_scan_stack(rb_mark_locations);
6614 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, rb_stack_range_tmp[0], rb_stack_range_tmp[1], gc_mark_maybe);
6615
6616 rb_wasm_scan_locals(rb_mark_locations);
6617 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, rb_stack_range_tmp[0], rb_stack_range_tmp[1], gc_mark_maybe);
6618}
6619
6620# endif
6621
6622#else // !defined(__wasm__)
6623
6624static void
6625mark_current_machine_context(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_execution_context_t *ec)
6626{
6627 union {
6628 rb_jmp_buf j;
6629 VALUE v[sizeof(rb_jmp_buf) / (sizeof(VALUE))];
6630 } save_regs_gc_mark;
6631 VALUE *stack_start, *stack_end;
6632
6633 FLUSH_REGISTER_WINDOWS;
6634 memset(&save_regs_gc_mark, 0, sizeof(save_regs_gc_mark));
6635 /* This assumes that all registers are saved into the jmp_buf (and stack) */
6636 rb_setjmp(save_regs_gc_mark.j);
6637
6638 /* SET_STACK_END must be called in this function because
6639 * the stack frame of this function may contain
6640 * callee save registers and they should be marked. */
6641 SET_STACK_END;
6642 GET_STACK_BOUNDS(stack_start, stack_end, 1);
6643
6644 each_location(objspace, save_regs_gc_mark.v, numberof(save_regs_gc_mark.v), gc_mark_maybe);
6645
6646 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, stack_start, stack_end, gc_mark_maybe);
6647}
6648#endif
6649
6650static void
6651each_machine_stack_value(const rb_execution_context_t *ec, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE))
6652{
6653 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
6654 VALUE *stack_start, *stack_end;
6655
6656 GET_STACK_BOUNDS(stack_start, stack_end, 0);
6657 each_stack_location(objspace, ec, stack_start, stack_end, cb);
6658}
6659
6660void
6661rb_gc_mark_machine_stack(const rb_execution_context_t *ec)
6662{
6663 each_machine_stack_value(ec, gc_mark_maybe);
6664}
6665
6666static void
6667each_stack_location(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const rb_execution_context_t *ec,
6668 const VALUE *stack_start, const VALUE *stack_end, void (*cb)(rb_objspace_t *, VALUE))
6669{
6670
6671 gc_mark_locations(objspace, stack_start, stack_end, cb);
6672
6673#if defined(__mc68000__)
6674 gc_mark_locations(objspace,
6675 (VALUE*)((char*)stack_start + 2),
6676 (VALUE*)((char*)stack_end - 2), cb);
6677#endif
6678}
6679
6680void
6681rb_mark_tbl(st_table *tbl)
6682{
6683 mark_tbl(&rb_objspace, tbl);
6684}
6685
6686void
6687rb_mark_tbl_no_pin(st_table *tbl)
6688{
6689 mark_tbl_no_pin(&rb_objspace, tbl);
6690}
6691
6692static void
6693gc_mark_maybe(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6694{
6695 (void)VALGRIND_MAKE_MEM_DEFINED(&obj, sizeof(obj));
6696
6697 if (is_pointer_to_heap(objspace, (void *)obj)) {
6698 void *ptr = __asan_region_is_poisoned((void *)obj, SIZEOF_VALUE);
6699 asan_unpoison_object(obj, false);
6700
6701 /* Garbage can live on the stack, so do not mark or pin */
6702 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
6703 case T_ZOMBIE:
6704 case T_NONE:
6705 break;
6706 default:
6707 gc_mark_and_pin(objspace, obj);
6708 break;
6709 }
6710
6711 if (ptr) {
6712 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_NONE);
6713 asan_poison_object(obj);
6714 }
6715 }
6716}
6717
6718void
6719rb_gc_mark_maybe(VALUE obj)
6720{
6721 gc_mark_maybe(&rb_objspace, obj);
6722}
6723
6724static inline int
6725gc_mark_set(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6726{
6727 ASSERT_vm_locking();
6728 if (RVALUE_MARKED(obj)) return 0;
6729 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(obj), obj);
6730 return 1;
6731}
6732
6733static int
6734gc_remember_unprotected(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6735{
6736 struct heap_page *page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj);
6737 bits_t *uncollectible_bits = &page->uncollectible_bits[0];
6738
6739 if (!MARKED_IN_BITMAP(uncollectible_bits, obj)) {
6740 page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects = TRUE;
6741 MARK_IN_BITMAP(uncollectible_bits, obj);
6742 objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects++;
6743
6744#if RGENGC_PROFILE > 0
6745 objspace->profile.total_remembered_shady_object_count++;
6746#if RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2
6747 objspace->profile.remembered_shady_object_count_types[BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)]++;
6748#endif
6749#endif
6750 return TRUE;
6751 }
6752 else {
6753 return FALSE;
6754 }
6755}
6756
6757static void
6758rgengc_check_relation(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6759{
6760 const VALUE old_parent = objspace->rgengc.parent_object;
6761
6762 if (old_parent) { /* parent object is old */
6763 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj)) {
6764 if (gc_remember_unprotected(objspace, obj)) {
6765 gc_report(2, objspace, "relation: (O->S) %s -> %s\n", obj_info(old_parent), obj_info(obj));
6766 }
6767 }
6768 else {
6769 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
6770 if (RVALUE_MARKED(obj)) {
6771 /* An object pointed from an OLD object should be OLD. */
6772 gc_report(2, objspace, "relation: (O->unmarked Y) %s -> %s\n", obj_info(old_parent), obj_info(obj));
6773 RVALUE_AGE_SET_OLD(objspace, obj);
6774 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
6775 if (!RVALUE_MARKING(obj)) {
6776 gc_grey(objspace, obj);
6777 }
6778 }
6779 else {
6780 rgengc_remember(objspace, obj);
6781 }
6782 }
6783 else {
6784 gc_report(2, objspace, "relation: (O->Y) %s -> %s\n", obj_info(old_parent), obj_info(obj));
6785 RVALUE_AGE_SET_CANDIDATE(objspace, obj);
6786 }
6787 }
6788 }
6789 }
6790
6791 GC_ASSERT(old_parent == objspace->rgengc.parent_object);
6792}
6793
6794static void
6795gc_grey(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6796{
6797#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE
6798 if (RVALUE_MARKED(obj) == FALSE) rb_bug("gc_grey: %s is not marked.", obj_info(obj));
6799 if (RVALUE_MARKING(obj) == TRUE) rb_bug("gc_grey: %s is marking/remembered.", obj_info(obj));
6800#endif
6801
6802#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
6803 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
6804 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS(obj), obj);
6805 }
6806#endif
6807
6808 push_mark_stack(&objspace->mark_stack, obj);
6809}
6810
6811static void
6812gc_aging(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6813{
6814 struct heap_page *page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj);
6815
6816 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_MARKING(obj) == FALSE);
6817 check_rvalue_consistency(obj);
6818
6819 if (!RVALUE_PAGE_WB_UNPROTECTED(page, obj)) {
6820 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
6821 gc_report(3, objspace, "gc_aging: YOUNG: %s\n", obj_info(obj));
6822 RVALUE_AGE_INC(objspace, obj);
6823 }
6824 else if (is_full_marking(objspace)) {
6825 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_PAGE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(page, obj) == FALSE);
6826 RVALUE_PAGE_OLD_UNCOLLECTIBLE_SET(objspace, page, obj);
6827 }
6828 }
6829 check_rvalue_consistency(obj);
6830
6831 objspace->marked_slots++;
6832}
6833
6834NOINLINE(static void gc_mark_ptr(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj));
6835static void reachable_objects_from_callback(VALUE obj);
6836
6837static void
6838gc_mark_ptr(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6839{
6840 if (LIKELY(during_gc)) {
6841 rgengc_check_relation(objspace, obj);
6842 if (!gc_mark_set(objspace, obj)) return; /* already marked */
6843
6844 if (0) { // for debug GC marking miss
6845 if (objspace->rgengc.parent_object) {
6846 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("%p (%s) parent:%p (%s)",
6847 (void *)obj, obj_type_name(obj),
6848 (void *)objspace->rgengc.parent_object, obj_type_name(objspace->rgengc.parent_object));
6849 }
6850 else {
6851 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("%p (%s)", (void *)obj, obj_type_name(obj));
6852 }
6853 }
6854
6855 if (UNLIKELY(RB_TYPE_P(obj, T_NONE))) {
6856 rp(obj);
6857 rb_bug("try to mark T_NONE object"); /* check here will help debugging */
6858 }
6859 gc_aging(objspace, obj);
6860 gc_grey(objspace, obj);
6861 }
6862 else {
6863 reachable_objects_from_callback(obj);
6864 }
6865}
6866
6867static inline void
6868gc_pin(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6869{
6870 GC_ASSERT(is_markable_object(objspace, obj));
6871 if (UNLIKELY(objspace->flags.during_compacting)) {
6872 if (LIKELY(during_gc)) {
6873 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_PINNED_BITS(obj), obj);
6874 }
6875 }
6876}
6877
6878static inline void
6879gc_mark_and_pin(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6880{
6881 if (!is_markable_object(objspace, obj)) return;
6882 gc_pin(objspace, obj);
6883 gc_mark_ptr(objspace, obj);
6884}
6885
6886static inline void
6887gc_mark(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6888{
6889 if (!is_markable_object(objspace, obj)) return;
6890 gc_mark_ptr(objspace, obj);
6891}
6892
6893void
6894rb_gc_mark_movable(VALUE ptr)
6895{
6896 gc_mark(&rb_objspace, ptr);
6897}
6898
6899void
6900rb_gc_mark(VALUE ptr)
6901{
6902 gc_mark_and_pin(&rb_objspace, ptr);
6903}
6904
6905/* CAUTION: THIS FUNCTION ENABLE *ONLY BEFORE* SWEEPING.
6906 * This function is only for GC_END_MARK timing.
6907 */
6908
6909int
6910rb_objspace_marked_object_p(VALUE obj)
6911{
6912 return RVALUE_MARKED(obj) ? TRUE : FALSE;
6913}
6914
6915static inline void
6916gc_mark_set_parent(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6917{
6918 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
6919 objspace->rgengc.parent_object = obj;
6920 }
6921 else {
6922 objspace->rgengc.parent_object = Qfalse;
6923 }
6924}
6925
6926static void
6927gc_mark_imemo(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
6928{
6929 switch (imemo_type(obj)) {
6930 case imemo_env:
6931 {
6932 const rb_env_t *env = (const rb_env_t *)obj;
6933
6934 if (LIKELY(env->ep)) {
6935 // just after newobj() can be NULL here.
6936 GC_ASSERT(env->ep[VM_ENV_DATA_INDEX_ENV] == obj);
6937 GC_ASSERT(VM_ENV_ESCAPED_P(env->ep));
6938 gc_mark_values(objspace, (long)env->env_size, env->env);
6939 VM_ENV_FLAGS_SET(env->ep, VM_ENV_FLAG_WB_REQUIRED);
6940 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)rb_vm_env_prev_env(env));
6941 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)env->iseq);
6942 }
6943 }
6944 return;
6945 case imemo_cref:
6946 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.klass_or_self);
6947 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.next);
6948 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.refinements);
6949 return;
6950 case imemo_svar:
6951 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.cref_or_me);
6952 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.lastline);
6953 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.backref);
6954 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.others);
6955 return;
6956 case imemo_throw_data:
6957 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.throw_data.throw_obj);
6958 return;
6959 case imemo_ifunc:
6960 gc_mark_maybe(objspace, (VALUE)RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ifunc.data);
6961 return;
6962 case imemo_memo:
6963 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.memo.v1);
6964 gc_mark(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.memo.v2);
6965 gc_mark_maybe(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.memo.u3.value);
6966 return;
6967 case imemo_ment:
6968 mark_method_entry(objspace, &RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ment);
6969 return;
6970 case imemo_iseq:
6971 rb_iseq_mark((rb_iseq_t *)obj);
6972 return;
6973 case imemo_tmpbuf:
6974 {
6975 const rb_imemo_tmpbuf_t *m = &RANY(obj)->as.imemo.alloc;
6976 do {
6977 rb_gc_mark_locations(m->ptr, m->ptr + m->cnt);
6978 } while ((m = m->next) != NULL);
6979 }
6980 return;
6981 case imemo_ast:
6982 rb_ast_mark(&RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ast);
6983 return;
6984 case imemo_parser_strterm:
6985 rb_strterm_mark(obj);
6986 return;
6987 case imemo_callinfo:
6988 return;
6989 case imemo_callcache:
6990 {
6991 const struct rb_callcache *cc = (const struct rb_callcache *)obj;
6992 // should not mark klass here
6993 gc_mark(objspace, (VALUE)vm_cc_cme(cc));
6994 }
6995 return;
6996 case imemo_constcache:
6997 {
6998 const struct iseq_inline_constant_cache_entry *ice = (struct iseq_inline_constant_cache_entry *)obj;
6999 gc_mark(objspace, ice->value);
7000 }
7001 return;
7002#if VM_CHECK_MODE > 0
7003 default:
7004 VM_UNREACHABLE(gc_mark_imemo);
7005#endif
7006 }
7007}
7008
7009static void
7010gc_mark_children(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
7011{
7012 register RVALUE *any = RANY(obj);
7013 gc_mark_set_parent(objspace, obj);
7014
7015 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_EXIVAR)) {
7016 rb_mark_generic_ivar(obj);
7017 }
7018
7019 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
7020 case T_FLOAT:
7021 case T_BIGNUM:
7022 case T_SYMBOL:
7023 /* Not immediates, but does not have references and singleton
7024 * class */
7025 return;
7026
7027 case T_NIL:
7028 case T_FIXNUM:
7029 rb_bug("rb_gc_mark() called for broken object");
7030 break;
7031
7032 case T_NODE:
7033 UNEXPECTED_NODE(rb_gc_mark);
7034 break;
7035
7036 case T_IMEMO:
7037 gc_mark_imemo(objspace, obj);
7038 return;
7039
7040 default:
7041 break;
7042 }
7043
7044 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.basic.klass);
7045
7046 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
7047 case T_CLASS:
7048 case T_MODULE:
7049 if (RCLASS_SUPER(obj)) {
7050 gc_mark(objspace, RCLASS_SUPER(obj));
7051 }
7052 if (!RCLASS_EXT(obj)) break;
7053
7054 mark_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
7055 cc_table_mark(objspace, obj);
7056 mark_tbl_no_pin(objspace, RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj));
7057 mark_const_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_CONST_TBL(obj));
7058 break;
7059
7060 case T_ICLASS:
7061 if (RICLASS_OWNS_M_TBL_P(obj)) {
7062 mark_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
7063 }
7064 if (RCLASS_SUPER(obj)) {
7065 gc_mark(objspace, RCLASS_SUPER(obj));
7066 }
7067 if (!RCLASS_EXT(obj)) break;
7068
7069 if (RCLASS_INCLUDER(obj)) {
7070 gc_mark(objspace, RCLASS_INCLUDER(obj));
7071 }
7072 mark_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_CALLABLE_M_TBL(obj));
7073 cc_table_mark(objspace, obj);
7074 break;
7075
7076 case T_ARRAY:
7077 if (FL_TEST(obj, ELTS_SHARED)) {
7078 VALUE root = any->as.array.as.heap.aux.shared_root;
7079 gc_mark(objspace, root);
7080 }
7081 else {
7082 long i, len = RARRAY_LEN(obj);
7083 const VALUE *ptr = RARRAY_CONST_PTR_TRANSIENT(obj);
7084 for (i=0; i < len; i++) {
7085 gc_mark(objspace, ptr[i]);
7086 }
7087
7088 if (LIKELY(during_gc)) {
7089 if (!FL_TEST_RAW(obj, RARRAY_EMBED_FLAG) &&
7090 RARRAY_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
7091 rb_transient_heap_mark(obj, ptr);
7092 }
7093 }
7094 }
7095 break;
7096
7097 case T_HASH:
7098 mark_hash(objspace, obj);
7099 break;
7100
7101 case T_STRING:
7102 if (STR_SHARED_P(obj)) {
7103 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.string.as.heap.aux.shared);
7104 }
7105 break;
7106
7107 case T_DATA:
7108 {
7109 void *const ptr = DATA_PTR(obj);
7110 if (ptr) {
7111 RUBY_DATA_FUNC mark_func = RTYPEDDATA_P(obj) ?
7112 any->as.typeddata.type->function.dmark :
7113 any->as.data.dmark;
7114 if (mark_func) (*mark_func)(ptr);
7115 }
7116 }
7117 break;
7118
7119 case T_OBJECT:
7120 {
7121 const VALUE * const ptr = ROBJECT_IVPTR(obj);
7122
7123 uint32_t i, len = ROBJECT_NUMIV(obj);
7124 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
7125 gc_mark(objspace, ptr[i]);
7126 }
7127
7128 if (LIKELY(during_gc) &&
7129 ROBJ_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
7130 rb_transient_heap_mark(obj, ptr);
7131 }
7132 }
7133 break;
7134
7135 case T_FILE:
7136 if (any->as.file.fptr) {
7137 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->self);
7138 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->pathv);
7139 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->tied_io_for_writing);
7140 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->writeconv_asciicompat);
7141 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->writeconv_pre_ecopts);
7142 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->encs.ecopts);
7143 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->write_lock);
7144 }
7145 break;
7146
7147 case T_REGEXP:
7148 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.regexp.src);
7149 break;
7150
7151 case T_MATCH:
7152 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.match.regexp);
7153 if (any->as.match.str) {
7154 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.match.str);
7155 }
7156 break;
7157
7158 case T_RATIONAL:
7159 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.rational.num);
7160 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.rational.den);
7161 break;
7162
7163 case T_COMPLEX:
7164 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.complex.real);
7165 gc_mark(objspace, any->as.complex.imag);
7166 break;
7167
7168 case T_STRUCT:
7169 {
7170 long i;
7171 const long len = RSTRUCT_LEN(obj);
7172 const VALUE * const ptr = RSTRUCT_CONST_PTR(obj);
7173
7174 for (i=0; i<len; i++) {
7175 gc_mark(objspace, ptr[i]);
7176 }
7177
7178 if (LIKELY(during_gc) &&
7179 RSTRUCT_TRANSIENT_P(obj)) {
7180 rb_transient_heap_mark(obj, ptr);
7181 }
7182 }
7183 break;
7184
7185 default:
7186#if GC_DEBUG
7187 rb_gcdebug_print_obj_condition((VALUE)obj);
7188#endif
7189 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_MOVED) rb_bug("rb_gc_mark(): %p is T_MOVED", (void *)obj);
7190 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_NONE) rb_bug("rb_gc_mark(): %p is T_NONE", (void *)obj);
7191 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_ZOMBIE) rb_bug("rb_gc_mark(): %p is T_ZOMBIE", (void *)obj);
7192 rb_bug("rb_gc_mark(): unknown data type 0x%x(%p) %s",
7193 BUILTIN_TYPE(obj), (void *)any,
7194 is_pointer_to_heap(objspace, any) ? "corrupted object" : "non object");
7195 }
7196}
7197
7202static inline int
7203gc_mark_stacked_objects(rb_objspace_t *objspace, int incremental, size_t count)
7204{
7205 mark_stack_t *mstack = &objspace->mark_stack;
7206 VALUE obj;
7207#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
7208 size_t marked_slots_at_the_beginning = objspace->marked_slots;
7209 size_t popped_count = 0;
7210#endif
7211
7212 while (pop_mark_stack(mstack, &obj)) {
7213 if (obj == Qundef) continue; /* skip */
7214
7215 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE && !RVALUE_MARKED(obj)) {
7216 rb_bug("gc_mark_stacked_objects: %s is not marked.", obj_info(obj));
7217 }
7218 gc_mark_children(objspace, obj);
7219
7220#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
7221 if (incremental) {
7222 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE && !RVALUE_MARKING(obj)) {
7223 rb_bug("gc_mark_stacked_objects: incremental, but marking bit is 0");
7224 }
7225 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS(obj), obj);
7226 popped_count++;
7227
7228 if (popped_count + (objspace->marked_slots - marked_slots_at_the_beginning) > count) {
7229 break;
7230 }
7231 }
7232 else {
7233 /* just ignore marking bits */
7234 }
7235#endif
7236 }
7237
7238 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 3) gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
7239
7240 if (is_mark_stack_empty(mstack)) {
7241 shrink_stack_chunk_cache(mstack);
7242 return TRUE;
7243 }
7244 else {
7245 return FALSE;
7246 }
7247}
7248
7249static int
7250gc_mark_stacked_objects_incremental(rb_objspace_t *objspace, size_t count)
7251{
7252 return gc_mark_stacked_objects(objspace, TRUE, count);
7253}
7254
7255static int
7256gc_mark_stacked_objects_all(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7257{
7258 return gc_mark_stacked_objects(objspace, FALSE, 0);
7259}
7260
7261#if PRINT_ROOT_TICKS
7262#define MAX_TICKS 0x100
7263static tick_t mark_ticks[MAX_TICKS];
7264static const char *mark_ticks_categories[MAX_TICKS];
7265
7266static void
7267show_mark_ticks(void)
7268{
7269 int i;
7270 fprintf(stderr, "mark ticks result:\n");
7271 for (i=0; i<MAX_TICKS; i++) {
7272 const char *category = mark_ticks_categories[i];
7273 if (category) {
7274 fprintf(stderr, "%s\t%8lu\n", category, (unsigned long)mark_ticks[i]);
7275 }
7276 else {
7277 break;
7278 }
7279 }
7280}
7281
7282#endif /* PRINT_ROOT_TICKS */
7283
7284static void
7285gc_mark_roots(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const char **categoryp)
7286{
7287 struct gc_list *list;
7288 rb_execution_context_t *ec = GET_EC();
7289 rb_vm_t *vm = rb_ec_vm_ptr(ec);
7290
7291#if PRINT_ROOT_TICKS
7292 tick_t start_tick = tick();
7293 int tick_count = 0;
7294 const char *prev_category = 0;
7295
7296 if (mark_ticks_categories[0] == 0) {
7297 atexit(show_mark_ticks);
7298 }
7299#endif
7300
7301 if (categoryp) *categoryp = "xxx";
7302
7303 objspace->rgengc.parent_object = Qfalse;
7304
7305#if PRINT_ROOT_TICKS
7306#define MARK_CHECKPOINT_PRINT_TICK(category) do { \
7307 if (prev_category) { \
7308 tick_t t = tick(); \
7309 mark_ticks[tick_count] = t - start_tick; \
7310 mark_ticks_categories[tick_count] = prev_category; \
7311 tick_count++; \
7312 } \
7313 prev_category = category; \
7314 start_tick = tick(); \
7315} while (0)
7316#else /* PRINT_ROOT_TICKS */
7317#define MARK_CHECKPOINT_PRINT_TICK(category)
7318#endif
7319
7320#define MARK_CHECKPOINT(category) do { \
7321 if (categoryp) *categoryp = category; \
7322 MARK_CHECKPOINT_PRINT_TICK(category); \
7323} while (0)
7324
7325 MARK_CHECKPOINT("vm");
7326 SET_STACK_END;
7327 rb_vm_mark(vm);
7328 if (vm->self) gc_mark(objspace, vm->self);
7329
7330 MARK_CHECKPOINT("finalizers");
7331 mark_finalizer_tbl(objspace, finalizer_table);
7332
7333 MARK_CHECKPOINT("machine_context");
7334 mark_current_machine_context(objspace, ec);
7335
7336 /* mark protected global variables */
7337 MARK_CHECKPOINT("global_list");
7338 for (list = global_list; list; list = list->next) {
7339 gc_mark_maybe(objspace, *list->varptr);
7340 }
7341
7342 MARK_CHECKPOINT("end_proc");
7343 rb_mark_end_proc();
7344
7345 MARK_CHECKPOINT("global_tbl");
7346 rb_gc_mark_global_tbl();
7347
7348 MARK_CHECKPOINT("object_id");
7349 rb_gc_mark(objspace->next_object_id);
7350 mark_tbl_no_pin(objspace, objspace->obj_to_id_tbl); /* Only mark ids */
7351
7352 if (stress_to_class) rb_gc_mark(stress_to_class);
7353
7354 MARK_CHECKPOINT("finish");
7355#undef MARK_CHECKPOINT
7356}
7357
7358#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 4
7359
7360#define MAKE_ROOTSIG(obj) (((VALUE)(obj) << 1) | 0x01)
7361#define IS_ROOTSIG(obj) ((VALUE)(obj) & 0x01)
7362#define GET_ROOTSIG(obj) ((const char *)((VALUE)(obj) >> 1))
7363
7364struct reflist {
7365 VALUE *list;
7366 int pos;
7367 int size;
7368};
7369
7370static struct reflist *
7371reflist_create(VALUE obj)
7372{
7373 struct reflist *refs = xmalloc(sizeof(struct reflist));
7374 refs->size = 1;
7375 refs->list = ALLOC_N(VALUE, refs->size);
7376 refs->list[0] = obj;
7377 refs->pos = 1;
7378 return refs;
7379}
7380
7381static void
7382reflist_destruct(struct reflist *refs)
7383{
7384 xfree(refs->list);
7385 xfree(refs);
7386}
7387
7388static void
7389reflist_add(struct reflist *refs, VALUE obj)
7390{
7391 if (refs->pos == refs->size) {
7392 refs->size *= 2;
7393 SIZED_REALLOC_N(refs->list, VALUE, refs->size, refs->size/2);
7394 }
7395
7396 refs->list[refs->pos++] = obj;
7397}
7398
7399static void
7400reflist_dump(struct reflist *refs)
7401{
7402 int i;
7403 for (i=0; i<refs->pos; i++) {
7404 VALUE obj = refs->list[i];
7405 if (IS_ROOTSIG(obj)) { /* root */
7406 fprintf(stderr, "<root@%s>", GET_ROOTSIG(obj));
7407 }
7408 else {
7409 fprintf(stderr, "<%s>", obj_info(obj));
7410 }
7411 if (i+1 < refs->pos) fprintf(stderr, ", ");
7412 }
7413}
7414
7415static int
7416reflist_referred_from_machine_context(struct reflist *refs)
7417{
7418 int i;
7419 for (i=0; i<refs->pos; i++) {
7420 VALUE obj = refs->list[i];
7421 if (IS_ROOTSIG(obj) && strcmp(GET_ROOTSIG(obj), "machine_context") == 0) return 1;
7422 }
7423 return 0;
7424}
7425
7426struct allrefs {
7427 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
7428 /* a -> obj1
7429 * b -> obj1
7430 * c -> obj1
7431 * c -> obj2
7432 * d -> obj3
7433 * #=> {obj1 => [a, b, c], obj2 => [c, d]}
7434 */
7435 struct st_table *references;
7436 const char *category;
7437 VALUE root_obj;
7438 mark_stack_t mark_stack;
7439};
7440
7441static int
7442allrefs_add(struct allrefs *data, VALUE obj)
7443{
7444 struct reflist *refs;
7445 st_data_t r;
7446
7447 if (st_lookup(data->references, obj, &r)) {
7448 refs = (struct reflist *)r;
7449 reflist_add(refs, data->root_obj);
7450 return 0;
7451 }
7452 else {
7453 refs = reflist_create(data->root_obj);
7454 st_insert(data->references, obj, (st_data_t)refs);
7455 return 1;
7456 }
7457}
7458
7459static void
7460allrefs_i(VALUE obj, void *ptr)
7461{
7462 struct allrefs *data = (struct allrefs *)ptr;
7463
7464 if (allrefs_add(data, obj)) {
7465 push_mark_stack(&data->mark_stack, obj);
7466 }
7467}
7468
7469static void
7470allrefs_roots_i(VALUE obj, void *ptr)
7471{
7472 struct allrefs *data = (struct allrefs *)ptr;
7473 if (strlen(data->category) == 0) rb_bug("!!!");
7474 data->root_obj = MAKE_ROOTSIG(data->category);
7475
7476 if (allrefs_add(data, obj)) {
7477 push_mark_stack(&data->mark_stack, obj);
7478 }
7479}
7480#define PUSH_MARK_FUNC_DATA(v) do { \
7481 struct gc_mark_func_data_struct *prev_mark_func_data = GET_RACTOR()->mfd; \
7482 GET_RACTOR()->mfd = (v);
7483
7484#define POP_MARK_FUNC_DATA() GET_RACTOR()->mfd = prev_mark_func_data;} while (0)
7485
7486static st_table *
7487objspace_allrefs(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7488{
7489 struct allrefs data;
7490 struct gc_mark_func_data_struct mfd;
7491 VALUE obj;
7492 int prev_dont_gc = dont_gc_val();
7493 dont_gc_on();
7494
7495 data.objspace = objspace;
7496 data.references = st_init_numtable();
7497 init_mark_stack(&data.mark_stack);
7498
7499 mfd.mark_func = allrefs_roots_i;
7500 mfd.data = &data;
7501
7502 /* traverse root objects */
7503 PUSH_MARK_FUNC_DATA(&mfd);
7504 GET_RACTOR()->mfd = &mfd;
7505 gc_mark_roots(objspace, &data.category);
7506 POP_MARK_FUNC_DATA();
7507
7508 /* traverse rest objects reachable from root objects */
7509 while (pop_mark_stack(&data.mark_stack, &obj)) {
7510 rb_objspace_reachable_objects_from(data.root_obj = obj, allrefs_i, &data);
7511 }
7512 free_stack_chunks(&data.mark_stack);
7513
7514 dont_gc_set(prev_dont_gc);
7515 return data.references;
7516}
7517
7518static int
7519objspace_allrefs_destruct_i(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t ptr)
7520{
7521 struct reflist *refs = (struct reflist *)value;
7522 reflist_destruct(refs);
7523 return ST_CONTINUE;
7524}
7525
7526static void
7527objspace_allrefs_destruct(struct st_table *refs)
7528{
7529 st_foreach(refs, objspace_allrefs_destruct_i, 0);
7530 st_free_table(refs);
7531}
7532
7533#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 5
7534static int
7535allrefs_dump_i(st_data_t k, st_data_t v, st_data_t ptr)
7536{
7537 VALUE obj = (VALUE)k;
7538 struct reflist *refs = (struct reflist *)v;
7539 fprintf(stderr, "[allrefs_dump_i] %s <- ", obj_info(obj));
7540 reflist_dump(refs);
7541 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
7542 return ST_CONTINUE;
7543}
7544
7545static void
7546allrefs_dump(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7547{
7548 VALUE size = objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table->num_entries;
7549 fprintf(stderr, "[all refs] (size: %"PRIuVALUE")\n", size);
7550 st_foreach(objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table, allrefs_dump_i, 0);
7551}
7552#endif
7553
7554static int
7555gc_check_after_marks_i(st_data_t k, st_data_t v, st_data_t ptr)
7556{
7557 VALUE obj = k;
7558 struct reflist *refs = (struct reflist *)v;
7559 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)ptr;
7560
7561 /* object should be marked or oldgen */
7562 if (!MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(obj), obj)) {
7563 fprintf(stderr, "gc_check_after_marks_i: %s is not marked and not oldgen.\n", obj_info(obj));
7564 fprintf(stderr, "gc_check_after_marks_i: %p is referred from ", (void *)obj);
7565 reflist_dump(refs);
7566
7567 if (reflist_referred_from_machine_context(refs)) {
7568 fprintf(stderr, " (marked from machine stack).\n");
7569 /* marked from machine context can be false positive */
7570 }
7571 else {
7572 objspace->rgengc.error_count++;
7573 fprintf(stderr, "\n");
7574 }
7575 }
7576 return ST_CONTINUE;
7577}
7578
7579static void
7580gc_marks_check(rb_objspace_t *objspace, st_foreach_callback_func *checker_func, const char *checker_name)
7581{
7582 size_t saved_malloc_increase = objspace->malloc_params.increase;
7583#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
7584 size_t saved_oldmalloc_increase = objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase;
7585#endif
7586 VALUE already_disabled = rb_objspace_gc_disable(objspace);
7587
7588 objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table = objspace_allrefs(objspace);
7589
7590 if (checker_func) {
7591 st_foreach(objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table, checker_func, (st_data_t)objspace);
7592 }
7593
7594 if (objspace->rgengc.error_count > 0) {
7595#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 5
7596 allrefs_dump(objspace);
7597#endif
7598 if (checker_name) rb_bug("%s: GC has problem.", checker_name);
7599 }
7600
7601 objspace_allrefs_destruct(objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table);
7602 objspace->rgengc.allrefs_table = 0;
7603
7604 if (already_disabled == Qfalse) rb_objspace_gc_enable(objspace);
7605 objspace->malloc_params.increase = saved_malloc_increase;
7606#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
7607 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase = saved_oldmalloc_increase;
7608#endif
7609}
7610#endif /* RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 4 */
7611
7612struct verify_internal_consistency_struct {
7613 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
7614 int err_count;
7615 size_t live_object_count;
7616 size_t zombie_object_count;
7617
7618 VALUE parent;
7619 size_t old_object_count;
7620 size_t remembered_shady_count;
7621};
7622
7623static void
7624check_generation_i(const VALUE child, void *ptr)
7625{
7626 struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *data = (struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *)ptr;
7627 const VALUE parent = data->parent;
7628
7629 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE) GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_OLD_P(parent));
7630
7631 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(child)) {
7632 if (!RVALUE_REMEMBERED(parent) &&
7633 !RVALUE_REMEMBERED(child) &&
7634 !RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(child)) {
7635 fprintf(stderr, "verify_internal_consistency_reachable_i: WB miss (O->Y) %s -> %s\n", obj_info(parent), obj_info(child));
7636 data->err_count++;
7637 }
7638 }
7639}
7640
7641static void
7642check_color_i(const VALUE child, void *ptr)
7643{
7644 struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *data = (struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *)ptr;
7645 const VALUE parent = data->parent;
7646
7647 if (!RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(parent) && RVALUE_WHITE_P(child)) {
7648 fprintf(stderr, "verify_internal_consistency_reachable_i: WB miss (B->W) - %s -> %s\n",
7649 obj_info(parent), obj_info(child));
7650 data->err_count++;
7651 }
7652}
7653
7654static void
7655check_children_i(const VALUE child, void *ptr)
7656{
7657 struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *data = (struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *)ptr;
7658 if (check_rvalue_consistency_force(child, FALSE) != 0) {
7659 fprintf(stderr, "check_children_i: %s has error (referenced from %s)",
7660 obj_info(child), obj_info(data->parent));
7661 rb_print_backtrace(); /* C backtrace will help to debug */
7662
7663 data->err_count++;
7664 }
7665}
7666
7667static int
7668verify_internal_consistency_i(void *page_start, void *page_end, size_t stride,
7669 struct verify_internal_consistency_struct *data)
7670{
7671 VALUE obj;
7672 rb_objspace_t *objspace = data->objspace;
7673
7674 for (obj = (VALUE)page_start; obj != (VALUE)page_end; obj += stride) {
7675 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(obj);
7676 asan_unpoison_object(obj, false);
7677
7678 if (is_live_object(objspace, obj)) {
7679 /* count objects */
7680 data->live_object_count++;
7681 data->parent = obj;
7682
7683 /* Normally, we don't expect T_MOVED objects to be in the heap.
7684 * But they can stay alive on the stack, */
7685 if (!gc_object_moved_p(objspace, obj)) {
7686 /* moved slots don't have children */
7687 rb_objspace_reachable_objects_from(obj, check_children_i, (void *)data);
7688 }
7689
7690 /* check health of children */
7691 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) data->old_object_count++;
7692 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj) && RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(obj)) data->remembered_shady_count++;
7693
7694 if (!is_marking(objspace) && RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
7695 /* reachable objects from an oldgen object should be old or (young with remember) */
7696 data->parent = obj;
7697 rb_objspace_reachable_objects_from(obj, check_generation_i, (void *)data);
7698 }
7699
7700 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
7701 if (RVALUE_BLACK_P(obj)) {
7702 /* reachable objects from black objects should be black or grey objects */
7703 data->parent = obj;
7704 rb_objspace_reachable_objects_from(obj, check_color_i, (void *)data);
7705 }
7706 }
7707 }
7708 else {
7709 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_ZOMBIE) {
7710 GC_ASSERT((RBASIC(obj)->flags & ~FL_SEEN_OBJ_ID) == T_ZOMBIE);
7711 data->zombie_object_count++;
7712 }
7713 }
7714 if (poisoned) {
7715 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(obj) == T_NONE);
7716 asan_poison_object(obj);
7717 }
7718 }
7719
7720 return 0;
7721}
7722
7723static int
7724gc_verify_heap_page(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct heap_page *page, VALUE obj)
7725{
7726 unsigned int has_remembered_shady = FALSE;
7727 unsigned int has_remembered_old = FALSE;
7728 int remembered_old_objects = 0;
7729 int free_objects = 0;
7730 int zombie_objects = 0;
7731
7732 short slot_size = page->slot_size;
7733 uintptr_t start = (uintptr_t)page->start;
7734 uintptr_t end = start + page->total_slots * slot_size;
7735
7736 for (uintptr_t ptr = start; ptr < end; ptr += slot_size) {
7737 VALUE val = (VALUE)ptr;
7738 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(val);
7739 asan_unpoison_object(val, false);
7740
7741 if (RBASIC(val) == 0) free_objects++;
7742 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(val) == T_ZOMBIE) zombie_objects++;
7743 if (RVALUE_PAGE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(page, val) && RVALUE_PAGE_WB_UNPROTECTED(page, val)) {
7744 has_remembered_shady = TRUE;
7745 }
7746 if (RVALUE_PAGE_MARKING(page, val)) {
7747 has_remembered_old = TRUE;
7748 remembered_old_objects++;
7749 }
7750
7751 if (poisoned) {
7752 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(val) == T_NONE);
7753 asan_poison_object(val);
7754 }
7755 }
7756
7757 if (!is_incremental_marking(objspace) &&
7758 page->flags.has_remembered_objects == FALSE && has_remembered_old == TRUE) {
7759
7760 for (uintptr_t ptr = start; ptr < end; ptr += slot_size) {
7761 VALUE val = (VALUE)ptr;
7762 if (RVALUE_PAGE_MARKING(page, val)) {
7763 fprintf(stderr, "marking -> %s\n", obj_info(val));
7764 }
7765 }
7766 rb_bug("page %p's has_remembered_objects should be false, but there are remembered old objects (%d). %s",
7767 (void *)page, remembered_old_objects, obj ? obj_info(obj) : "");
7768 }
7769
7770 if (page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects == FALSE && has_remembered_shady == TRUE) {
7771 rb_bug("page %p's has_remembered_shady should be false, but there are remembered shady objects. %s",
7772 (void *)page, obj ? obj_info(obj) : "");
7773 }
7774
7775 if (0) {
7776 /* free_slots may not equal to free_objects */
7777 if (page->free_slots != free_objects) {
7778 rb_bug("page %p's free_slots should be %d, but %d\n", (void *)page, page->free_slots, free_objects);
7779 }
7780 }
7781 if (page->final_slots != zombie_objects) {
7782 rb_bug("page %p's final_slots should be %d, but %d\n", (void *)page, page->final_slots, zombie_objects);
7783 }
7784
7785 return remembered_old_objects;
7786}
7787
7788static int
7789gc_verify_heap_pages_(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct ccan_list_head *head)
7790{
7791 int remembered_old_objects = 0;
7792 struct heap_page *page = 0;
7793
7794 ccan_list_for_each(head, page, page_node) {
7795 asan_unpoison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*), false);
7796 RVALUE *p = page->freelist;
7797 while (p) {
7798 VALUE vp = (VALUE)p;
7799 VALUE prev = vp;
7800 asan_unpoison_object(vp, false);
7801 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(vp) != T_NONE) {
7802 fprintf(stderr, "freelist slot expected to be T_NONE but was: %s\n", obj_info(vp));
7803 }
7804 p = p->as.free.next;
7805 asan_poison_object(prev);
7806 }
7807 asan_poison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*));
7808
7809 if (page->flags.has_remembered_objects == FALSE) {
7810 remembered_old_objects += gc_verify_heap_page(objspace, page, Qfalse);
7811 }
7812 }
7813
7814 return remembered_old_objects;
7815}
7816
7817static int
7818gc_verify_heap_pages(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7819{
7820 int remembered_old_objects = 0;
7821 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
7822 remembered_old_objects += gc_verify_heap_pages_(objspace, &(SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[i])->pages));
7823 remembered_old_objects += gc_verify_heap_pages_(objspace, &(SIZE_POOL_TOMB_HEAP(&size_pools[i])->pages));
7824 }
7825 return remembered_old_objects;
7826}
7827
7828/*
7829 * call-seq:
7830 * GC.verify_internal_consistency -> nil
7831 *
7832 * Verify internal consistency.
7833 *
7834 * This method is implementation specific.
7835 * Now this method checks generational consistency
7836 * if RGenGC is supported.
7837 */
7838static VALUE
7839gc_verify_internal_consistency_m(VALUE dummy)
7840{
7841 gc_verify_internal_consistency(&rb_objspace);
7842 return Qnil;
7843}
7844
7845static void
7846gc_verify_internal_consistency_(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7847{
7848 struct verify_internal_consistency_struct data = {0};
7849
7850 data.objspace = objspace;
7851 gc_report(5, objspace, "gc_verify_internal_consistency: start\n");
7852
7853 /* check relations */
7854 for (size_t i = 0; i < heap_allocated_pages; i++) {
7855 struct heap_page *page = heap_pages_sorted[i];
7856 short slot_size = page->slot_size;
7857
7858 uintptr_t start = (uintptr_t)page->start;
7859 uintptr_t end = start + page->total_slots * slot_size;
7860
7861 verify_internal_consistency_i((void *)start, (void *)end, slot_size, &data);
7862 }
7863
7864 if (data.err_count != 0) {
7865#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 5
7866 objspace->rgengc.error_count = data.err_count;
7867 gc_marks_check(objspace, NULL, NULL);
7868 allrefs_dump(objspace);
7869#endif
7870 rb_bug("gc_verify_internal_consistency: found internal inconsistency.");
7871 }
7872
7873 /* check heap_page status */
7874 gc_verify_heap_pages(objspace);
7875
7876 /* check counters */
7877
7878 if (!is_lazy_sweeping(objspace) &&
7879 !finalizing &&
7880 ruby_single_main_ractor != NULL) {
7881 if (objspace_live_slots(objspace) != data.live_object_count) {
7882 fprintf(stderr, "heap_pages_final_slots: %"PRIdSIZE", "
7883 "objspace->profile.total_freed_objects: %"PRIdSIZE"\n",
7884 heap_pages_final_slots, objspace->profile.total_freed_objects);
7885 rb_bug("inconsistent live slot number: expect %"PRIuSIZE", but %"PRIuSIZE".",
7886 objspace_live_slots(objspace), data.live_object_count);
7887 }
7888 }
7889
7890 if (!is_marking(objspace)) {
7891 if (objspace->rgengc.old_objects != data.old_object_count) {
7892 rb_bug("inconsistent old slot number: expect %"PRIuSIZE", but %"PRIuSIZE".",
7893 objspace->rgengc.old_objects, data.old_object_count);
7894 }
7895 if (objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects != data.remembered_shady_count) {
7896 rb_bug("inconsistent number of wb unprotected objects: expect %"PRIuSIZE", but %"PRIuSIZE".",
7897 objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects, data.remembered_shady_count);
7898 }
7899 }
7900
7901 if (!finalizing) {
7902 size_t list_count = 0;
7903
7904 {
7905 VALUE z = heap_pages_deferred_final;
7906 while (z) {
7907 list_count++;
7908 z = RZOMBIE(z)->next;
7909 }
7910 }
7911
7912 if (heap_pages_final_slots != data.zombie_object_count ||
7913 heap_pages_final_slots != list_count) {
7914
7915 rb_bug("inconsistent finalizing object count:\n"
7916 " expect %"PRIuSIZE"\n"
7917 " but %"PRIuSIZE" zombies\n"
7918 " heap_pages_deferred_final list has %"PRIuSIZE" items.",
7919 heap_pages_final_slots,
7920 data.zombie_object_count,
7921 list_count);
7922 }
7923 }
7924
7925 gc_report(5, objspace, "gc_verify_internal_consistency: OK\n");
7926}
7927
7928static void
7929gc_verify_internal_consistency(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
7930{
7931 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
7932 {
7933 rb_vm_barrier(); // stop other ractors
7934
7935 unsigned int prev_during_gc = during_gc;
7936 during_gc = FALSE; // stop gc here
7937 {
7938 gc_verify_internal_consistency_(objspace);
7939 }
7940 during_gc = prev_during_gc;
7941 }
7942 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
7943}
7944
7945void
7946rb_gc_verify_internal_consistency(void)
7947{
7948 gc_verify_internal_consistency(&rb_objspace);
7949}
7950
7951static VALUE
7952gc_verify_transient_heap_internal_consistency(VALUE dmy)
7953{
7954 rb_transient_heap_verify();
7955 return Qnil;
7956}
7957
7958#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
7959static void
7960heap_move_pooled_pages_to_free_pages(rb_heap_t *heap)
7961{
7962 if (heap->pooled_pages) {
7963 if (heap->free_pages) {
7964 struct heap_page *free_pages_tail = heap->free_pages;
7965 while (free_pages_tail->free_next) {
7966 free_pages_tail = free_pages_tail->free_next;
7967 }
7968 free_pages_tail->free_next = heap->pooled_pages;
7969 }
7970 else {
7971 heap->free_pages = heap->pooled_pages;
7972 }
7973
7974 heap->pooled_pages = NULL;
7975 }
7976}
7977#endif
7978
7979/* marks */
7980
7981static void
7982gc_marks_start(rb_objspace_t *objspace, int full_mark)
7983{
7984 /* start marking */
7985 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_start: (%s)\n", full_mark ? "full" : "minor");
7986 gc_mode_transition(objspace, gc_mode_marking);
7987
7988 if (full_mark) {
7989#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
7990 size_t incremental_marking_steps = (objspace->rincgc.pooled_slots / INCREMENTAL_MARK_STEP_ALLOCATIONS) + 1;
7991 objspace->rincgc.step_slots = (objspace->marked_slots * 2) / incremental_marking_steps;
7992
7993 if (0) fprintf(stderr, "objspace->marked_slots: %"PRIdSIZE", "
7994 "objspace->rincgc.pooled_page_num: %"PRIdSIZE", "
7995 "objspace->rincgc.step_slots: %"PRIdSIZE", \n",
7996 objspace->marked_slots, objspace->rincgc.pooled_slots, objspace->rincgc.step_slots);
7997#endif
7998 objspace->flags.during_minor_gc = FALSE;
7999 if (ruby_enable_autocompact) {
8000 objspace->flags.during_compacting |= TRUE;
8001 }
8002 objspace->profile.major_gc_count++;
8003 objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects = 0;
8004 objspace->rgengc.old_objects = 0;
8005 objspace->rgengc.last_major_gc = objspace->profile.count;
8006 objspace->marked_slots = 0;
8007
8008 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8009 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
8010 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
8011 rgengc_mark_and_rememberset_clear(objspace, heap);
8012 heap_move_pooled_pages_to_free_pages(heap);
8013 }
8014 }
8015 else {
8016 objspace->flags.during_minor_gc = TRUE;
8017 objspace->marked_slots =
8018 objspace->rgengc.old_objects + objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects; /* uncollectible objects are marked already */
8019 objspace->profile.minor_gc_count++;
8020
8021 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8022 rgengc_rememberset_mark(objspace, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[i]));
8023 }
8024 }
8025
8026 gc_mark_roots(objspace, NULL);
8027
8028 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_start: (%s) end, stack in %"PRIdSIZE"\n",
8029 full_mark ? "full" : "minor", mark_stack_size(&objspace->mark_stack));
8030}
8031
8032#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8033static inline void
8034gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects_plane(rb_objspace_t *objspace, uintptr_t p, bits_t bits)
8035{
8036 if (bits) {
8037 do {
8038 if (bits & 1) {
8039 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects: marked shady: %s\n", obj_info((VALUE)p));
8040 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED((VALUE)p));
8041 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_MARKED((VALUE)p));
8042 gc_mark_children(objspace, (VALUE)p);
8043 }
8044 p += BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8045 bits >>= 1;
8046 } while (bits);
8047 }
8048}
8049
8050static void
8051gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap)
8052{
8053 struct heap_page *page = 0;
8054
8055 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
8056 bits_t *mark_bits = page->mark_bits;
8057 bits_t *wbun_bits = page->wb_unprotected_bits;
8058 uintptr_t p = page->start;
8059 size_t j;
8060
8061 bits_t bits = mark_bits[0] & wbun_bits[0];
8062 bits >>= NUM_IN_PAGE(p);
8063 gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects_plane(objspace, p, bits);
8064 p += (BITS_BITLENGTH - NUM_IN_PAGE(p)) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8065
8066 for (j=1; j<HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT; j++) {
8067 bits_t bits = mark_bits[j] & wbun_bits[j];
8068
8069 gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects_plane(objspace, p, bits);
8070 p += BITS_BITLENGTH * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8071 }
8072 }
8073
8074 gc_mark_stacked_objects_all(objspace);
8075}
8076#endif
8077
8078static void
8079gc_marks_finish(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
8080{
8081#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8082 /* finish incremental GC */
8083 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8084 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE && is_mark_stack_empty(&objspace->mark_stack) == 0) {
8085 rb_bug("gc_marks_finish: mark stack is not empty (%"PRIdSIZE").",
8086 mark_stack_size(&objspace->mark_stack));
8087 }
8088
8089 gc_mark_roots(objspace, 0);
8090 while (gc_mark_stacked_objects_incremental(objspace, INT_MAX) == false);
8091
8092#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
8093 if (gc_verify_heap_pages(objspace) != 0) {
8094 rb_bug("gc_marks_finish (incremental): there are remembered old objects.");
8095 }
8096#endif
8097
8098 objspace->flags.during_incremental_marking = FALSE;
8099 /* check children of all marked wb-unprotected objects */
8100 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8101 gc_marks_wb_unprotected_objects(objspace, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[i]));
8102 }
8103 }
8104#endif /* GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK */
8105
8106#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
8107 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
8108#endif
8109
8110 if (is_full_marking(objspace)) {
8111 /* See the comment about RUBY_GC_HEAP_OLDOBJECT_LIMIT_FACTOR */
8112 const double r = gc_params.oldobject_limit_factor;
8113 objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects_limit = (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects * r);
8114 objspace->rgengc.old_objects_limit = (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.old_objects * r);
8115 }
8116
8117#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 4
8118 during_gc = FALSE;
8119 gc_marks_check(objspace, gc_check_after_marks_i, "after_marks");
8120 during_gc = TRUE;
8121#endif
8122
8123 {
8124 /* decide full GC is needed or not */
8125 size_t total_slots = heap_allocatable_slots(objspace) + heap_eden_total_slots(objspace);
8126 size_t sweep_slots = total_slots - objspace->marked_slots; /* will be swept slots */
8127 size_t max_free_slots = (size_t)(total_slots * gc_params.heap_free_slots_max_ratio);
8128 size_t min_free_slots = (size_t)(total_slots * gc_params.heap_free_slots_min_ratio);
8129 int full_marking = is_full_marking(objspace);
8130 const int r_cnt = GET_VM()->ractor.cnt;
8131 const int r_mul = r_cnt > 8 ? 8 : r_cnt; // upto 8
8132
8133 GC_ASSERT(heap_eden_total_slots(objspace) >= objspace->marked_slots);
8134
8135 /* setup free-able page counts */
8136 if (max_free_slots < gc_params.heap_init_slots * r_mul) {
8137 max_free_slots = gc_params.heap_init_slots * r_mul;
8138 }
8139
8140 if (sweep_slots > max_free_slots) {
8141 heap_pages_freeable_pages = (sweep_slots - max_free_slots) / HEAP_PAGE_OBJ_LIMIT;
8142 }
8143 else {
8144 heap_pages_freeable_pages = 0;
8145 }
8146
8147 /* check free_min */
8148 if (min_free_slots < gc_params.heap_free_slots * r_mul) {
8149 min_free_slots = gc_params.heap_free_slots * r_mul;
8150 }
8151
8152 if (sweep_slots < min_free_slots) {
8153 if (!full_marking) {
8154 if (objspace->profile.count - objspace->rgengc.last_major_gc < RVALUE_OLD_AGE) {
8155 full_marking = TRUE;
8156 /* do not update last_major_gc, because full marking is not done. */
8157 /* goto increment; */
8158 }
8159 else {
8160 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_finish: next is full GC!!)\n");
8161 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_NOFREE;
8162 }
8163 }
8164
8165#if !USE_RVARGC
8166 if (full_marking) {
8167 /* increment: */
8168 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_finish: heap_set_increment!!\n");
8169 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[0];
8170 size_pool_allocatable_pages_set(objspace, size_pool, heap_extend_pages(objspace, size_pool, sweep_slots, total_slots, heap_allocated_pages + heap_allocatable_pages(objspace)));
8171
8172 heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool));
8173 }
8174#endif
8175 }
8176
8177 if (full_marking) {
8178 /* See the comment about RUBY_GC_HEAP_OLDOBJECT_LIMIT_FACTOR */
8179 const double r = gc_params.oldobject_limit_factor;
8180 objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects_limit = (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects * r);
8181 objspace->rgengc.old_objects_limit = (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.old_objects * r);
8182 }
8183
8184 if (objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects > objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects_limit) {
8185 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_SHADY;
8186 }
8187 if (objspace->rgengc.old_objects > objspace->rgengc.old_objects_limit) {
8188 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDGEN;
8189 }
8190 if (RGENGC_FORCE_MAJOR_GC) {
8191 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc = GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_FORCE;
8192 }
8193
8194 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_finish (marks %"PRIdSIZE" objects, "
8195 "old %"PRIdSIZE" objects, total %"PRIdSIZE" slots, "
8196 "sweep %"PRIdSIZE" slots, increment: %"PRIdSIZE", next GC: %s)\n",
8197 objspace->marked_slots, objspace->rgengc.old_objects, heap_eden_total_slots(objspace), sweep_slots, heap_allocatable_pages(objspace),
8198 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc ? "major" : "minor");
8199 }
8200
8201 rb_transient_heap_finish_marking();
8202 rb_ractor_finish_marking();
8203
8204 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_GC_END_MARK, 0);
8205}
8206
8207#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8208static void
8209gc_marks_step(rb_objspace_t *objspace, size_t slots)
8210{
8211 GC_ASSERT(is_marking(objspace));
8212
8213 if (gc_mark_stacked_objects_incremental(objspace, slots)) {
8214 gc_marks_finish(objspace);
8215 gc_sweep(objspace);
8216 }
8217 if (0) fprintf(stderr, "objspace->marked_slots: %"PRIdSIZE"\n", objspace->marked_slots);
8218}
8219#endif
8220
8221static bool
8222gc_compact_heap_cursors_met_p(rb_heap_t *heap)
8223{
8224 return heap->sweeping_page == heap->compact_cursor;
8225}
8226
8227static bool
8228gc_compact_move(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap, VALUE src)
8229{
8230 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(src) != T_MOVED);
8231 rb_heap_t *dheap = heap;
8232
8233 if (gc_compact_heap_cursors_met_p(dheap)) {
8234 return false;
8235 }
8236 while (!try_move(objspace, dheap, dheap->free_pages, src)) {
8237 struct gc_sweep_context ctx = {
8238 .page = dheap->sweeping_page,
8239 .final_slots = 0,
8240 .freed_slots = 0,
8241 .empty_slots = 0,
8242 };
8243 gc_sweep_page(objspace, heap, &ctx);
8244 if (dheap->sweeping_page->free_slots > 0) {
8245 heap_add_freepage(dheap, dheap->sweeping_page);
8246 };
8247
8248 dheap->sweeping_page = ccan_list_next(&dheap->pages, dheap->sweeping_page, page_node);
8249 if (gc_compact_heap_cursors_met_p(dheap)) {
8250 return false;
8251 }
8252 }
8253 return true;
8254}
8255
8256static bool
8257gc_compact_plane(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap, uintptr_t p, bits_t bitset, struct heap_page *page) {
8258 short slot_size = page->slot_size;
8259 short slot_bits = slot_size / BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8260 GC_ASSERT(slot_bits > 0);
8261
8262 do {
8263 VALUE vp = (VALUE)p;
8264 GC_ASSERT(vp % sizeof(RVALUE) == 0);
8265
8266 if (bitset & 1) {
8267 objspace->rcompactor.considered_count_table[BUILTIN_TYPE(vp)]++;
8268
8269 if (!gc_compact_move(objspace, heap, vp)) {
8270 //the cursors met. bubble up
8271 return false;
8272 }
8273 }
8274 p += slot_size;
8275 bitset >>= slot_bits;
8276 } while (bitset);
8277
8278 return true;
8279}
8280
8281// Iterate up all the objects in page, moving them to where they want to go
8282static bool
8283gc_compact_page(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap, struct heap_page *page)
8284{
8285 GC_ASSERT(page == heap->compact_cursor);
8286
8287 bits_t *mark_bits, *pin_bits;
8288 bits_t bitset;
8289 uintptr_t p = page->start;
8290
8291 mark_bits = page->mark_bits;
8292 pin_bits = page->pinned_bits;
8293
8294 // objects that can be moved are marked and not pinned
8295 bitset = (mark_bits[0] & ~pin_bits[0]);
8296 bitset >>= NUM_IN_PAGE(p);
8297 if (bitset) {
8298 if (!gc_compact_plane(objspace, heap, (uintptr_t)p, bitset, page))
8299 return false;
8300 }
8301 p += (BITS_BITLENGTH - NUM_IN_PAGE(p)) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8302
8303 for (int j = 1; j < HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT; j++) {
8304 bitset = (mark_bits[j] & ~pin_bits[j]);
8305 if (bitset) {
8306 if (!gc_compact_plane(objspace, heap, (uintptr_t)p, bitset, page))
8307 return false;
8308 }
8309 p += BITS_BITLENGTH * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8310 }
8311
8312 return true;
8313}
8314
8315static bool
8316gc_compact_all_compacted_p(rb_objspace_t *objspace) {
8317 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8318 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
8319 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
8320
8321 if (heap->total_pages > 0 &&
8322 !gc_compact_heap_cursors_met_p(heap)) {
8323 return false;
8324 }
8325 }
8326
8327 return true;
8328}
8329
8330static void
8331gc_sweep_compact(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
8332{
8333 gc_compact_start(objspace);
8334#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
8335 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
8336#endif
8337
8338 while (!gc_compact_all_compacted_p(objspace)) {
8339 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8340 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
8341 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
8342
8343 if (gc_compact_heap_cursors_met_p(heap)) {
8344 continue;
8345 }
8346
8347 struct heap_page *start_page = heap->compact_cursor;
8348
8349 if (!gc_compact_page(objspace, size_pool, heap, start_page)) {
8350 GC_ASSERT(heap->sweeping_page == heap->compact_cursor);
8351 lock_page_body(objspace, GET_PAGE_BODY(start_page->start));
8352
8353 continue;
8354 }
8355
8356 // If we get here, we've finished moving all objects on the compact_cursor page
8357 // So we can lock it and move the cursor on to the next one.
8358 lock_page_body(objspace, GET_PAGE_BODY(start_page->start));
8359 heap->compact_cursor = ccan_list_prev(&heap->pages, heap->compact_cursor, page_node);
8360 }
8361 }
8362
8363 gc_compact_finish(objspace);
8364
8365#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
8366 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
8367#endif
8368}
8369
8370static void
8371gc_marks_rest(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
8372{
