8373 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_marks_rest\n");
8374
8375#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8376 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
8377 SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(&size_pools[i])->pooled_pages = NULL;
8378 }
8379#endif
8380
8381 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8382 while (gc_mark_stacked_objects_incremental(objspace, INT_MAX) == FALSE);
8383 }
8384 else {
8385 gc_mark_stacked_objects_all(objspace);
8386 }
8387
8388 gc_marks_finish(objspace);
8389
8390 /* move to sweep */
8391 gc_sweep(objspace);
8392}
8393
8394static void
8395gc_marks_continue(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap)
8396{
8397 GC_ASSERT(dont_gc_val() == FALSE);
8398#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8399
8400 unsigned int lock_lev;
8401 gc_enter(objspace, gc_enter_event_mark_continue, &lock_lev);
8402
8403 if (heap->free_pages) {
8404 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_marks_continue: has pooled pages");
8405 gc_marks_step(objspace, objspace->rincgc.step_slots);
8406 }
8407 else {
8408 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_marks_continue: no more pooled pages (stack depth: %"PRIdSIZE").\n",
8409 mark_stack_size(&objspace->mark_stack));
8410 gc_marks_rest(objspace);
8411 }
8412
8413 gc_exit(objspace, gc_enter_event_mark_continue, &lock_lev);
8414#endif
8415}
8416
8417static void
8418gc_marks(rb_objspace_t *objspace, int full_mark)
8419{
8420 gc_prof_mark_timer_start(objspace);
8421
8422 /* setup marking */
8423
8424 gc_marks_start(objspace, full_mark);
8425 if (!is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8426 gc_marks_rest(objspace);
8427 }
8428
8429#if RGENGC_PROFILE > 0
8430 if (gc_prof_record(objspace)) {
8431 gc_profile_record *record = gc_prof_record(objspace);
8432 record->old_objects = objspace->rgengc.old_objects;
8433 }
8434#endif
8435 gc_prof_mark_timer_stop(objspace);
8436}
8437
8438/* RGENGC */
8439
8440static void
8441gc_report_body(int level, rb_objspace_t *objspace, const char *fmt, ...)
8442{
8443 if (level <= RGENGC_DEBUG) {
8444 char buf[1024];
8445 FILE *out = stderr;
8446 va_list args;
8447 const char *status = " ";
8448
8449 if (during_gc) {
8450 status = is_full_marking(objspace) ? "+" : "-";
8451 }
8452 else {
8453 if (is_lazy_sweeping(objspace)) {
8454 status = "S";
8455 }
8456 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8457 status = "M";
8458 }
8459 }
8460
8461 va_start(args, fmt);
8462 vsnprintf(buf, 1024, fmt, args);
8463 va_end(args);
8464
8465 fprintf(out, "%s|", status);
8466 fputs(buf, out);
8467 }
8468}
8469
8470/* bit operations */
8471
8472static int
8473rgengc_remembersetbits_get(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
8474{
8475 return RVALUE_REMEMBERED(obj);
8476}
8477
8478static int
8479rgengc_remembersetbits_set(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
8480{
8481 struct heap_page *page = GET_HEAP_PAGE(obj);
8482 bits_t *bits = &page->marking_bits[0];
8483
8484 GC_ASSERT(!is_incremental_marking(objspace));
8485
8486 if (MARKED_IN_BITMAP(bits, obj)) {
8487 return FALSE;
8488 }
8489 else {
8490 page->flags.has_remembered_objects = TRUE;
8491 MARK_IN_BITMAP(bits, obj);
8492 return TRUE;
8493 }
8494}
8495
8496/* wb, etc */
8497
8498/* return FALSE if already remembered */
8499static int
8500rgengc_remember(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
8501{
8502 gc_report(6, objspace, "rgengc_remember: %s %s\n", obj_info(obj),
8503 rgengc_remembersetbits_get(objspace, obj) ? "was already remembered" : "is remembered now");
8504
8505 check_rvalue_consistency(obj);
8506
8507 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE) {
8508 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj)) rb_bug("rgengc_remember: %s is not wb protected.", obj_info(obj));
8509 }
8510
8511#if RGENGC_PROFILE > 0
8512 if (!rgengc_remembered(objspace, obj)) {
8513 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj) == 0) {
8514 objspace->profile.total_remembered_normal_object_count++;
8515#if RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2
8516 objspace->profile.remembered_normal_object_count_types[BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)]++;
8517#endif
8518 }
8519 }
8520#endif /* RGENGC_PROFILE > 0 */
8521
8522 return rgengc_remembersetbits_set(objspace, obj);
8523}
8524
8525static int
8526rgengc_remembered_sweep(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
8527{
8528 int result = rgengc_remembersetbits_get(objspace, obj);
8529 check_rvalue_consistency(obj);
8530 return result;
8531}
8532
8533static int
8534rgengc_remembered(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
8535{
8536 gc_report(6, objspace, "rgengc_remembered: %s\n", obj_info(obj));
8537 return rgengc_remembered_sweep(objspace, obj);
8538}
8539
8540#ifndef PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK
8541#define PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK 0
8542#endif
8543
8544static inline void
8545rgengc_rememberset_mark_plane(rb_objspace_t *objspace, uintptr_t p, bits_t bitset)
8546{
8547 if (bitset) {
8548 do {
8549 if (bitset & 1) {
8550 VALUE obj = (VALUE)p;
8551 gc_report(2, objspace, "rgengc_rememberset_mark: mark %s\n", obj_info(obj));
8552 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(obj));
8553 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_OLD_P(obj) || RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj));
8554
8555 gc_mark_children(objspace, obj);
8556 }
8557 p += BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8558 bitset >>= 1;
8559 } while (bitset);
8560 }
8561}
8562
8563static void
8564rgengc_rememberset_mark(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap)
8565{
8566 size_t j;
8567 struct heap_page *page = 0;
8568#if PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK
8569 int has_old = 0, has_shady = 0, has_both = 0, skip = 0;
8570#endif
8571 gc_report(1, objspace, "rgengc_rememberset_mark: start\n");
8572
8573 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
8574 if (page->flags.has_remembered_objects | page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects) {
8575 uintptr_t p = page->start;
8576 bits_t bitset, bits[HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT];
8577 bits_t *marking_bits = page->marking_bits;
8578 bits_t *uncollectible_bits = page->uncollectible_bits;
8579 bits_t *wb_unprotected_bits = page->wb_unprotected_bits;
8580#if PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK
8581 if (page->flags.has_remembered_objects && page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects) has_both++;
8582 else if (page->flags.has_remembered_objects) has_old++;
8583 else if (page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects) has_shady++;
8584#endif
8585 for (j=0; j<HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT; j++) {
8586 bits[j] = marking_bits[j] | (uncollectible_bits[j] & wb_unprotected_bits[j]);
8587 marking_bits[j] = 0;
8588 }
8589 page->flags.has_remembered_objects = FALSE;
8590
8591 bitset = bits[0];
8592 bitset >>= NUM_IN_PAGE(p);
8593 rgengc_rememberset_mark_plane(objspace, p, bitset);
8594 p += (BITS_BITLENGTH - NUM_IN_PAGE(p)) * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8595
8596 for (j=1; j < HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_LIMIT; j++) {
8597 bitset = bits[j];
8598 rgengc_rememberset_mark_plane(objspace, p, bitset);
8599 p += BITS_BITLENGTH * BASE_SLOT_SIZE;
8600 }
8601 }
8602#if PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK
8603 else {
8604 skip++;
8605 }
8606#endif
8607 }
8608
8609#if PROFILE_REMEMBERSET_MARK
8610 fprintf(stderr, "%d\t%d\t%d\t%d\n", has_both, has_old, has_shady, skip);
8611#endif
8612 gc_report(1, objspace, "rgengc_rememberset_mark: finished\n");
8613}
8614
8615static void
8616rgengc_mark_and_rememberset_clear(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_heap_t *heap)
8617{
8618 struct heap_page *page = 0;
8619
8620 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
8621 memset(&page->mark_bits[0], 0, HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_SIZE);
8622 memset(&page->uncollectible_bits[0], 0, HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_SIZE);
8623 memset(&page->marking_bits[0], 0, HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_SIZE);
8624 memset(&page->pinned_bits[0], 0, HEAP_PAGE_BITMAP_SIZE);
8625 page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects = FALSE;
8626 page->flags.has_remembered_objects = FALSE;
8627 }
8628}
8629
8630/* RGENGC: APIs */
8631
8632NOINLINE(static void gc_writebarrier_generational(VALUE a, VALUE b, rb_objspace_t *objspace));
8633
8634static void
8635gc_writebarrier_generational(VALUE a, VALUE b, rb_objspace_t *objspace)
8636{
8637 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE) {
8638 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(a)) rb_bug("gc_writebarrier_generational: %s is not an old object.", obj_info(a));
8639 if ( RVALUE_OLD_P(b)) rb_bug("gc_writebarrier_generational: %s is an old object.", obj_info(b));
8640 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) rb_bug("gc_writebarrier_generational: called while incremental marking: %s -> %s", obj_info(a), obj_info(b));
8641 }
8642
8643#if 1
8644 /* mark `a' and remember (default behavior) */
8645 if (!rgengc_remembered(objspace, a)) {
8646 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER_NO_BARRIER();
8647 {
8648 rgengc_remember(objspace, a);
8649 }
8650 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE_NO_BARRIER();
8651 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_generational: %s (remembered) -> %s\n", obj_info(a), obj_info(b));
8652 }
8653#else
8654 /* mark `b' and remember */
8655 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(b), b);
8656 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(b)) {
8657 gc_remember_unprotected(objspace, b);
8658 }
8659 else {
8660 RVALUE_AGE_SET_OLD(objspace, b);
8661 rgengc_remember(objspace, b);
8662 }
8663
8664 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_generational: %s -> %s (remembered)\n", obj_info(a), obj_info(b));
8665#endif
8666
8667 check_rvalue_consistency(a);
8668 check_rvalue_consistency(b);
8669}
8670
8671#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8672static void
8673gc_mark_from(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj, VALUE parent)
8674{
8675 gc_mark_set_parent(objspace, parent);
8676 rgengc_check_relation(objspace, obj);
8677 if (gc_mark_set(objspace, obj) == FALSE) return;
8678 gc_aging(objspace, obj);
8679 gc_grey(objspace, obj);
8680}
8681
8682NOINLINE(static void gc_writebarrier_incremental(VALUE a, VALUE b, rb_objspace_t *objspace));
8683
8684static void
8685gc_writebarrier_incremental(VALUE a, VALUE b, rb_objspace_t *objspace)
8686{
8687 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_incremental: [LG] %p -> %s\n", (void *)a, obj_info(b));
8688
8689 if (RVALUE_BLACK_P(a)) {
8690 if (RVALUE_WHITE_P(b)) {
8691 if (!RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(a)) {
8692 gc_report(2, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_incremental: [IN] %p -> %s\n", (void *)a, obj_info(b));
8693 gc_mark_from(objspace, b, a);
8694 }
8695 }
8696 else if (RVALUE_OLD_P(a) && !RVALUE_OLD_P(b)) {
8697 if (!RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(b)) {
8698 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_incremental: [GN] %p -> %s\n", (void *)a, obj_info(b));
8699 RVALUE_AGE_SET_OLD(objspace, b);
8700
8701 if (RVALUE_BLACK_P(b)) {
8702 gc_grey(objspace, b);
8703 }
8704 }
8705 else {
8706 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_writebarrier_incremental: [LL] %p -> %s\n", (void *)a, obj_info(b));
8707 gc_remember_unprotected(objspace, b);
8708 }
8709 }
8710
8711 if (UNLIKELY(objspace->flags.during_compacting)) {
8712 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_PINNED_BITS(b), b);
8713 }
8714 }
8715}
8716#else
8717#define gc_writebarrier_incremental(a, b, objspace)
8718#endif
8719
8720void
8721rb_gc_writebarrier(VALUE a, VALUE b)
8722{
8723 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8724
8725 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE && SPECIAL_CONST_P(a)) rb_bug("rb_gc_writebarrier: a is special const");
8726 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE && SPECIAL_CONST_P(b)) rb_bug("rb_gc_writebarrier: b is special const");
8727
8728 retry:
8729 if (!is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8730 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(a) || RVALUE_OLD_P(b)) {
8731 // do nothing
8732 }
8733 else {
8734 gc_writebarrier_generational(a, b, objspace);
8735 }
8736 }
8737 else {
8738 bool retry = false;
8739 /* slow path */
8740 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER_NO_BARRIER();
8741 {
8742 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8743 gc_writebarrier_incremental(a, b, objspace);
8744 }
8745 else {
8746 retry = true;
8747 }
8748 }
8749 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE_NO_BARRIER();
8750
8751 if (retry) goto retry;
8752 }
8753 return;
8754}
8755
8756void
8757rb_gc_writebarrier_unprotect(VALUE obj)
8758{
8759 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj)) {
8760 return;
8761 }
8762 else {
8763 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8764
8765 gc_report(2, objspace, "rb_gc_writebarrier_unprotect: %s %s\n", obj_info(obj),
8766 rgengc_remembered(objspace, obj) ? " (already remembered)" : "");
8767
8768 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
8769 gc_report(1, objspace, "rb_gc_writebarrier_unprotect: %s\n", obj_info(obj));
8770 RVALUE_DEMOTE(objspace, obj);
8771 gc_mark_set(objspace, obj);
8772 gc_remember_unprotected(objspace, obj);
8773
8774#if RGENGC_PROFILE
8775 objspace->profile.total_shade_operation_count++;
8776#if RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2
8777 objspace->profile.shade_operation_count_types[BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)]++;
8778#endif /* RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2 */
8779#endif /* RGENGC_PROFILE */
8780 }
8781 else {
8782 RVALUE_AGE_RESET(obj);
8783 }
8784
8785 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(obj_wb_unprotect);
8786 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS(obj), obj);
8787 }
8788}
8789
8790/*
8791 * remember `obj' if needed.
8792 */
8793MJIT_FUNC_EXPORTED void
8794rb_gc_writebarrier_remember(VALUE obj)
8795{
8796 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8797
8798 gc_report(1, objspace, "rb_gc_writebarrier_remember: %s\n", obj_info(obj));
8799
8800 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
8801 if (RVALUE_BLACK_P(obj)) {
8802 gc_grey(objspace, obj);
8803 }
8804 }
8805 else {
8806 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(obj)) {
8807 rgengc_remember(objspace, obj);
8808 }
8809 }
8810}
8811
8812static st_table *rgengc_unprotect_logging_table;
8813
8814static int
8815rgengc_unprotect_logging_exit_func_i(st_data_t key, st_data_t val, st_data_t arg)
8816{
8817 fprintf(stderr, "%s\t%"PRIuVALUE"\n", (char *)key, (VALUE)val);
8818 return ST_CONTINUE;
8819}
8820
8821static void
8822rgengc_unprotect_logging_exit_func(void)
8823{
8824 st_foreach(rgengc_unprotect_logging_table, rgengc_unprotect_logging_exit_func_i, 0);
8825}
8826
8827void
8828rb_gc_unprotect_logging(void *objptr, const char *filename, int line)
8829{
8830 VALUE obj = (VALUE)objptr;
8831
8832 if (rgengc_unprotect_logging_table == 0) {
8833 rgengc_unprotect_logging_table = st_init_strtable();
8834 atexit(rgengc_unprotect_logging_exit_func);
8835 }
8836
8837 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj) == 0) {
8838 char buff[0x100];
8839 st_data_t cnt = 1;
8840 char *ptr = buff;
8841
8842 snprintf(ptr, 0x100 - 1, "%s|%s:%d", obj_info(obj), filename, line);
8843
8844 if (st_lookup(rgengc_unprotect_logging_table, (st_data_t)ptr, &cnt)) {
8845 cnt++;
8846 }
8847 else {
8848 ptr = (strdup)(buff);
8849 if (!ptr) rb_memerror();
8850 }
8851 st_insert(rgengc_unprotect_logging_table, (st_data_t)ptr, cnt);
8852 }
8853}
8854
8855void
8856rb_copy_wb_protected_attribute(VALUE dest, VALUE obj)
8857{
8858 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8859
8860 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj) && !RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(dest)) {
8861 if (!RVALUE_OLD_P(dest)) {
8862 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS(dest), dest);
8863 RVALUE_AGE_RESET_RAW(dest);
8864 }
8865 else {
8866 RVALUE_DEMOTE(objspace, dest);
8867 }
8868 }
8869
8870 check_rvalue_consistency(dest);
8871}
8872
8873/* RGENGC analysis information */
8874
8875VALUE
8876rb_obj_rgengc_writebarrier_protected_p(VALUE obj)
8877{
8878 return RBOOL(!RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj));
8879}
8880
8881VALUE
8882rb_obj_rgengc_promoted_p(VALUE obj)
8883{
8884 return RBOOL(OBJ_PROMOTED(obj));
8885}
8886
8887size_t
8888rb_obj_gc_flags(VALUE obj, ID* flags, size_t max)
8889{
8890 size_t n = 0;
8891 static ID ID_marked;
8892 static ID ID_wb_protected, ID_old, ID_marking, ID_uncollectible, ID_pinned;
8893
8894 if (!ID_marked) {
8895#define I(s) ID_##s = rb_intern(#s);
8896 I(marked);
8897 I(wb_protected);
8898 I(old);
8899 I(marking);
8900 I(uncollectible);
8901 I(pinned);
8902#undef I
8903 }
8904
8905 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(obj) == 0 && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_wb_protected;
8906 if (RVALUE_OLD_P(obj) && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_old;
8907 if (RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE(obj) && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_uncollectible;
8908 if (MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS(obj), obj) && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_marking;
8909 if (MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(obj), obj) && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_marked;
8910 if (MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_PINNED_BITS(obj), obj) && n<max) flags[n++] = ID_pinned;
8911 return n;
8912}
8913
8914/* GC */
8915
8916void
8917rb_gc_ractor_newobj_cache_clear(rb_ractor_newobj_cache_t *newobj_cache)
8918{
8919#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
8920 newobj_cache->incremental_mark_step_allocated_slots = 0;
8921#endif
8922
8923 for (size_t size_pool_idx = 0; size_pool_idx < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; size_pool_idx++) {
8924 rb_ractor_newobj_size_pool_cache_t *cache = &newobj_cache->size_pool_caches[size_pool_idx];
8925
8926 struct heap_page *page = cache->using_page;
8927 RVALUE *freelist = cache->freelist;
8928 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("ractor using_page:%p freelist:%p", (void *)page, (void *)freelist);
8929
8930 heap_page_freelist_append(page, freelist);
8931
8932 cache->using_page = NULL;
8933 cache->freelist = NULL;
8934 }
8935}
8936
8937void
8938rb_gc_force_recycle(VALUE obj)
8939{
8940 /* no-op */
8941}
8942
8943#ifndef MARK_OBJECT_ARY_BUCKET_SIZE
8944#define MARK_OBJECT_ARY_BUCKET_SIZE 1024
8945#endif
8946
8947void
8948rb_gc_register_mark_object(VALUE obj)
8949{
8950 if (!is_pointer_to_heap(&rb_objspace, (void *)obj))
8951 return;
8952
8953 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
8954 {
8955 VALUE ary_ary = GET_VM()->mark_object_ary;
8956 VALUE ary = rb_ary_last(0, 0, ary_ary);
8957
8958 if (NIL_P(ary) || RARRAY_LEN(ary) >= MARK_OBJECT_ARY_BUCKET_SIZE) {
8959 ary = rb_ary_tmp_new(MARK_OBJECT_ARY_BUCKET_SIZE);
8960 rb_ary_push(ary_ary, ary);
8961 }
8962
8963 rb_ary_push(ary, obj);
8964 }
8965 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
8966}
8967
8968void
8969rb_gc_register_address(VALUE *addr)
8970{
8971 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8972 struct gc_list *tmp;
8973
8974 tmp = ALLOC(struct gc_list);
8975 tmp->next = global_list;
8976 tmp->varptr = addr;
8977 global_list = tmp;
8978}
8979
8980void
8981rb_gc_unregister_address(VALUE *addr)
8982{
8983 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
8984 struct gc_list *tmp = global_list;
8985
8986 if (tmp->varptr == addr) {
8987 global_list = tmp->next;
8988 xfree(tmp);
8989 return;
8990 }
8991 while (tmp->next) {
8992 if (tmp->next->varptr == addr) {
8993 struct gc_list *t = tmp->next;
8994
8995 tmp->next = tmp->next->next;
8996 xfree(t);
8997 break;
8998 }
8999 tmp = tmp->next;
9000 }
9001}
9002
9003void
9004rb_global_variable(VALUE *var)
9005{
9006 rb_gc_register_address(var);
9007}
9008
9009#define GC_NOTIFY 0
9010
9011enum {
9012 gc_stress_no_major,
9013 gc_stress_no_immediate_sweep,
9014 gc_stress_full_mark_after_malloc,
9015 gc_stress_max
9016};
9017
9018#define gc_stress_full_mark_after_malloc_p() \
9019 (FIXNUM_P(ruby_gc_stress_mode) && (FIX2LONG(ruby_gc_stress_mode) & (1<<gc_stress_full_mark_after_malloc)))
9020
9021static void
9022heap_ready_to_gc(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_size_pool_t *size_pool, rb_heap_t *heap)
9023{
9024 if (!heap->free_pages) {
9025 if (!heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, heap)) {
9026 size_pool_allocatable_pages_set(objspace, size_pool, 1);
9027 heap_increment(objspace, size_pool, heap);
9028 }
9029 }
9030}
9031
9032static int
9033ready_to_gc(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
9034{
9035 if (dont_gc_val() || during_gc || ruby_disable_gc) {
9036 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
9037 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
9038 heap_ready_to_gc(objspace, size_pool, SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool));
9039 }
9040 return FALSE;
9041 }
9042 else {
9043 return TRUE;
9044 }
9045}
9046
9047static void
9048gc_reset_malloc_info(rb_objspace_t *objspace, bool full_mark)
9049{
9050 gc_prof_set_malloc_info(objspace);
9051 {
9052 size_t inc = ATOMIC_SIZE_EXCHANGE(malloc_increase, 0);
9053 size_t old_limit = malloc_limit;
9054
9055 if (inc > malloc_limit) {
9056 malloc_limit = (size_t)(inc * gc_params.malloc_limit_growth_factor);
9057 if (malloc_limit > gc_params.malloc_limit_max) {
9058 malloc_limit = gc_params.malloc_limit_max;
9059 }
9060 }
9061 else {
9062 malloc_limit = (size_t)(malloc_limit * 0.98); /* magic number */
9063 if (malloc_limit < gc_params.malloc_limit_min) {
9064 malloc_limit = gc_params.malloc_limit_min;
9065 }
9066 }
9067
9068 if (0) {
9069 if (old_limit != malloc_limit) {
9070 fprintf(stderr, "[%"PRIuSIZE"] malloc_limit: %"PRIuSIZE" -> %"PRIuSIZE"\n",
9071 rb_gc_count(), old_limit, malloc_limit);
9072 }
9073 else {
9074 fprintf(stderr, "[%"PRIuSIZE"] malloc_limit: not changed (%"PRIuSIZE")\n",
9075 rb_gc_count(), malloc_limit);
9076 }
9077 }
9078 }
9079
9080 /* reset oldmalloc info */
9081#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
9082 if (!full_mark) {
9083 if (objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase > objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit) {
9084 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDMALLOC;
9085 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit =
9086 (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit * gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_growth_factor);
9087
9088 if (objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit > gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_max) {
9089 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit = gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_max;
9090 }
9091 }
9092
9093 if (0) fprintf(stderr, "%"PRIdSIZE"\t%d\t%"PRIuSIZE"\t%"PRIuSIZE"\t%"PRIdSIZE"\n",
9094 rb_gc_count(),
9095 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc,
9096 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase,
9097 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit,
9098 gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_max);
9099 }
9100 else {
9101 /* major GC */
9102 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase = 0;
9103
9104 if ((objspace->profile.latest_gc_info & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDMALLOC) == 0) {
9105 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit =
9106 (size_t)(objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit / ((gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_growth_factor - 1)/10 + 1));
9107 if (objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit < gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_min) {
9108 objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit = gc_params.oldmalloc_limit_min;
9109 }
9110 }
9111 }
9112#endif
9113}
9114
9115static int
9116garbage_collect(rb_objspace_t *objspace, unsigned int reason)
9117{
9118 int ret;
9119
9120 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
9121 {
9122#if GC_PROFILE_MORE_DETAIL
9123 objspace->profile.prepare_time = getrusage_time();
9124#endif
9125
9126 gc_rest(objspace);
9127
9128#if GC_PROFILE_MORE_DETAIL
9129 objspace->profile.prepare_time = getrusage_time() - objspace->profile.prepare_time;
9130#endif
9131
9132 ret = gc_start(objspace, reason);
9133 }
9134 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
9135
9136 return ret;
9137}
9138
9139static int
9140gc_start(rb_objspace_t *objspace, unsigned int reason)
9141{
9142 unsigned int do_full_mark = !!(reason & GPR_FLAG_FULL_MARK);
9143#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
9144 unsigned int immediate_mark = reason & GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_MARK;
9145#endif
9146
9147 /* reason may be clobbered, later, so keep set immediate_sweep here */
9148 objspace->flags.immediate_sweep = !!(reason & GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_SWEEP);
9149
9150 /* Explicitly enable compaction (GC.compact) */
9151 if (do_full_mark && ruby_enable_autocompact) {
9152 objspace->flags.during_compacting = TRUE;
9153 }
9154 else {
9155 objspace->flags.during_compacting = !!(reason & GPR_FLAG_COMPACT);
9156 }
9157
9158 if (!heap_allocated_pages) return FALSE; /* heap is not ready */
9159 if (!(reason & GPR_FLAG_METHOD) && !ready_to_gc(objspace)) return TRUE; /* GC is not allowed */
9160
9161 GC_ASSERT(gc_mode(objspace) == gc_mode_none);
9162 GC_ASSERT(!is_lazy_sweeping(objspace));
9163 GC_ASSERT(!is_incremental_marking(objspace));
9164
9165 unsigned int lock_lev;
9166 gc_enter(objspace, gc_enter_event_start, &lock_lev);
9167
9168#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
9169 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
9170#endif
9171
9172 if (ruby_gc_stressful) {
9173 int flag = FIXNUM_P(ruby_gc_stress_mode) ? FIX2INT(ruby_gc_stress_mode) : 0;
9174
9175 if ((flag & (1<<gc_stress_no_major)) == 0) {
9176 do_full_mark = TRUE;
9177 }
9178
9179 objspace->flags.immediate_sweep = !(flag & (1<<gc_stress_no_immediate_sweep));
9180 }
9181 else {
9182 if (objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc) {
9183 reason |= objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc;
9184 do_full_mark = TRUE;
9185 }
9186 else if (RGENGC_FORCE_MAJOR_GC) {
9187 reason = GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_FORCE;
9188 do_full_mark = TRUE;
9189 }
9190
9191 objspace->rgengc.need_major_gc = GPR_FLAG_NONE;
9192 }
9193
9194 if (do_full_mark && (reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_MASK) == 0) {
9195 reason |= GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_FORCE; /* GC by CAPI, METHOD, and so on. */
9196 }
9197
9198#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
9199 if (!GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK || objspace->flags.dont_incremental || immediate_mark) {
9200 objspace->flags.during_incremental_marking = FALSE;
9201 }
9202 else {
9203 objspace->flags.during_incremental_marking = do_full_mark;
9204 }
9205#endif
9206
9207 if (!GC_ENABLE_LAZY_SWEEP || objspace->flags.dont_incremental) {
9208 objspace->flags.immediate_sweep = TRUE;
9209 }
9210
9211 if (objspace->flags.immediate_sweep) reason |= GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_SWEEP;
9212
9213 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_start(reason: %x) => %u, %d, %d\n",
9214 reason,
9215 do_full_mark, !is_incremental_marking(objspace), objspace->flags.immediate_sweep);
9216
9217#if USE_DEBUG_COUNTER
9218 RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_count);
9219
9220 if (reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_MASK) {
9221 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_major_nofree, reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_NOFREE);
9222 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_major_oldgen, reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDGEN);
9223 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_major_shady, reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_SHADY);
9224 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_major_force, reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_FORCE);
9225#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
9226 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_major_oldmalloc, reason & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDMALLOC);
9227#endif
9228 }
9229 else {
9230 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_minor_newobj, reason & GPR_FLAG_NEWOBJ);
9231 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_minor_malloc, reason & GPR_FLAG_MALLOC);
9232 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_minor_method, reason & GPR_FLAG_METHOD);
9233 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_minor_capi, reason & GPR_FLAG_CAPI);
9234 (void)RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC_IF(gc_minor_stress, reason & GPR_FLAG_STRESS);
9235 }
9236#endif
9237
9238 objspace->profile.count++;
9239 objspace->profile.latest_gc_info = reason;
9240 objspace->profile.total_allocated_objects_at_gc_start = objspace->total_allocated_objects;
9241 objspace->profile.heap_used_at_gc_start = heap_allocated_pages;
9242 gc_prof_setup_new_record(objspace, reason);
9243 gc_reset_malloc_info(objspace, do_full_mark);
9244 rb_transient_heap_start_marking(do_full_mark);
9245
9246 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_GC_START, 0 /* TODO: pass minor/immediate flag? */);
9247 GC_ASSERT(during_gc);
9248
9249 gc_prof_timer_start(objspace);
9250 {
9251 gc_marks(objspace, do_full_mark);
9252 }
9253 gc_prof_timer_stop(objspace);
9254
9255 gc_exit(objspace, gc_enter_event_start, &lock_lev);
9256 return TRUE;
9257}
9258
9259static void
9260gc_rest(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
9261{
9262 int marking = is_incremental_marking(objspace);
9263 int sweeping = is_lazy_sweeping(objspace);
9264
9265 if (marking || sweeping) {
9266 unsigned int lock_lev;
9267 gc_enter(objspace, gc_enter_event_rest, &lock_lev);
9268
9269 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2) gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
9270
9271 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) {
9272 gc_marks_rest(objspace);
9273 }
9274 if (is_lazy_sweeping(objspace)) {
9275 gc_sweep_rest(objspace);
9276 }
9277 gc_exit(objspace, gc_enter_event_rest, &lock_lev);
9278 }
9279}
9280
9281struct objspace_and_reason {
9282 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
9283 unsigned int reason;
9284};
9285
9286static void
9287gc_current_status_fill(rb_objspace_t *objspace, char *buff)
9288{
9289 int i = 0;
9290 if (is_marking(objspace)) {
9291 buff[i++] = 'M';
9292 if (is_full_marking(objspace)) buff[i++] = 'F';
9293#if GC_ENABLE_INCREMENTAL_MARK
9294 if (is_incremental_marking(objspace)) buff[i++] = 'I';
9295#endif
9296 }
9297 else if (is_sweeping(objspace)) {
9298 buff[i++] = 'S';
9299 if (is_lazy_sweeping(objspace)) buff[i++] = 'L';
9300 }
9301 else {
9302 buff[i++] = 'N';
9303 }
9304 buff[i] = '\0';
9305}
9306
9307static const char *
9308gc_current_status(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
9309{
9310 static char buff[0x10];
9311 gc_current_status_fill(objspace, buff);
9312 return buff;
9313}
9314
9315#if PRINT_ENTER_EXIT_TICK
9316
9317static tick_t last_exit_tick;
9318static tick_t enter_tick;
9319static int enter_count = 0;
9320static char last_gc_status[0x10];
9321
9322static inline void
9323gc_record(rb_objspace_t *objspace, int direction, const char *event)
9324{
9325 if (direction == 0) { /* enter */
9326 enter_count++;
9327 enter_tick = tick();
9328 gc_current_status_fill(objspace, last_gc_status);
9329 }
9330 else { /* exit */
9331 tick_t exit_tick = tick();
9332 char current_gc_status[0x10];
9333 gc_current_status_fill(objspace, current_gc_status);
9334#if 1
9335 /* [last mutator time] [gc time] [event] */
9336 fprintf(stderr, "%"PRItick"\t%"PRItick"\t%s\t[%s->%s|%c]\n",
9337 enter_tick - last_exit_tick,
9338 exit_tick - enter_tick,
9339 event,
9340 last_gc_status, current_gc_status,
9341 (objspace->profile.latest_gc_info & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_MASK) ? '+' : '-');
9342 last_exit_tick = exit_tick;
9343#else
9344 /* [enter_tick] [gc time] [event] */
9345 fprintf(stderr, "%"PRItick"\t%"PRItick"\t%s\t[%s->%s|%c]\n",
9346 enter_tick,
9347 exit_tick - enter_tick,
9348 event,
9349 last_gc_status, current_gc_status,
9350 (objspace->profile.latest_gc_info & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_MASK) ? '+' : '-');
9351#endif
9352 }
9353}
9354#else /* PRINT_ENTER_EXIT_TICK */
9355static inline void
9356gc_record(rb_objspace_t *objspace, int direction, const char *event)
9357{
9358 /* null */
9359}
9360#endif /* PRINT_ENTER_EXIT_TICK */
9361
9362static const char *
9363gc_enter_event_cstr(enum gc_enter_event event)
9364{
9365 switch (event) {
9366 case gc_enter_event_start: return "start";
9367 case gc_enter_event_mark_continue: return "mark_continue";
9368 case gc_enter_event_sweep_continue: return "sweep_continue";
9369 case gc_enter_event_rest: return "rest";
9370 case gc_enter_event_finalizer: return "finalizer";
9371 case gc_enter_event_rb_memerror: return "rb_memerror";
9372 }
9373 return NULL;
9374}
9375
9376static void
9377gc_enter_count(enum gc_enter_event event)
9378{
9379 switch (event) {
9380 case gc_enter_event_start: RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_enter_start); break;
9381 case gc_enter_event_mark_continue: RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_enter_mark_continue); break;
9382 case gc_enter_event_sweep_continue: RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_enter_sweep_continue); break;
9383 case gc_enter_event_rest: RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_enter_rest); break;
9384 case gc_enter_event_finalizer: RB_DEBUG_COUNTER_INC(gc_enter_finalizer); break;
9385 case gc_enter_event_rb_memerror: /* nothing */ break;
9386 }
9387}
9388
9389#ifndef MEASURE_GC
9390#define MEASURE_GC (objspace->flags.measure_gc)
9391#endif
9392
9393static bool
9394gc_enter_event_measure_p(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_enter_event event)
9395{
9396 if (!MEASURE_GC) return false;
9397
9398 switch (event) {
9399 case gc_enter_event_start:
9400 case gc_enter_event_mark_continue:
9401 case gc_enter_event_sweep_continue:
9402 case gc_enter_event_rest:
9403 return true;
9404
9405 default:
9406 // case gc_enter_event_finalizer:
9407 // case gc_enter_event_rb_memerror:
9408 return false;
9409 }
9410}
9411
9412static bool current_process_time(struct timespec *ts);
9413
9414static void
9415gc_enter_clock(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_enter_event event)
9416{
9417 if (gc_enter_event_measure_p(objspace, event)) {
9418 if (!current_process_time(&objspace->profile.start_time)) {
9419 objspace->profile.start_time.tv_sec = 0;
9420 objspace->profile.start_time.tv_nsec = 0;
9421 }
9422 }
9423}
9424
9425static void
9426gc_exit_clock(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_enter_event event)
9427{
9428 if (gc_enter_event_measure_p(objspace, event)) {
9429 struct timespec end_time;
9430
9431 if ((objspace->profile.start_time.tv_sec > 0 ||
9432 objspace->profile.start_time.tv_nsec > 0) &&
9433 current_process_time(&end_time)) {
9434
9435 if (end_time.tv_sec < objspace->profile.start_time.tv_sec) {
9436 return; // ignore
9437 }
9438 else {
9439 uint64_t ns =
9440 (uint64_t)(end_time.tv_sec - objspace->profile.start_time.tv_sec) * (1000 * 1000 * 1000) +
9441 (end_time.tv_nsec - objspace->profile.start_time.tv_nsec);
9442 objspace->profile.total_time_ns += ns;
9443 }
9444 }
9445 }
9446}
9447
9448static inline void
9449gc_enter(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_enter_event event, unsigned int *lock_lev)
9450{
9451 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER_LEV(lock_lev);
9452
9453 gc_enter_clock(objspace, event);
9454
9455 switch (event) {
9456 case gc_enter_event_rest:
9457 if (!is_marking(objspace)) break;
9458 // fall through
9459 case gc_enter_event_start:
9460 case gc_enter_event_mark_continue:
9461 // stop other ractors
9462 rb_vm_barrier();
9463 break;
9464 default:
9465 break;
9466 }
9467
9468 gc_enter_count(event);
9469 if (UNLIKELY(during_gc != 0)) rb_bug("during_gc != 0");
9470 if (RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 3) gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
9471
9472 mjit_gc_start_hook();
9473
9474 during_gc = TRUE;
9475 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("%s (%s)",gc_enter_event_cstr(event), gc_current_status(objspace));
9476 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_enter: %s [%s]\n", gc_enter_event_cstr(event), gc_current_status(objspace));
9477 gc_record(objspace, 0, gc_enter_event_cstr(event));
9478 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_GC_ENTER, 0); /* TODO: which parameter should be passed? */
9479}
9480
9481static inline void
9482gc_exit(rb_objspace_t *objspace, enum gc_enter_event event, unsigned int *lock_lev)
9483{
9484 GC_ASSERT(during_gc != 0);
9485
9486 gc_event_hook(objspace, RUBY_INTERNAL_EVENT_GC_EXIT, 0); /* TODO: which parameter should be passsed? */
9487 gc_record(objspace, 1, gc_enter_event_cstr(event));
9488 RUBY_DEBUG_LOG("%s (%s)", gc_enter_event_cstr(event), gc_current_status(objspace));
9489 gc_report(1, objspace, "gc_exit: %s [%s]\n", gc_enter_event_cstr(event), gc_current_status(objspace));
9490 during_gc = FALSE;
9491
9492 mjit_gc_exit_hook();
9493 gc_exit_clock(objspace, event);
9494 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE_LEV(lock_lev);
9495
9496#if RGENGC_CHECK_MODE >= 2
9497 if (event == gc_enter_event_sweep_continue && gc_mode(objspace) == gc_mode_none) {
9498 GC_ASSERT(!during_gc);
9499 // sweep finished
9500 gc_verify_internal_consistency(objspace);
9501 }
9502#endif
9503}
9504
9505static void *
9506gc_with_gvl(void *ptr)
9507{
9508 struct objspace_and_reason *oar = (struct objspace_and_reason *)ptr;
9509 return (void *)(VALUE)garbage_collect(oar->objspace, oar->reason);
9510}
9511
9512static int
9513garbage_collect_with_gvl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, unsigned int reason)
9514{
9515 if (dont_gc_val()) return TRUE;
9516 if (ruby_thread_has_gvl_p()) {
9517 return garbage_collect(objspace, reason);
9518 }
9519 else {
9520 if (ruby_native_thread_p()) {
9521 struct objspace_and_reason oar;
9522 oar.objspace = objspace;
9523 oar.reason = reason;
9524 return (int)(VALUE)rb_thread_call_with_gvl(gc_with_gvl, (void *)&oar);
9525 }
9526 else {
9527 /* no ruby thread */
9528 fprintf(stderr, "[FATAL] failed to allocate memory\n");
9529 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
9530 }
9531 }
9532}
9533
9534static VALUE
9535gc_start_internal(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE self, VALUE full_mark, VALUE immediate_mark, VALUE immediate_sweep, VALUE compact)
9536{
9537 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
9538 unsigned int reason = (GPR_FLAG_FULL_MARK |
9539 GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_MARK |
9540 GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_SWEEP |
9541 GPR_FLAG_METHOD);
9542
9543 /* For now, compact implies full mark / sweep, so ignore other flags */
9544 if (RTEST(compact)) {
9545 /* If not MinGW, Windows, or does not have mmap, we cannot use mprotect for
9546 * the read barrier, so we must disable compaction. */
9547#if !defined(__MINGW32__) && !defined(_WIN32)
9548 if (!HEAP_PAGE_ALLOC_USE_MMAP) {
9549 rb_raise(rb_eNotImpError, "Compaction isn't available on this platform");
9550 }
9551#endif
9552
9553#if !GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
9554 rb_raise(rb_eNotImpError, "Compaction isn't available on this platform");
9555#endif
9556
9557 reason |= GPR_FLAG_COMPACT;
9558 }
9559 else {
9560 if (!RTEST(full_mark)) reason &= ~GPR_FLAG_FULL_MARK;
9561 if (!RTEST(immediate_mark)) reason &= ~GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_MARK;
9562 if (!RTEST(immediate_sweep)) reason &= ~GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_SWEEP;
9563 }
9564
9565 garbage_collect(objspace, reason);
9566 gc_finalize_deferred(objspace);
9567
9568 return Qnil;
9569}
9570
9571static int
9572gc_is_moveable_obj(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
9573{
9574 GC_ASSERT(!SPECIAL_CONST_P(obj));
9575
9576 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
9577 case T_NONE:
9578 case T_NIL:
9579 case T_MOVED:
9580 case T_ZOMBIE:
9581 return FALSE;
9582 case T_SYMBOL:
9583 if (DYNAMIC_SYM_P(obj) && (RSYMBOL(obj)->id & ~ID_SCOPE_MASK)) {
9584 return FALSE;
9585 }
9586 /* fall through */
9587 case T_STRING:
9588 case T_OBJECT:
9589 case T_FLOAT:
9590 case T_IMEMO:
9591 case T_ARRAY:
9592 case T_BIGNUM:
9593 case T_ICLASS:
9594 case T_MODULE:
9595 case T_REGEXP:
9596 case T_DATA:
9597 case T_MATCH:
9598 case T_STRUCT:
9599 case T_HASH:
9600 case T_FILE:
9601 case T_COMPLEX:
9602 case T_RATIONAL:
9603 case T_NODE:
9604 case T_CLASS:
9605 if (FL_TEST(obj, FL_FINALIZE)) {
9606 /* The finalizer table is a numtable. It looks up objects by address.
9607 * We can't mark the keys in the finalizer table because that would
9608 * prevent the objects from being collected. This check prevents
9609 * objects that are keys in the finalizer table from being moved
9610 * without directly pinning them. */
9611 if (st_is_member(finalizer_table, obj)) {
9612 return FALSE;
9613 }
9614 }
9615 GC_ASSERT(RVALUE_MARKED(obj));
9616 GC_ASSERT(!RVALUE_PINNED(obj));
9617
9618 return TRUE;
9619
9620 default:
9621 rb_bug("gc_is_moveable_obj: unreachable (%d)", (int)BUILTIN_TYPE(obj));
9622 break;
9623 }
9624
9625 return FALSE;
9626}
9627
9628static VALUE
9629gc_move(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE scan, VALUE free, size_t slot_size)
9630{
9631 int marked;
9632 int wb_unprotected;
9633 int uncollectible;
9634 int marking;
9635 RVALUE *dest = (RVALUE *)free;
9636 RVALUE *src = (RVALUE *)scan;
9637
9638 gc_report(4, objspace, "Moving object: %p -> %p\n", (void*)scan, (void *)free);
9639
9640 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(scan) != T_NONE);
9641 GC_ASSERT(!MARKED_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS(free), free));
9642
9643 /* Save off bits for current object. */
9644 marked = rb_objspace_marked_object_p((VALUE)src);
9645 wb_unprotected = RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED((VALUE)src);
9646 uncollectible = RVALUE_UNCOLLECTIBLE((VALUE)src);
9647 marking = RVALUE_MARKING((VALUE)src);
9648
9649 /* Clear bits for eventual T_MOVED */
9650 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS((VALUE)src), (VALUE)src);
9651 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS((VALUE)src), (VALUE)src);
9652 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_UNCOLLECTIBLE_BITS((VALUE)src), (VALUE)src);
9653 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS((VALUE)src), (VALUE)src);
9654
9655 if (FL_TEST((VALUE)src, FL_EXIVAR)) {
9656 /* Same deal as below. Generic ivars are held in st tables.
9657 * Resizing the table could cause a GC to happen and we can't allow it */
9658 VALUE already_disabled = rb_gc_disable_no_rest();
9659 rb_mv_generic_ivar((VALUE)src, (VALUE)dest);
9660 if (already_disabled == Qfalse) rb_objspace_gc_enable(objspace);
9661 }
9662
9663 st_data_t srcid = (st_data_t)src, id;
9664
9665 /* If the source object's object_id has been seen, we need to update
9666 * the object to object id mapping. */
9667 if (st_lookup(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, srcid, &id)) {
9668 gc_report(4, objspace, "Moving object with seen id: %p -> %p\n", (void *)src, (void *)dest);
9669 /* inserting in the st table can cause the GC to run. We need to
9670 * prevent re-entry in to the GC since `gc_move` is running in the GC,
9671 * so temporarily disable the GC around the st table mutation */
9672 VALUE already_disabled = rb_gc_disable_no_rest();
9673 st_delete(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, &srcid, 0);
9674 st_insert(objspace->obj_to_id_tbl, (st_data_t)dest, id);
9675 if (already_disabled == Qfalse) rb_objspace_gc_enable(objspace);
9676 }
9677
9678 /* Move the object */
9679 memcpy(dest, src, slot_size);
9680 memset(src, 0, slot_size);
9681
9682 /* Set bits for object in new location */
9683 if (marking) {
9684 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9685 }
9686 else {
9687 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARKING_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9688 }
9689
9690 if (marked) {
9691 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9692 }
9693 else {
9694 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_MARK_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9695 }
9696
9697 if (wb_unprotected) {
9698 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9699 }
9700 else {
9701 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_WB_UNPROTECTED_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9702 }
9703
9704 if (uncollectible) {
9705 MARK_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_UNCOLLECTIBLE_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9706 }
9707 else {
9708 CLEAR_IN_BITMAP(GET_HEAP_UNCOLLECTIBLE_BITS((VALUE)dest), (VALUE)dest);
9709 }
9710
9711 /* Assign forwarding address */
9712 src->as.moved.flags = T_MOVED;
9713 src->as.moved.dummy = Qundef;
9714 src->as.moved.destination = (VALUE)dest;
9715 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE((VALUE)dest) != T_NONE);
9716
9717 return (VALUE)src;
9718}
9719
9720#if GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
9721static int
9722compare_free_slots(const void *left, const void *right, void *dummy)
9723{
9724 struct heap_page *left_page;
9725 struct heap_page *right_page;
9726
9727 left_page = *(struct heap_page * const *)left;
9728 right_page = *(struct heap_page * const *)right;
9729
9730 return left_page->free_slots - right_page->free_slots;
9731}
9732
9733static void
9734gc_sort_heap_by_empty_slots(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
9735{
9736 for (int j = 0; j < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; j++) {
9737 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[j];
9738
9739 size_t total_pages = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->total_pages;
9740 size_t size = size_mul_or_raise(total_pages, sizeof(struct heap_page *), rb_eRuntimeError);
9741 struct heap_page *page = 0, **page_list = malloc(size);
9742 size_t i = 0;
9743
9744 SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->free_pages = NULL;
9745 ccan_list_for_each(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages, page, page_node) {
9746 page_list[i++] = page;
9747 GC_ASSERT(page);
9748 }
9749
9750 GC_ASSERT((size_t)i == total_pages);
9751
9752 /* Sort the heap so "filled pages" are first. `heap_add_page` adds to the
9753 * head of the list, so empty pages will end up at the start of the heap */
9754 ruby_qsort(page_list, total_pages, sizeof(struct heap_page *), compare_free_slots, NULL);
9755
9756 /* Reset the eden heap */
9757 ccan_list_head_init(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages);
9758
9759 for (i = 0; i < total_pages; i++) {
9760 ccan_list_add(&SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool)->pages, &page_list[i]->page_node);
9761 if (page_list[i]->free_slots != 0) {
9762 heap_add_freepage(SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool), page_list[i]);
9763 }
9764 }
9765
9766 free(page_list);
9767 }
9768}
9769#endif
9770
9771static void
9772gc_ref_update_array(rb_objspace_t * objspace, VALUE v)
9773{
9774 long i, len;
9775
9776 if (FL_TEST(v, ELTS_SHARED))
9777 return;
9778
9779 len = RARRAY_LEN(v);
9780 if (len > 0) {
9781 VALUE *ptr = (VALUE *)RARRAY_CONST_PTR_TRANSIENT(v);
9782 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
9783 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ptr[i]);
9784 }
9785 }
9786}
9787
9788static void
9789gc_ref_update_object(rb_objspace_t * objspace, VALUE v)
9790{
9791 VALUE *ptr = ROBJECT_IVPTR(v);
9792
9793 uint32_t i, len = ROBJECT_NUMIV(v);
9794 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
9795 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ptr[i]);
9796 }
9797}
9798
9799static int
9800hash_replace_ref(st_data_t *key, st_data_t *value, st_data_t argp, int existing)
9801{
9802 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)argp;
9803
9804 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)*key)) {
9805 *key = rb_gc_location((VALUE)*key);
9806 }
9807
9808 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)*value)) {
9809 *value = rb_gc_location((VALUE)*value);
9810 }
9811
9812 return ST_CONTINUE;
9813}
9814
9815static int
9816hash_foreach_replace(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t argp, int error)
9817{
9818 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
9819
9820 objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)argp;
9821
9822 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)key)) {
9823 return ST_REPLACE;
9824 }
9825
9826 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)value)) {
9827 return ST_REPLACE;
9828 }
9829 return ST_CONTINUE;
9830}
9831
9832static int
9833hash_replace_ref_value(st_data_t *key, st_data_t *value, st_data_t argp, int existing)
9834{
9835 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)argp;
9836
9837 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)*value)) {
9838 *value = rb_gc_location((VALUE)*value);
9839 }
9840
9841 return ST_CONTINUE;
9842}
9843
9844static int
9845hash_foreach_replace_value(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t argp, int error)
9846{
9847 rb_objspace_t *objspace;
9848
9849 objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)argp;
9850
9851 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)value)) {
9852 return ST_REPLACE;
9853 }
9854 return ST_CONTINUE;
9855}
9856
9857static void
9858gc_update_tbl_refs(rb_objspace_t * objspace, st_table *tbl)
9859{
9860 if (!tbl || tbl->num_entries == 0) return;
9861
9862 if (st_foreach_with_replace(tbl, hash_foreach_replace_value, hash_replace_ref_value, (st_data_t)objspace)) {
9863 rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "hash modified during iteration");
9864 }
9865}
9866
9867static void
9868gc_update_table_refs(rb_objspace_t * objspace, st_table *tbl)
9869{
9870 if (!tbl || tbl->num_entries == 0) return;
9871
9872 if (st_foreach_with_replace(tbl, hash_foreach_replace, hash_replace_ref, (st_data_t)objspace)) {
9873 rb_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "hash modified during iteration");
9874 }
9875}
9876
9877/* Update MOVED references in an st_table */
9878void
9879rb_gc_update_tbl_refs(st_table *ptr)
9880{
9881 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
9882 gc_update_table_refs(objspace, ptr);
9883}
9884
9885static void
9886gc_ref_update_hash(rb_objspace_t * objspace, VALUE v)
9887{
9888 rb_hash_stlike_foreach_with_replace(v, hash_foreach_replace, hash_replace_ref, (st_data_t)objspace);
9889}
9890
9891static void
9892gc_ref_update_method_entry(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_method_entry_t *me)
9893{
9894 rb_method_definition_t *def = me->def;
9895
9896 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, me->owner);
9897 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, me->defined_class);
9898
9899 if (def) {
9900 switch (def->type) {
9901 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ISEQ:
9902 if (def->body.iseq.iseqptr) {
9903 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, rb_iseq_t *, def->body.iseq.iseqptr);
9904 }
9905 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, rb_cref_t *, def->body.iseq.cref);
9906 break;
9907 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ATTRSET:
9908 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_IVAR:
9909 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, def->body.attr.location);
9910 break;
9911 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_BMETHOD:
9912 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, def->body.bmethod.proc);
9913 break;
9914 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ALIAS:
9915 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, struct rb_method_entry_struct *, def->body.alias.original_me);
9916 return;
9917 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_REFINED:
9918 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, struct rb_method_entry_struct *, def->body.refined.orig_me);
9919 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, def->body.refined.owner);
9920 break;
9921 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_CFUNC:
9922 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_ZSUPER:
9923 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_MISSING:
9924 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_OPTIMIZED:
9925 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_UNDEF:
9926 case VM_METHOD_TYPE_NOTIMPLEMENTED:
9927 break;
9928 }
9929 }
9930}
9931
9932static void
9933gc_update_values(rb_objspace_t *objspace, long n, VALUE *values)
9934{
9935 long i;
9936
9937 for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
9938 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, values[i]);
9939 }
9940}
9941
9942static void
9943gc_ref_update_imemo(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
9944{
9945 switch (imemo_type(obj)) {
9946 case imemo_env:
9947 {
9948 rb_env_t *env = (rb_env_t *)obj;
9949 if (LIKELY(env->ep)) {
9950 // just after newobj() can be NULL here.
9951 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, rb_iseq_t *, env->iseq);
9952 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, env->ep[VM_ENV_DATA_INDEX_ENV]);
9953 gc_update_values(objspace, (long)env->env_size, (VALUE *)env->env);
9954 }
9955 }
9956 break;
9957 case imemo_cref:
9958 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.klass_or_self);
9959 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, struct rb_cref_struct *, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.next);
9960 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.cref.refinements);
9961 break;
9962 case imemo_svar:
9963 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.cref_or_me);
9964 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.lastline);
9965 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.backref);
9966 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.svar.others);
9967 break;
9968 case imemo_throw_data:
9969 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.throw_data.throw_obj);
9970 break;
9971 case imemo_ifunc:
9972 break;
9973 case imemo_memo:
9974 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.memo.v1);
9975 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RANY(obj)->as.imemo.memo.v2);
9976 break;
9977 case imemo_ment:
9978 gc_ref_update_method_entry(objspace, &RANY(obj)->as.imemo.ment);
9979 break;
9980 case imemo_iseq:
9981 rb_iseq_update_references((rb_iseq_t *)obj);
9982 break;
9983 case imemo_ast:
9984 rb_ast_update_references((rb_ast_t *)obj);
9985 break;
9986 case imemo_callcache:
9987 {
9988 const struct rb_callcache *cc = (const struct rb_callcache *)obj;
9989 if (cc->klass) {
9990 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, cc->klass);
9991 if (!is_live_object(objspace, cc->klass)) {
9992 *((VALUE *)(&cc->klass)) = (VALUE)0;
9993 }
9994 }
9995
9996 if (cc->cme_) {
9997 TYPED_UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, struct rb_callable_method_entry_struct *, cc->cme_);
9998 if (!is_live_object(objspace, (VALUE)cc->cme_)) {
9999 *((struct rb_callable_method_entry_struct **)(&cc->cme_)) = (struct rb_callable_method_entry_struct *)0;
10000 }
10001 }
10002 }
10003 break;
10004 case imemo_constcache:
10005 {
10006 const struct iseq_inline_constant_cache_entry *ice = (struct iseq_inline_constant_cache_entry *)obj;
10007 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ice->value);
10008 }
10009 break;
10010 case imemo_parser_strterm:
10011 case imemo_tmpbuf:
10012 case imemo_callinfo:
10013 break;
10014 default:
10015 rb_bug("not reachable %d", imemo_type(obj));
10016 break;
10017 }
10018}
10019
10020static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
10021check_id_table_move(VALUE value, void *data)
10022{
10023 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
10024
10025 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)value)) {
10026 return ID_TABLE_REPLACE;
10027 }
10028
10029 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
10030}
10031
10032/* Returns the new location of an object, if it moved. Otherwise returns
10033 * the existing location. */
10034VALUE
10035rb_gc_location(VALUE value)
10036{
10037
10038 VALUE destination;
10039
10040 if (!SPECIAL_CONST_P(value)) {
10041 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(value);
10042 asan_unpoison_object(value, false);
10043
10044 if (BUILTIN_TYPE(value) == T_MOVED) {
10045 destination = (VALUE)RMOVED(value)->destination;
10046 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(destination) != T_NONE);
10047 }
10048 else {
10049 destination = value;
10050 }
10051
10052 /* Re-poison slot if it's not the one we want */
10053 if (poisoned) {
10054 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(value) == T_NONE);
10055 asan_poison_object(value);
10056 }
10057 }
10058 else {
10059 destination = value;
10060 }
10061
10062 return destination;
10063}
10064
10065static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
10066update_id_table(VALUE *value, void *data, int existing)
10067{
10068 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
10069
10070 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)*value)) {
10071 *value = rb_gc_location((VALUE)*value);
10072 }
10073
10074 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
10075}
10076
10077static void
10078update_m_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct rb_id_table *tbl)
10079{
10080 if (tbl) {
10081 rb_id_table_foreach_values_with_replace(tbl, check_id_table_move, update_id_table, objspace);
10082 }
10083}
10084
10085static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
10086update_cc_tbl_i(VALUE ccs_ptr, void *data)
10087{
10088 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
10089 struct rb_class_cc_entries *ccs = (struct rb_class_cc_entries *)ccs_ptr;
10090 VM_ASSERT(vm_ccs_p(ccs));
10091
10092 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)ccs->cme)) {
10093 ccs->cme = (const rb_callable_method_entry_t *)rb_gc_location((VALUE)ccs->cme);
10094 }
10095
10096 for (int i=0; i<ccs->len; i++) {
10097 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)ccs->entries[i].ci)) {
10098 ccs->entries[i].ci = (struct rb_callinfo *)rb_gc_location((VALUE)ccs->entries[i].ci);
10099 }
10100 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, (VALUE)ccs->entries[i].cc)) {
10101 ccs->entries[i].cc = (struct rb_callcache *)rb_gc_location((VALUE)ccs->entries[i].cc);
10102 }
10103 }
10104
10105 // do not replace
10106 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
10107}
10108
10109static void
10110update_cc_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE klass)
10111{
10112 struct rb_id_table *tbl = RCLASS_CC_TBL(klass);
10113 if (tbl) {
10114 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, update_cc_tbl_i, objspace);
10115 }
10116}
10117
10118static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
10119update_cvc_tbl_i(VALUE cvc_entry, void *data)
10120{
10121 struct rb_cvar_class_tbl_entry *entry;
10122
10123 entry = (struct rb_cvar_class_tbl_entry *)cvc_entry;
10124
10125 entry->class_value = rb_gc_location(entry->class_value);
10126
10127 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
10128}
10129
10130static void
10131update_cvc_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE klass)
10132{
10133 struct rb_id_table *tbl = RCLASS_CVC_TBL(klass);
10134 if (tbl) {
10135 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, update_cvc_tbl_i, objspace);
10136 }
10137}
10138
10139static enum rb_id_table_iterator_result
10140update_const_table(VALUE value, void *data)
10141{
10142 rb_const_entry_t *ce = (rb_const_entry_t *)value;
10143 rb_objspace_t * objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)data;
10144
10145 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, ce->value)) {
10146 ce->value = rb_gc_location(ce->value);
10147 }
10148
10149 if (gc_object_moved_p(objspace, ce->file)) {
10150 ce->file = rb_gc_location(ce->file);
10151 }
10152
10153 return ID_TABLE_CONTINUE;
10154}
10155
10156static void
10157update_const_tbl(rb_objspace_t *objspace, struct rb_id_table *tbl)
10158{
10159 if (!tbl) return;
10160 rb_id_table_foreach_values(tbl, update_const_table, objspace);
10161}
10162
10163static void
10164update_subclass_entries(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_subclass_entry_t *entry)
10165{
10166 while (entry) {
10167 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, entry->klass);
10168 entry = entry->next;
10169 }
10170}
10171
10172static int
10173update_iv_index_tbl_i(st_data_t key, st_data_t value, st_data_t arg)
10174{
10175 rb_objspace_t *objspace = (rb_objspace_t *)arg;
10176 struct rb_iv_index_tbl_entry *ent = (struct rb_iv_index_tbl_entry *)value;
10177 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ent->class_value);
10178 return ST_CONTINUE;
10179}
10180
10181static void
10182update_class_ext(rb_objspace_t *objspace, rb_classext_t *ext)
10183{
10184 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ext->origin_);
10185 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ext->includer);
10186 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ext->refined_class);
10187 update_subclass_entries(objspace, ext->subclasses);
10188
10189 // ext->iv_index_tbl
10190 if (ext->iv_index_tbl) {
10191 st_foreach(ext->iv_index_tbl, update_iv_index_tbl_i, (st_data_t)objspace);
10192 }
10193}
10194
10195static void
10196update_superclasses(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
10197{
10198 if (FL_TEST_RAW(obj, RCLASS_SUPERCLASSES_INCLUDE_SELF)) {
10199 for (size_t i = 0; i < RCLASS_SUPERCLASS_DEPTH(obj) + 1; i++) {
10200 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RCLASS_SUPERCLASSES(obj)[i]);
10201 }
10202 }
10203}
10204
10205static void
10206gc_update_object_references(rb_objspace_t *objspace, VALUE obj)
10207{
10208 RVALUE *any = RANY(obj);
10209
10210 gc_report(4, objspace, "update-refs: %p ->\n", (void *)obj);
10211
10212 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(obj)) {
10213 case T_CLASS:
10214 case T_MODULE:
10215 if (RCLASS_SUPER((VALUE)obj)) {
10216 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RCLASS(obj)->super);
10217 }
10218 if (!RCLASS_EXT(obj)) break;
10219 update_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
10220 update_cc_tbl(objspace, obj);
10221 update_cvc_tbl(objspace, obj);
10222 update_superclasses(objspace, obj);
10223
10224 gc_update_tbl_refs(objspace, RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj));
10225
10226 update_class_ext(objspace, RCLASS_EXT(obj));
10227 update_const_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_CONST_TBL(obj));
10228 break;
10229
10230 case T_ICLASS:
10231 if (FL_TEST(obj, RICLASS_IS_ORIGIN) &&
10232 !FL_TEST(obj, RICLASS_ORIGIN_SHARED_MTBL)) {
10233 update_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_M_TBL(obj));
10234 }
10235 if (RCLASS_SUPER((VALUE)obj)) {
10236 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RCLASS(obj)->super);
10237 }
10238 if (!RCLASS_EXT(obj)) break;
10239 if (RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj)) {
10240 gc_update_tbl_refs(objspace, RCLASS_IV_TBL(obj));
10241 }
10242 update_class_ext(objspace, RCLASS_EXT(obj));
10243 update_m_tbl(objspace, RCLASS_CALLABLE_M_TBL(obj));
10244 update_cc_tbl(objspace, obj);
10245 break;
10246
10247 case T_IMEMO:
10248 gc_ref_update_imemo(objspace, obj);
10249 return;
10250
10251 case T_NIL:
10252 case T_FIXNUM:
10253 case T_NODE:
10254 case T_MOVED:
10255 case T_NONE:
10256 /* These can't move */
10257 return;
10258
10259 case T_ARRAY:
10260 if (FL_TEST(obj, ELTS_SHARED)) {
10261 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.array.as.heap.aux.shared_root);
10262 }
10263 else {
10264 gc_ref_update_array(objspace, obj);
10265 }
10266 break;
10267
10268 case T_HASH:
10269 gc_ref_update_hash(objspace, obj);
10270 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.hash.ifnone);
10271 break;
10272
10273 case T_STRING:
10274 if (STR_SHARED_P(obj)) {
10275#if USE_RVARGC
10276 VALUE orig_shared = any->as.string.as.heap.aux.shared;
10277#endif
10278 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.string.as.heap.aux.shared);
10279#if USE_RVARGC
10280 VALUE shared = any->as.string.as.heap.aux.shared;
10281 if (STR_EMBED_P(shared)) {
10282 size_t offset = (size_t)any->as.string.as.heap.ptr - (size_t)RSTRING(orig_shared)->as.embed.ary;
10283 GC_ASSERT(any->as.string.as.heap.ptr >= RSTRING(orig_shared)->as.embed.ary);
10284 GC_ASSERT(offset <= (size_t)RSTRING(shared)->as.embed.len);
10285 any->as.string.as.heap.ptr = RSTRING(shared)->as.embed.ary + offset;
10286 }
10287#endif
10288 }
10289 break;
10290
10291 case T_DATA:
10292 /* Call the compaction callback, if it exists */
10293 {
10294 void *const ptr = DATA_PTR(obj);
10295 if (ptr) {
10296 if (RTYPEDDATA_P(obj)) {
10297 RUBY_DATA_FUNC compact_func = any->as.typeddata.type->function.dcompact;
10298 if (compact_func) (*compact_func)(ptr);
10299 }
10300 }
10301 }
10302 break;
10303
10304 case T_OBJECT:
10305 gc_ref_update_object(objspace, obj);
10306 break;
10307
10308 case T_FILE:
10309 if (any->as.file.fptr) {
10310 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->self);
10311 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->pathv);
10312 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->tied_io_for_writing);
10313 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->writeconv_asciicompat);
10314 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->writeconv_pre_ecopts);
10315 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->encs.ecopts);
10316 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.file.fptr->write_lock);
10317 }
10318 break;
10319 case T_REGEXP:
10320 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.regexp.src);
10321 break;
10322
10323 case T_SYMBOL:
10324 if (DYNAMIC_SYM_P((VALUE)any)) {
10325 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RSYMBOL(any)->fstr);
10326 }
10327 break;
10328
10329 case T_FLOAT:
10330 case T_BIGNUM:
10331 break;
10332
10333 case T_MATCH:
10334 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.match.regexp);
10335
10336 if (any->as.match.str) {
10337 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.match.str);
10338 }
10339 break;
10340
10341 case T_RATIONAL:
10342 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.rational.num);
10343 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.rational.den);
10344 break;
10345
10346 case T_COMPLEX:
10347 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.complex.real);
10348 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, any->as.complex.imag);
10349
10350 break;
10351
10352 case T_STRUCT:
10353 {
10354 long i, len = RSTRUCT_LEN(obj);
10355 VALUE *ptr = (VALUE *)RSTRUCT_CONST_PTR(obj);
10356
10357 for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
10358 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, ptr[i]);
10359 }
10360 }
10361 break;
10362 default:
10363#if GC_DEBUG
10364 rb_gcdebug_print_obj_condition((VALUE)obj);
10365 rb_obj_info_dump(obj);
10366 rb_bug("unreachable");
10367#endif
10368 break;
10369
10370 }
10371
10372 UPDATE_IF_MOVED(objspace, RBASIC(obj)->klass);
10373
10374 gc_report(4, objspace, "update-refs: %p <-\n", (void *)obj);
10375}
10376
10377static int
10378gc_ref_update(void *vstart, void *vend, size_t stride, rb_objspace_t * objspace, struct heap_page *page)
10379{
10380 VALUE v = (VALUE)vstart;
10381 asan_unpoison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*), false);
10382 asan_poison_memory_region(&page->freelist, sizeof(RVALUE*));
10383 page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects = FALSE;
10384 page->flags.has_remembered_objects = FALSE;
10385
10386 /* For each object on the page */
10387 for (; v != (VALUE)vend; v += stride) {
10388 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(v);
10389 asan_unpoison_object(v, false);
10390
10391 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(v)) {
10392 case T_NONE:
10393 case T_MOVED:
10394 case T_ZOMBIE:
10395 break;
10396 default:
10397 if (RVALUE_WB_UNPROTECTED(v)) {
10398 page->flags.has_uncollectible_shady_objects = TRUE;
10399 }
10400 if (RVALUE_PAGE_MARKING(page, v)) {
10401 page->flags.has_remembered_objects = TRUE;
10402 }
10403 if (page->flags.before_sweep) {
10404 if (RVALUE_MARKED(v)) {
10405 gc_update_object_references(objspace, v);
10406 }
10407 }
10408 else {
10409 gc_update_object_references(objspace, v);
10410 }
10411 }
10412
10413 if (poisoned) {
10414 asan_poison_object(v);
10415 }
10416 }
10417
10418 return 0;
10419}
10420
10421extern rb_symbols_t ruby_global_symbols;
10422#define global_symbols ruby_global_symbols
10423
10424static void
10425gc_update_references(rb_objspace_t *objspace)
10426{
10427 rb_execution_context_t *ec = GET_EC();
10428 rb_vm_t *vm = rb_ec_vm_ptr(ec);
10429
10430 struct heap_page *page = NULL;
10431
10432 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
10433 bool should_set_mark_bits = TRUE;
10434 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
10435 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
10436
10437 ccan_list_for_each(&heap->pages, page, page_node) {
10438 uintptr_t start = (uintptr_t)page->start;
10439 uintptr_t end = start + (page->total_slots * size_pool->slot_size);
10440
10441 gc_ref_update((void *)start, (void *)end, size_pool->slot_size, objspace, page);
10442 if (page == heap->sweeping_page) {
10443 should_set_mark_bits = FALSE;
10444 }
10445 if (should_set_mark_bits) {
10446 gc_setup_mark_bits(page);
10447 }
10448 }
10449 }
10450 rb_vm_update_references(vm);
10451 rb_transient_heap_update_references();
10452 rb_gc_update_global_tbl();
10453 global_symbols.ids = rb_gc_location(global_symbols.ids);
10454 global_symbols.dsymbol_fstr_hash = rb_gc_location(global_symbols.dsymbol_fstr_hash);
10455 gc_update_tbl_refs(objspace, objspace->obj_to_id_tbl);
10456 gc_update_table_refs(objspace, objspace->id_to_obj_tbl);
10457 gc_update_table_refs(objspace, global_symbols.str_sym);
10458 gc_update_table_refs(objspace, finalizer_table);
10459}
10460
10461#if GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
10462/*
10463 * call-seq:
10464 * GC.latest_compact_info -> {:considered=>{:T_CLASS=>11}, :moved=>{:T_CLASS=>11}}
10465 *
10466 * Returns information about object moved in the most recent GC compaction.
10467 *
10468 * The returned hash has two keys :considered and :moved. The hash for
10469 * :considered lists the number of objects that were considered for movement
10470 * by the compactor, and the :moved hash lists the number of objects that
10471 * were actually moved. Some objects can't be moved (maybe they were pinned)
10472 * so these numbers can be used to calculate compaction efficiency.
10473 */
10474static VALUE
10475gc_compact_stats(VALUE self)
10476{
10477 size_t i;
10478 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10479 VALUE h = rb_hash_new();
10480 VALUE considered = rb_hash_new();
10481 VALUE moved = rb_hash_new();
10482
10483 for (i=0; i<T_MASK; i++) {
10484 if (objspace->rcompactor.considered_count_table[i]) {
10485 rb_hash_aset(considered, type_sym(i), SIZET2NUM(objspace->rcompactor.considered_count_table[i]));
10486 }
10487
10488 if (objspace->rcompactor.moved_count_table[i]) {
10489 rb_hash_aset(moved, type_sym(i), SIZET2NUM(objspace->rcompactor.moved_count_table[i]));
10490 }
10491 }
10492
10493 rb_hash_aset(h, ID2SYM(rb_intern("considered")), considered);
10494 rb_hash_aset(h, ID2SYM(rb_intern("moved")), moved);
10495
10496 return h;
10497}
10498#else
10499# define gc_compact_stats rb_f_notimplement
10500#endif
10501
10502#if GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
10503static void
10504root_obj_check_moved_i(const char *category, VALUE obj, void *data)
10505{
10506 if (gc_object_moved_p(&rb_objspace, obj)) {
10507 rb_bug("ROOT %s points to MOVED: %p -> %s\n", category, (void *)obj, obj_info(rb_gc_location(obj)));
10508 }
10509}
10510
10511static void
10512reachable_object_check_moved_i(VALUE ref, void *data)
10513{
10514 VALUE parent = (VALUE)data;
10515 if (gc_object_moved_p(&rb_objspace, ref)) {
10516 rb_bug("Object %s points to MOVED: %p -> %s\n", obj_info(parent), (void *)ref, obj_info(rb_gc_location(ref)));
10517 }
10518}
10519
10520static int
10521heap_check_moved_i(void *vstart, void *vend, size_t stride, void *data)
10522{
10523 VALUE v = (VALUE)vstart;
10524 for (; v != (VALUE)vend; v += stride) {
10525 if (gc_object_moved_p(&rb_objspace, v)) {
10526 /* Moved object still on the heap, something may have a reference. */
10527 }
10528 else {
10529 void *poisoned = asan_poisoned_object_p(v);
10530 asan_unpoison_object(v, false);
10531
10532 switch (BUILTIN_TYPE(v)) {
10533 case T_NONE:
10534 case T_ZOMBIE:
10535 break;
10536 default:
10537 if (!rb_objspace_garbage_object_p(v)) {
10538 rb_objspace_reachable_objects_from(v, reachable_object_check_moved_i, (void *)v);
10539 }
10540 }
10541
10542 if (poisoned) {
10543 GC_ASSERT(BUILTIN_TYPE(v) == T_NONE);
10544 asan_poison_object(v);
10545 }
10546 }
10547 }
10548
10549 return 0;
10550}
10551
10552/*
10553 * call-seq:
10554 * GC.compact
10555 *
10556 * This function compacts objects together in Ruby's heap. It eliminates
10557 * unused space (or fragmentation) in the heap by moving objects in to that
10558 * unused space. This function returns a hash which contains statistics about
10559 * which objects were moved. See `GC.latest_gc_info` for details about
10560 * compaction statistics.
10561 *
10562 * This method is implementation specific and not expected to be implemented
10563 * in any implementation besides MRI.
10564 *
10565 * To test whether GC compaction is supported, use the idiom:
10566 *
10567 * GC.respond_to?(:compact)
10568 */
10569static VALUE
10570gc_compact(VALUE self)
10571{
10572 /* Run GC with compaction enabled */
10573 gc_start_internal(NULL, self, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qtrue);
10574
10575 return gc_compact_stats(self);
10576}
10577#else
10578# define gc_compact rb_f_notimplement
10579#endif
10580
10581#if GC_COMPACTION_SUPPORTED
10582static VALUE
10583gc_verify_compaction_references(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE self, VALUE double_heap, VALUE toward_empty)
10584{
10585 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10586
10587 /* Clear the heap. */
10588 gc_start_internal(NULL, self, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qfalse);
10589
10590 RB_VM_LOCK_ENTER();
10591 {
10592 gc_rest(objspace);
10593
10594 if (RTEST(double_heap)) {
10595 for (int i = 0; i < SIZE_POOL_COUNT; i++) {
10596 rb_size_pool_t *size_pool = &size_pools[i];
10597 rb_heap_t *heap = SIZE_POOL_EDEN_HEAP(size_pool);
10598 heap_add_pages(objspace, size_pool, heap, heap->total_pages);
10599 }
10600 }
10601
10602 if (RTEST(toward_empty)) {
10603 gc_sort_heap_by_empty_slots(objspace);
10604 }
10605 }
10606 RB_VM_LOCK_LEAVE();
10607
10608 gc_start_internal(NULL, self, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qtrue, Qtrue);
10609
10610 objspace_reachable_objects_from_root(objspace, root_obj_check_moved_i, NULL);
10611 objspace_each_objects(objspace, heap_check_moved_i, NULL, TRUE);
10612
10613 return gc_compact_stats(self);
10614}
10615#else
10616# define gc_verify_compaction_references (rb_builtin_arity2_function_type)rb_f_notimplement
10617#endif
10618
10619VALUE
10620rb_gc_start(void)
10621{
10622 rb_gc();
10623 return Qnil;
10624}
10625
10626void
10627rb_gc(void)
10628{
10629 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10630 unsigned int reason = GPR_DEFAULT_REASON;
10631 garbage_collect(objspace, reason);
10632}
10633
10634int
10635rb_during_gc(void)
10636{
10637 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10638 return during_gc;
10639}
10640
10641#if RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2
10642
10643static const char *type_name(int type, VALUE obj);
10644
10645static void
10646gc_count_add_each_types(VALUE hash, const char *name, const size_t *types)
10647{
10648 VALUE result = rb_hash_new_with_size(T_MASK);
10649 int i;
10650 for (i=0; i<T_MASK; i++) {
10651 const char *type = type_name(i, 0);
10652 rb_hash_aset(result, ID2SYM(rb_intern(type)), SIZET2NUM(types[i]));
10653 }
10654 rb_hash_aset(hash, ID2SYM(rb_intern(name)), result);
10655}
10656#endif
10657
10658size_t
10659rb_gc_count(void)
10660{
10661 return rb_objspace.profile.count;
10662}
10663
10664static VALUE
10665gc_count(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE self)
10666{
10667 return SIZET2NUM(rb_gc_count());
10668}
10669
10670static VALUE
10671gc_info_decode(rb_objspace_t *objspace, const VALUE hash_or_key, const unsigned int orig_flags)
10672{
10673 static VALUE sym_major_by = Qnil, sym_gc_by, sym_immediate_sweep, sym_have_finalizer, sym_state;
10674 static VALUE sym_nofree, sym_oldgen, sym_shady, sym_force, sym_stress;
10675#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10676 static VALUE sym_oldmalloc;
10677#endif
10678 static VALUE sym_newobj, sym_malloc, sym_method, sym_capi;
10679 static VALUE sym_none, sym_marking, sym_sweeping;
10680 VALUE hash = Qnil, key = Qnil;
10681 VALUE major_by;
10682 unsigned int flags = orig_flags ? orig_flags : objspace->profile.latest_gc_info;
10683
10684 if (SYMBOL_P(hash_or_key)) {
10685 key = hash_or_key;
10686 }
10687 else if (RB_TYPE_P(hash_or_key, T_HASH)) {
10688 hash = hash_or_key;
10689 }
10690 else {
10691 rb_raise(rb_eTypeError, "non-hash or symbol given");
10692 }
10693
10694 if (NIL_P(sym_major_by)) {
10695#define S(s) sym_##s = ID2SYM(rb_intern_const(#s))
10696 S(major_by);
10697 S(gc_by);
10698 S(immediate_sweep);
10699 S(have_finalizer);
10700 S(state);
10701
10702 S(stress);
10703 S(nofree);
10704 S(oldgen);
10705 S(shady);
10706 S(force);
10707#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10708 S(oldmalloc);
10709#endif
10710 S(newobj);
10711 S(malloc);
10712 S(method);
10713 S(capi);
10714
10715 S(none);
10716 S(marking);
10717 S(sweeping);
10718#undef S
10719 }
10720
10721#define SET(name, attr) \
10722 if (key == sym_##name) \
10723 return (attr); \
10724 else if (hash != Qnil) \
10725 rb_hash_aset(hash, sym_##name, (attr));
10726
10727 major_by =
10728 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_NOFREE) ? sym_nofree :
10729 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDGEN) ? sym_oldgen :
10730 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_SHADY) ? sym_shady :
10731 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_FORCE) ? sym_force :
10732#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10733 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MAJOR_BY_OLDMALLOC) ? sym_oldmalloc :
10734#endif
10735 Qnil;
10736 SET(major_by, major_by);
10737
10738 SET(gc_by,
10739 (flags & GPR_FLAG_NEWOBJ) ? sym_newobj :
10740 (flags & GPR_FLAG_MALLOC) ? sym_malloc :
10741 (flags & GPR_FLAG_METHOD) ? sym_method :
10742 (flags & GPR_FLAG_CAPI) ? sym_capi :
10743 (flags & GPR_FLAG_STRESS) ? sym_stress :
10744 Qnil
10745 );
10746
10747 SET(have_finalizer, RBOOL(flags & GPR_FLAG_HAVE_FINALIZE));
10748 SET(immediate_sweep, RBOOL(flags & GPR_FLAG_IMMEDIATE_SWEEP));
10749
10750 if (orig_flags == 0) {
10751 SET(state, gc_mode(objspace) == gc_mode_none ? sym_none :
10752 gc_mode(objspace) == gc_mode_marking ? sym_marking : sym_sweeping);
10753 }
10754#undef SET
10755
10756 if (!NIL_P(key)) {/* matched key should return above */
10757 rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "unknown key: %"PRIsVALUE, rb_sym2str(key));
10758 }
10759
10760 return hash;
10761}
10762
10763VALUE
10764rb_gc_latest_gc_info(VALUE key)
10765{
10766 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10767 return gc_info_decode(objspace, key, 0);
10768}
10769
10770static VALUE
10771gc_latest_gc_info(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE self, VALUE arg)
10772{
10773 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10774
10775 if (NIL_P(arg)) {
10776 arg = rb_hash_new();
10777 }
10778 else if (!SYMBOL_P(arg) && !RB_TYPE_P(arg, T_HASH)) {
10779 rb_raise(rb_eTypeError, "non-hash or symbol given");
10780 }
10781
10782 return gc_info_decode(objspace, arg, 0);
10783}
10784
10785enum gc_stat_sym {
10786 gc_stat_sym_count,
10787 gc_stat_sym_time,
10788 gc_stat_sym_heap_allocated_pages,
10789 gc_stat_sym_heap_sorted_length,
10790 gc_stat_sym_heap_allocatable_pages,
10791 gc_stat_sym_heap_available_slots,
10792 gc_stat_sym_heap_live_slots,
10793 gc_stat_sym_heap_free_slots,
10794 gc_stat_sym_heap_final_slots,
10795 gc_stat_sym_heap_marked_slots,
10796 gc_stat_sym_heap_eden_pages,
10797 gc_stat_sym_heap_tomb_pages,
10798 gc_stat_sym_total_allocated_pages,
10799 gc_stat_sym_total_freed_pages,
10800 gc_stat_sym_total_allocated_objects,
10801 gc_stat_sym_total_freed_objects,
10802 gc_stat_sym_malloc_increase_bytes,
10803 gc_stat_sym_malloc_increase_bytes_limit,
10804 gc_stat_sym_minor_gc_count,
10805 gc_stat_sym_major_gc_count,
10806 gc_stat_sym_compact_count,
10807 gc_stat_sym_read_barrier_faults,
10808 gc_stat_sym_total_moved_objects,
10809 gc_stat_sym_remembered_wb_unprotected_objects,
10810 gc_stat_sym_remembered_wb_unprotected_objects_limit,
10811 gc_stat_sym_old_objects,
10812 gc_stat_sym_old_objects_limit,
10813#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10814 gc_stat_sym_oldmalloc_increase_bytes,
10815 gc_stat_sym_oldmalloc_increase_bytes_limit,
10816#endif
10817#if RGENGC_PROFILE
10818 gc_stat_sym_total_generated_normal_object_count,
10819 gc_stat_sym_total_generated_shady_object_count,
10820 gc_stat_sym_total_shade_operation_count,
10821 gc_stat_sym_total_promoted_count,
10822 gc_stat_sym_total_remembered_normal_object_count,
10823 gc_stat_sym_total_remembered_shady_object_count,
10824#endif
10825 gc_stat_sym_last
10826};
10827
10828static VALUE gc_stat_symbols[gc_stat_sym_last];
10829
10830static void
10831setup_gc_stat_symbols(void)
10832{
10833 if (gc_stat_symbols[0] == 0) {
10834#define S(s) gc_stat_symbols[gc_stat_sym_##s] = ID2SYM(rb_intern_const(#s))
10835 S(count);
10836 S(time);
10837 S(heap_allocated_pages);
10838 S(heap_sorted_length);
10839 S(heap_allocatable_pages);
10840 S(heap_available_slots);
10841 S(heap_live_slots);
10842 S(heap_free_slots);
10843 S(heap_final_slots);
10844 S(heap_marked_slots);
10845 S(heap_eden_pages);
10846 S(heap_tomb_pages);
10847 S(total_allocated_pages);
10848 S(total_freed_pages);
10849 S(total_allocated_objects);
10850 S(total_freed_objects);
10851 S(malloc_increase_bytes);
10852 S(malloc_increase_bytes_limit);
10853 S(minor_gc_count);
10854 S(major_gc_count);
10855 S(compact_count);
10856 S(read_barrier_faults);
10857 S(total_moved_objects);
10858 S(remembered_wb_unprotected_objects);
10859 S(remembered_wb_unprotected_objects_limit);
10860 S(old_objects);
10861 S(old_objects_limit);
10862#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10863 S(oldmalloc_increase_bytes);
10864 S(oldmalloc_increase_bytes_limit);
10865#endif
10866#if RGENGC_PROFILE
10867 S(total_generated_normal_object_count);
10868 S(total_generated_shady_object_count);
10869 S(total_shade_operation_count);
10870 S(total_promoted_count);
10871 S(total_remembered_normal_object_count);
10872 S(total_remembered_shady_object_count);
10873#endif /* RGENGC_PROFILE */
10874#undef S
10875 }
10876}
10877
10878static size_t
10879gc_stat_internal(VALUE hash_or_sym)
10880{
10881 rb_objspace_t *objspace = &rb_objspace;
10882 VALUE hash = Qnil, key = Qnil;
10883
10884 setup_gc_stat_symbols();
10885
10886 if (RB_TYPE_P(hash_or_sym, T_HASH)) {
10887 hash = hash_or_sym;
10888 }
10889 else if (SYMBOL_P(hash_or_sym)) {
10890 key = hash_or_sym;
10891 }
10892 else {
10893 rb_raise(rb_eTypeError, "non-hash or symbol argument");
10894 }
10895
10896#define SET(name, attr) \
10897 if (key == gc_stat_symbols[gc_stat_sym_##name]) \
10898 return attr; \
10899 else if (hash != Qnil) \
10900 rb_hash_aset(hash, gc_stat_symbols[gc_stat_sym_##name], SIZET2NUM(attr));
10901
10902 SET(count, objspace->profile.count);
10903 SET(time, (size_t) (objspace->profile.total_time_ns / (1000 * 1000) /* ns -> ms */)); // TODO: UINT64T2NUM
10904
10905 /* implementation dependent counters */
10906 SET(heap_allocated_pages, heap_allocated_pages);
10907 SET(heap_sorted_length, heap_pages_sorted_length);
10908 SET(heap_allocatable_pages, heap_allocatable_pages(objspace));
10909 SET(heap_available_slots, objspace_available_slots(objspace));
10910 SET(heap_live_slots, objspace_live_slots(objspace));
10911 SET(heap_free_slots, objspace_free_slots(objspace));
10912 SET(heap_final_slots, heap_pages_final_slots);
10913 SET(heap_marked_slots, objspace->marked_slots);
10914 SET(heap_eden_pages, heap_eden_total_pages(objspace));
10915 SET(heap_tomb_pages, heap_tomb_total_pages(objspace));
10916 SET(total_allocated_pages, total_allocated_pages(objspace));
10917 SET(total_freed_pages, total_freed_pages(objspace));
10918 SET(total_allocated_objects, objspace->total_allocated_objects);
10919 SET(total_freed_objects, objspace->profile.total_freed_objects);
10920 SET(malloc_increase_bytes, malloc_increase);
10921 SET(malloc_increase_bytes_limit, malloc_limit);
10922 SET(minor_gc_count, objspace->profile.minor_gc_count);
10923 SET(major_gc_count, objspace->profile.major_gc_count);
10924 SET(compact_count, objspace->profile.compact_count);
10925 SET(read_barrier_faults, objspace->profile.read_barrier_faults);
10926 SET(total_moved_objects, objspace->rcompactor.total_moved);
10927 SET(remembered_wb_unprotected_objects, objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects);
10928 SET(remembered_wb_unprotected_objects_limit, objspace->rgengc.uncollectible_wb_unprotected_objects_limit);
10929 SET(old_objects, objspace->rgengc.old_objects);
10930 SET(old_objects_limit, objspace->rgengc.old_objects_limit);
10931#if RGENGC_ESTIMATE_OLDMALLOC
10932 SET(oldmalloc_increase_bytes, objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase);
10933 SET(oldmalloc_increase_bytes_limit, objspace->rgengc.oldmalloc_increase_limit);
10934#endif
10935
10936#if RGENGC_PROFILE
10937 SET(total_generated_normal_object_count, objspace->profile.total_generated_normal_object_count);
10938 SET(total_generated_shady_object_count, objspace->profile.total_generated_shady_object_count);
10939 SET(total_shade_operation_count, objspace->profile.total_shade_operation_count);
10940 SET(total_promoted_count, objspace->profile.total_promoted_count);
10941 SET(total_remembered_normal_object_count, objspace->profile.total_remembered_normal_object_count);
10942 SET(total_remembered_shady_object_count, objspace->profile.total_remembered_shady_object_count);
10943#endif /* RGENGC_PROFILE */
10944#undef SET
10945
10946 if (!NIL_P(key)) { /* matched key should return above */
10947 rb_raise(rb_eArgError, "unknown key: %"PRIsVALUE, rb_sym2str(key));
10948 }
10949
10950#if defined(RGENGC_PROFILE) && RGENGC_PROFILE >= 2
10951 if (hash != Qnil) {
10952 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "generated_normal_object_count_types", objspace->profile.generated_normal_object_count_types);
10953 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "generated_shady_object_count_types", objspace->profile.generated_shady_object_count_types);
10954 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "shade_operation_count_types", objspace->profile.shade_operation_count_types);
10955 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "promoted_types", objspace->profile.promoted_types);
10956 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "remembered_normal_object_count_types", objspace->profile.remembered_normal_object_count_types);
10957 gc_count_add_each_types(hash, "remembered_shady_object_count_types", objspace->profile.remembered_shady_object_count_types);
10958 }
10959#endif
10960
10961 return 0;
10962}
10963
10964static VALUE
10965gc_stat(rb_execution_context_t *ec, VALUE self, VALUE arg) // arg is (nil || hash || symbol)
10966{
10967 if (NIL_P(arg)) {
10968 arg = rb_hash_new();
10969 }
10970 else if (SYMBOL_P(arg)) {
